story:
We make products that align with your hormonal cycle!

Join us on the journey to develop the Period drink. Pre-order Period at a discounted price, try it at home, and share your feedback!

 

 

Period, a soothing, hot cocoa-based drink with turmeric, black pepper, reishi & warming spices, designed to support you and your body during your hormonal cycle. It’s a blend of highest quality cocoa, intense turmeric and punchy black pepper and earthy Reishi, spiced with a pinch of cardamom and cinnamon

 

Our Product: 170g providing ~10 servings.

Piperine from black pepper and curcumin from turmeric are blended with our high quality, raw cocoa, and Reishi, to make this soothing drink.

Our recipe is naturally rich in iron, magnesium, and potassium; helping your body with blood formation, reducing tiredness and fatigue, and helping muscular function to make you feel your best during your period.  

 

 

Our formula is 100% Plant-Based, Dairy-Free, Gluten-free, and low in sugar. 

 

 

How it works;

  1. Add the Period cocoa blend to a mug.
  2. Heat-up 250ml of milk of your choice 
  3. Add a little to the powder to make a paste, then add the remainder.
  4. Stir and enjoy!

 

The story so far...

We are a team of foodies and designers united by our interest to make indulgent foods and drinks that give our bodies what they need.

Kraft Heinz New Ventures Lab is an agile business division within Kraft Heinz working to deliver food solutions that are better for you and kinder to the planet.

 

Team

 

 

Why Indiegogo...?

At the Kraft Heinz Ventures Lab, we are opening up our innovation process to engage with a community of potential future customers who want to help us to shape the future of food. Using Indiegogo allows us to explore products that are a bit different from what you usually see us doing. This campaign is an opportunity to bring other voices and insights to the product development early on and interact with people who will love this product.

We want to invite you to share the journey of creating meaningful products with us. We started this project as we felt there was not enough talk about our hormones and how they shape how we experience the world and ourselves. We are here to learn from the community and would love to hear from you!

 

To find out more come and visit us at periodperiod.net

story:
We started the project we the women peasants in Mparo Parish,Rwamucucu Sub-county Rukiga-Kabale in South Western Uganda.

The purpose of the project is to make sure the indigenous good quality seeds which reproduce good seeds are not made to diminish by the organizations promoting and selling genetically modified seeds which cannot produce seeds but make the peasant continue buying seeds every time of planting.

It also serves as source of food for the participants as well as selling extra as source of income generating project.

It also helps directly and indirectly promote plant food against people destroying animals as source of food.

The peasants also use natural organic farmyard manure that does not contain chemicals and which improves soils.

So since September 2018  started by three of us;

We the peasants started with bean and maize seeds in that once a home has a good harvest of these two seeds it can have a reasonable diet source and food security.

With SEND A SEED. The women peasants who are provided seeds, they grow them and on harvesting they provide the same amount of seeds that they were given, to another woman peasant each. Then use the remaining as seeds and some as for food.

20 kilograms of seeds yield approximately 100 kilogrammes on harvesting.

Bean seeds cost Uganda Shs 3000/- per kilogram while Maize seeds cost Uganda Shs 2000/- per kilogram

20 Kgs of Bean seeds cost U Shs 60,000/- while 20 kgs Maize seeds cost 40,000/- .Totaling to U Shillings 100,000/- (One hundred thousands)

To provide such an amount to at least 40 women peasants:

40x 100,000/- = 4,000,000/= (Uganda Shillings Four millions)

Equivalent to British Pounds Sterling 800.

N.B.If we could raise more than this,the better as more high quality seeds would be purchased and more of women supported and involved.

It would enable our innovation in production of organic solid and liquid environmentally friendly fertilizers and pesticides that are completely produced from organic matter,plants and soils to be produced and distributed at large scale possible securing patent for them.

Our innovations have also no harm on human beings and other animals as well as food.

Presently the membership of the project stands at 20 women. We could have raised to over 60 now had it not been the break out of COVID-19 pandemic that has sabotaged our progress in a number of ways including having to share the seeds supposed for planting with families in urban areas starving due to lock downs and without food.

Also we cannot dig in our gardens as groups due to COVID-19,as we have been doing as well as having meetings.

KEMIREMBE HOPE.

Contact us at: sendaseedproject@gmail.com

Contribute Using the " BACK IT" Button.

NEW: We re-launched this campaign through the link below:

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/the-send-a-seed-women-s-project-in-uganda--2#/

story:
What we stand for

We originally opened MacGregor's Bar in Inverness because we are passionate about sharing the very best in Scottish food, drink, music and culture. We are an independent bar that wants to share the best in Highland hospitality for the local and the visitor. We are a bar that lives and breathes the spirit of the ceilidh and truly welcomes the world.

Since opening on St Andrew's Night 2017 we have been awarded

  • Best Bar in Scotland (Visit Scotland Thistle Awards 2019)
  • Best Live Music Bar (Scottish Licensed Trade Awards 2019)
  • Best Concept Bar (Scottish Licensed Trade Awards 2018)
  • Best Bar in the Highlands (Highland Tourism Awards 2018)

Our plan has always been to grow and take MacGregor's across the world, and we will....but things have slightly changed in the last year! We believe the Highlands of Scotland is the place for us to grow  and develop, but we need your help.

Hospitality has been hit hard during the pandemic but we see some amazing opportunities ahead.  We would love you to help us create another MacGregors in Golspie, right on the North Coast 500. The Ben Bhraggie Hotel is an ideal location for further developing our brand whilst offering something special to locals and visitors alike.

It is our mission to tell the world how amazing Scotland is.....but first, we're doing it small, and perfectly formed. We would love you to be part of it.

 

Why it will work 

Locally: The local population have been crying out for a venue that offers great entertainment with food and drink. There are currently no restaurants in the town.

Nationally : The North Coast 500, the world renowned road trip around the North of Scotland, has become one of the "must do" priorities for the staycationer. The most visited attraction on this route is Dunrobin Castle which is a stonesthrow from our new site. 

Golspie is aiming to become known as the 'Outdoors centre of the Highlands', with fantastic mountain biking, walking and golf for the visitor. It has stunning beaches and is surrounded by natural beauty.  

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need to raise £25,000 to help renovate the two bar areas, beer garden, kitchen and rooms.
  • This will allow us to create a special place on the North Coast 500 which really promotes the best of Highland culture and produce  
  • What we're offering you is a fantastic range of perks ranging from bar tabs to discount cards to limited edition merchandise.
  • If we don't reach our target then it'll take a bit longer to open, but every penny will be going into MacGregors MkII - Golspie, and our efforts to create something special.

The Impact

  • In a recent report by Highlands Islands Enterprise the lack of hospitality offerings was highlighted on every second page! We aim to create a community hub. 
  • Being an independent bar means we can promote the things that we believe are important. For us that means Highland music and culture alongside brilliant local food and drink. A year round series of events will create a buzz throughout the area.  We also believe that if we create something special for the local community then the tourist experience will be made so much better. 
  • We've done this before. We know we can create something beautiful and long-lasting, something that we can all be proud of. 

Risks & Challenges

We know the risks and challenges in this game. We've learnt so much in the last few years building our bar in Inverness. However we have now developed full training programmes and a whole series of systems and procedures which will make this next step less daunting. We've also built a fantastic team who are on board with us on this journey. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Maybe you can't get involved just now, but maybe you know others who might want to

  • Please help us spread the word and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
The all-new KEY electric grinder is a revolution in conical burr single-dose grinding. The biggest, best commercial burr set available in the most compact, countertop-saving design possible. The burrs and mount define the width of the product, making it more space-saving than grinders with burrs a fraction of the size. All more precise, alignable, and cleanable than anything else in the world. 

 

Easily change between espresso, pour-over, French press, or AeroPress without having to redial your grind.


 

The "key" to the perfect cup of coffee is achieving a consistent grind each time. No matter the method of extraction, the coffee will be optimally consistent for a smooth, even flavor.


 

Virtually zero retention of coffee grounds in the burr grinder. Minimal oil residue, old coffee grounds, or flavors will ever come into contact when switching beans. No bean left behind.

and, a LOT less cleaning.

 

"With its unbelievably small footprint and variable RPM 83mm conical burrs, it covers all styles of coffee preparation. I loved the auto-centering shaker and auto-mixing feature of the Magic Tumbler, both of which exemplify the build quality and craftsmanship I’ve come to expect from Doug and the team at Weber Workshops."

- Hide Izaki, 2014 World Barista Champion
 

Integrated Weiss Distribution Technique (WDT) stirs the grounds as they drop from the burrs to break any remaining clumps.

This creates an even distribution of grinds throughout the whole puck, allowing water to be pressed through evenly for ideal consistent extraction.

Perfect for espresso and pour over.

 

If you’re more in tune with your current coffee workflow, then our Standard Tumbler Standard Tumbler and Funnel - the same ones utilized in our HG-2 hand grinder - will get the job done for you. The Standard Tumbler fits perfectly on top of your 49mm AND 58mm portafilter (it has two ridges). Automatically magnetically centers under the funnel. Available as an add-on at check out.

Pull the plug to cleanly release the grounds down into the portafilter, Aeropress, or coffee filter. No mess, no stress. A perfect streamlined workflow.


 

KEY is engineered with 83mm TiN coated Mazzer Burrs that will deliver you quality grounds for a lifetime.

We source our burrs exclusively from Mazzer, but apply our own unique secondary processes to partially season them so they are usable out of the box. We then seal in the edge with a life-prolonging and completely food-safe TiN coating. Perfect for the single-dosing café or the home.

 

 

 

 

 

We stand by our products and provide a 2-year warranty from the date of delivery. Products manufactured and sold by Weber Workshops shall be free, under normal use and service, from defects in material and workmanship for 2 year.


 

 

 

 

 

 

The Magic Tumbler™ magnetically snaps into place directly to the bottom of the burrs, so there is zero space for coffee overspray. There has never been a cleaner, more efficient grounds control mechanism.

The assembly is also compatible with Standard Tumbler configurations & interchangeable with those used on our HG-2 hand grinder.


 

An RPM adjustment knob to optimize the speed for your coffee bean extraction preferences. 50-300 RPM.

 

 

A cleaning brush that slides in and out of the grinder with a simple push. Made with a mix of boar and horse hair, designed specifically to clean the grinder. The replaceable head threads out of its solid hardwood handle with its solid brass holding collar.

 

 

Responsibly manufactured to stay out of the landfill. Recyclable materials and minimal plastic parts. KEY is built for this generation and the next.

 

 

Factory Pre-Aligned: Installed with proprietary food-safe Titanium Nitride (TiN) PVD-coated Mazzer burrs.

 

 

At Apple, I spent years overseeing product design for the iPhone, considered by some to be among the most disruptive industrial design feats. Following this career-defining role in reimagining the cell phone, I am now fully engrossed by how we experience coffee. With this latest coffee grinder, my team and I are bringing professional-level coffee grinding to the home. Our vision is to continue to be a disruptive force in the world of product design, wherever we may find it. 

- Douglas


 

 

As a long-time Product Design Engineer there, Apple's principled design philosophy, which has defined some of the world’s most iconic products —  runs deep in my blood.

When you experience an Apple product, the product’s quality: how it looks, how it feels — intrinsically enhances the experience of using it.

Together with the engineering and design teams I led or belonged to, I spent innumerable hours sweating the details people didn’t even realize existed.

This attention to detail is how Apple has continued to uphold its reputation for creating products that are consistently and reliably on a higher plane than the mass consumer market versions sold at big box stores. On top of wasting resources and costing us and the environment more in the long term, products designed only to sell don’t provide a quality user experience or spark joy in our daily lives.

In the case of coffee grinders, there simply hasn’t been a product that would stand the test of the design philosophy we embraced at Apple  — until we started making coffee grinders. Unlike cell phones, when these items are built with purpose and integrity, they can continue to serve us and improve our quality of life on a daily basis for decades, if not longer. They are heirloom products, and that’s something I get excited about.

All in all, we enjoy high-quality products that deliver. They enhance our quality of life. That’s why KEY Coffee Grinder—and all Weber Workshops products for that matter—are designed to be the last products of their class you ever buy.



 

We are able to ship worldwide. VAT and GST not included. Please see reward for details on the shipping cost that applies to you.
 

We plan to ship starting in October 2021. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order. You will receive a notification within 30-45 days of our shipping.
 

By backing now, you’ll get to own one of the very first products off of the line, plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of our products.

 

 

 

Bring KEY Coffee Grinder Home.

 

Rainfactory is a multiple-award-winning crowdfunding marketing agency that operates as a marketing department for growing brands. Rainfactory’s experienced team & data-driven, battle-tested approach ensure long-term market dominance for DTC eCommerce start-ups.

story:
What is Flower Dork?

From delicate herbal liqueurs inspired by traditional apéritifs and digestifs to hedonistic barrel aged pastry inspired liqueurs: Flower Dork is a lil’ midwestern liqueur company celebrating our tasty world.

Unlike other spirit companies, we are 100% focused on making the best friggin’ liqueurs in the universe. Our bittersweet domination is scheduled to begin in Chicago, IL early 2022… but we need your help!

 

The Perks

What do you get out of supporting us? Sick merch with our cool Flower Dork logo, handwritten (and doodled) thank you notes, t-shirts, beanies, fun branded glassware, and of course, vouchers for bottles of our product! Vouchers function like gift cards for our liquors, and must be exchanged in person (shipping alcohol is a whole can of worms we can't get into without lots more licensing), but if you can't make it up to Chicago, just let us know and we'll work something out.

All perks will be sent out after the campaign ends. Keep in mind that some things, like glassware, will probably take longer to send out than the stickers and haikus. We will keep you updated the whole way and let you know if anything comes up that causes any extra delays.

 

The Budget

Most of our funding from this campaign will go to production equipment, ingredients for the first batch, and fees for getting licensed in Illinois. Here's a breakdown of our total estimated budget:

As you can see this equates to WAY over $25,000. Our goal for this campaign isn't everything we need to successfully make Flower Dork Spirits happen, but it is a huge step toward opening.

It takes a lot to start a business! Before we can start producing and selling products, we need to be approved by various government alphabet boys. This can take six months to a year to happen, or longer if we're very unlucky. Even if this campaign is successful, we still plan on applying for a small business loan to cover the costs of opening and staying open during the period in which production isn't possible.

So why are we campaigning for what will be a small chunk of our overall cost? This campaign is essential to measure and show the demand for our products! Once completed, it will be something we can show banks and investors to prove there is potential for profit. I know, I know! It would be great if we could just make fun liqueurs without having to worry about money, but unfortunately, we gotta make that Big Green to do our dream job.

In addition, this campaign will help us create excitement around our opening, and involve fellow local liquor enthusiasts in our foundation. We love our community and want you all to be a part of Flower Dork from the very beginning.

All this means if we don't reach our goal, not all is lost! We will put the funding we did get toward the most important costs, reassess our strategy, and then push forward.

Here's a rough outline of our plan to open...

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that it's not possible for everyone to contribute, so if you want to support us for the low, low price of zero dollars, please share our campaign on your social media and tell people about our project. We super appreciate you hyping us up to your wealthier friends and family. ✿
story_txt:
What is Flower Dork?
From delicate herbal liqueurs inspired by traditional apéritifs and digestifs to hedonistic barrel aged pastry inspired liqueurs: Flower Dork is a lil’ midwestern liqueur company celebrating our tasty world.
Unlike other spirit companies, we are 100% focused on making the best friggin’ liqueurs in the universe. Our bittersweet domination is scheduled to begin in Chicago, IL early 2022… but we need your help!
 
The Perks
What do you get out of supporting us? Sick merch with our cool Flower Dork logo, handwritten (and doodled) thank you notes, t-shirts, beanies, fun branded glassware, and of course, vouchers for bottles of our product! Vouchers function like gift cards for our liquors, and must be exchanged in person (shipping alcohol is a whole can of worms we can't get into without lots more licensing), but if you can't make it up to Chicago, just let us know and we'll work something out.
All perks will be sent out after the campaign ends. Keep in mind that some things, like glassware, will probably take longer to send out than the stickers and haikus. We will keep you updated the whole way and let you know if anything comes up that causes any extra delays.
 

The BudgetMost of our funding from this campaign will go to production equipment, ingredients for the first batch, and fees for getting licensed in Illinois. Here's a breakdown of our total estimated budget:

As you can see this equates to WAY over $25,000. Our goal for this campaign isn't everything we need to successfully make Flower Dork Spirits happen, but it is a huge step toward opening.
It takes a lot to start a business! Before we can start producing and selling products, we need to be approved by various government alphabet boys. This can take six months to a year to happen, or longer if we're very unlucky. Even if this campaign is successful, we still plan on applying for a small business loan to cover the costs of opening and staying open during the period in which production isn't possible.
So why are we campaigning for what will be a small chunk of our overall cost? This campaign is essential to measure and show the demand for our products! Once completed, it will be something we can show banks and investors to prove there is potential for profit. I know, I know! It would be great if we could just make fun liqueurs without having to worry about money, but unfortunately, we gotta make that Big Green to do our dream job.
In addition, this campaign will help us create excitement around our opening, and involve fellow local liquor enthusiasts in our foundation. We love our community and want you all to be a part of Flower Dork from the very beginning.
All this means if we don't reach our goal, not all is lost! We will put the funding we did get toward the most important costs, reassess our strategy, and then push forward.
Here's a rough outline of our plan to open...

 
Other Ways You Can HelpWe understand that it's not possible for everyone to contribute, so if you want to support us for the low, low price of zero dollars, please share our campaign on your social media and tell people about our project. We super appreciate you hyping us up to your wealthier friends and family. ✿

story:
Note: Certain changes have been made to the product and formula. Check out vaelabs.com for the most up to date information.

51 energizing sprays in one VAE!

 

Each VAE packs 51 energizing sprays to keep you alert, focused, and energized in a matter of seconds. Designed to provide 2-3 weeks of energy, VAE is there for you whenever you need it.


 

 

 

Sprayed onto your tongue, VAE is quick and convenient whenever you need a boost. VAE easily fits into your pocket or purse. With its sleek design, it complements any style.

 

 

VAE was created for the "doer", people who work hard and get stuff done. Whether you are on your feet all day, or working from home, VAE is there to get you through your tasks. 

 

 

 

 

To Get A Jumpstart On Your Morning

 

For A Quick Boost At The Gym

 

Or For Blasting Through Your Work

Though its primary ingredient is caffeine, VAE also contains 2 additional ingredients that reduce the caffeine jitters and crash. With these, VAE is made of 6 components: water, caffeine, NALT, Rhodiola rosea, three sweeteners (sucralose, ace k and xylitol) and natural flavoring. We take our health and yours very seriously, so we chose to use only a small number of highly effective ingredients to provide a clean energy experience.

 

 

VAE comes in two sleek variants: black/gold and white/rose-gold! A survey will be provided after the campaign has finished to select your options.

 

We are launching with two delicious flavors: Mango Sunrise and Icy Mint, but a mystery flavor will be unlocked if we reach our second stretch goal!

A survey will be provided after the campaign has finished to select your flavors.

 

 

We thoroughly believe in transparency at VAE, which is why we are open about how we settled on our projected delivery date.

With your funding, we will be able to finish the production mold of our bottle and begin manufacturing midway through our campaign.  We estimate this will take up to three months to complete. Liquid manufacturing will be completed during this time and filling will take another 3-4 weeks, so we anticipate being to ready to ship to our first backers by February 2021. We will keep everyone updated as we progress through this process. 

The solution is ready and the prototypes have been made, but we'll need your support to bring VAE into production! We don't know when we will be accepting orders next, so make sure to purchase enough to last the wait!

 

 

VAE fits snugly in the palm of your hand, designed for convenience and portability. At the intersection of form and function, our design fits the modern aesthetic, a perfect addition to your everyday kit alongside your wallet and keys. Our PocketSafe™ locking mechanism ensures that you don't get any unwanted sprays going off in your purse or pocket as you move about your busy day. With VAE in your pocket, you never have to worry about being tired again. 

 

Chaim and Mohand began their journey at McGill University, both majoring in Neuroscience. In this rigorous field, the two friends noticed their classmates struggling to keep up with the work. Many of them turned to energy drinks and caffeine pills in order to study the long nights and to stay alert. They knew there had to be a safer, smarter way.

So, they got to work. After two years of research and testing, VAE was created.

 

Mohand Khouider - CEO

Mohand is currently studying at McGill Law School after graduating with a B.Sc. in Neuroscience. He has extensive experience in neuroscience research, ranging from identifying biomarkers for early diagnosis of Alzheimer’s Disease to designing and leading a clinical study on the effects of tDCS on implicit motor learning. Utilizing his knowledge of neuroscience, leadership, and law, Mohand leads VAE's expansion into the energy market.

 

Chaim Weinerman - CTO

Chaim recently graduated from McGill University with a B.Sc. in Neuroscience. His past projects include working in multiple neuroscience labs from conducting clinical trials researching the neural processes behind epilepsy to designing and creating brain-machine interfaces. With his strong background in chemistry, project design and implementation, Chaim is heavily involved in the development and refinement processes at VAE.

 

It's been a three-year-long journey since we initially had the idea for this product. We were always convinced of its potential to help people make the most out of their day and are excited to finally bring you VAE - our vision for how energy should be. 

 

 

 

Each VAE contains as much caffeine as 16 energy drinks, so using a single VAE means less mining of aluminum and less waste. In addition, we will be rolling out a bottle recycling program as part of our commitment to environmental sustainability.

 

Thanks to the initial seed funding we received, we were able to go through the industrial design process and finalize our prototypes. We need your help to fund our production run so we can take VAE to market. In return, you will be the very first to try VAE, and be among the first to get your energy in a smarter, healthier way. With your help, VAE will introduce the world to the future of energy.

 

If our campaign is successfully funded, we'll be able to move toward a refillable model. These reusable bottles will make VAE even more environmentally friendly. In addition, by backing VAE, you are not only supporting this product but also future cutting-edge innovations our team creates. And we've got a lot planned.

Here's a quick taste of some other projects Chaim and Mohand have worked on in the past: 

 

A Levitating Wind Turbine

The superconducting levitation component 

 

The 1/10th scale Levitating Wind Turbine being tested in the lab

 

A Mind-Controled Robot (Using EEG)

Pushing a hat off the table
 
 

Navigating the table's edges

Join the future of energy & help launch VAE straight to the moon!

Get your link at the top.

We are happy to say that there are no Research & Development risks as the solution has been fully developed, the product design phase is finished, and we have finalized manufacturers who are ready and waiting to produce VAE. Samples and prototypes have already been made and we are just waiting on the money raised from this campaign to fund VAE's production.

1. Potential Delays

We have built our schedule trying to keeping everything in mind, but delays are always possible and may occur due to supply chain or quality control issues.

Our aim is to have the product available for shipping by the early February 2021 and arriving to our first backers by late February 2021. We will of course be providing our backers with regular updates (with accompanying videos and images!) on our progress and you will be immediately informed of any issues.

 2. About the product

Though the product is finalized, and unlikely to change at this point, product specifications may need to be adjusted to ensure that VAE meets our high quality standards. Of course, if any changes do occur, we will notify you immediately.

3. About the price

If exchange rates fluctuate significantly, the selling price may be affected. We hope to ship VAE worldwide, but there is a possibility changes in price in specific areas as exchange rates fluctuate. 

 

Questions? Chat With Us!

 

Contact Us

Please do not hesitate to contact us at support@vaelabs.com. We are looking forward to answering your questions!

Press Kit

Powered By

story:
AI-Enabled Cooking

Why do we accept  “high” as a temperature? It’s time to cook smarter. Cooksy makes the invisible world of temperature something you can see and act on.

Cooksy Guides you to Make Perfect Food Every Time

When you follow a Cooksy recipe, you have step-by-step navigation and video instruction. No need to keep track of the whole recipe.

Cooksy tells you if your pan is too hot or too cold so your food will be perfectly cooked every time.

Cooksy lets you multitask as your food is cooking and notifies you when your attention is needed.

Cooksy Makes it Easy to Create Video Recipes  

Cooksy tracks the timing of when ingredients are added and removed, measures the heat, and captures the techniques and details of how the dish was made with video.

With Cooksy, you effortlessly have a “recipe” that is so much more than a recipe — you have a blueprint to save, share, and recreate your dish with every detail included. 

Cooksy’s smart editing automatically condenses your recipe into a short, shareable video that highlights all the steps. 

 

 

Share your favorites with family, friends, and the community of Cooksy chefs around the world.

  

How Cooksy Works

Cooksy easily mounts above your cooktop.

Using visual and thermal sensors, Cooksy streams your cooking session to your phone or tablet, measuring thousands of temperatures across your entire pan surface many times per second and tracking ingredient cooking times.

Whether you follow a recipe or choose to improvise, Cooksy removes the guesswork out of cooking and guides you to make perfect food every time.

Our Plan

This team has been hard at work for two years building Cooksy. Our hardware design is complete, our tooling is built, and we are finalizing our manufacturing process. 

 

Product Specs

 

Cooksy Companion App

Available via Google Play Store and Apple App Store

  • Record Cooksy recipes with auto temperature and timing, and details previously unavailable in a written recipe.  
  • Follow Cooksy recipes that have been shared by top chefs, family members, friends, or fellow Cooksy Chefs.
  • Press a button to automatically create a customizable Cooksy recipe video.
  • Create and share your Cooksy recipes with friends, family, or the world.
  • Organize your recipes into cookbooks.
  • Step-by-step promptings detect when ingredients are added so you never need to look at a recipe again.
  • After recording your recipe, add Chef notes and additional steps for the perfect recipe to share.
  • Use temperature drop pins to see the different temperatures in your pan.

What You Get

Our Team 

The Evolution of Cooksy

story:
Short Summary

The idea for Charter Smoke BBQ originated from of our love of great tasting BBQ and the sense of community that it brings. Growing up in New England we felt that the art of smoked meats was bound by way too much tradition. In Kansas City they use a tomato base, in the Carolinas and Georgia mostly vinegar or mustard, in Texas they use no sauce at all. Why so many rules? 

That’s why we set out to see what a “New American” BBQ could be. Why not put a Carolina vinegar sauce on chicken?  Why not create a sauce with maple syrup or coriander?  Why let tradition dictate what goes with what? Can't we just do what tastes good? Our idea was to take the Best parts of southern BBQ and blend them together with a little New England twist. So that’s exactly what we did!

Charter Smoke’s Mission is to bring professional quality New England inspired sauces and rubs to you, your family and friends.  We challenge age old BBQ traditions to create a “New American” BBQ.

What We Need & What You Get

We are looking to raise $6,000 for production, marketing and product development costs. 

Your support deserves amazing perks:

$50 or greater: 1 Bottle of sauce and 1 all purpose rub

$100 or greater: 1 Bottle of sauce, 1 all purpose rub and 1 CS T-Shirt for

$250 or greater: 3 bottle sauce variety pack, 1 all purpose rub and 1 CS Hoodie

$500 or greater: 3 bottle sauce variety pack, 1 all purpose rub, 1 CS T-Shirt and 1 CS Hoody

$750 or greater: Virtual BBQ trim class (3 sauce variety pack and 1 all purpose rub)

$1000 or greater: Virtual "How to create a BBQ Competition Presentation Box" and BBQ trim Class (3 sauce variety pack and 1 all purpose rub)

The Impact

For a growing business, raising capital can be a challenge. Your support will help to make this project a success.

Other Ways You Can Help

Here's how else you can help:

  • Help spread the word. Share this campaign with everyone you know. The more people who view our campaign the better, the more likely we'll find people who can back it.
  • Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/chartersmokebbq
  • Like us on Instagram: www.instagram.com/chartersmokebbq/

Thank you to everyone who is able to contribute in some way.

story:
Albi is a smart wine dispenser that uses the latest preservation technologies to serve you the perfect glass of any wine up to 6 months after opening the bottle.

 

 

 

Once you uncork the bottle, your wine starts losing its flavor, aroma, and taste. This is due to oxidation. This chemical reaction happens when air gets in contact with the liquor and immediately starts ruining it.

As a result, you throw away the bottle with the leftover wine, which is already past its best.

 

 

 Albi uses Smart Bags & proprietary technology to preserve your wine for  up to 6 months after uncorking the bottle. This is 8x longer than any other existing technology!

Wine lovers, rejoice! Now you can open any of your treasured valuable wines without worrying to waste them. The taste intended by winemakers is waiting for you to savor.

 

Drink your wine at the optimal temperature to reveal the wealth of its unique aromas and flavors.

 

 

 

Thanks to its multi-layer structure, the Smart Bag blocks the passage of UV rays and oxygen into your wine and prevents its oxidation up to 6 months. It also has an NFC label, which allows Albi to recognize your wine and adjust it to its optimal temperature.

 

Multilayer Protection

It keeps the wine safe from oxygen and UV rays by blocking the wine oxidation and preserving it up to 6 months.

 

Wine Detection Function

With the NFC tag included in the label, Albi recognizes your wine and brings it to an ideal temperature.

 

One Way Taps

These taps are specially designed to let the wine out and block the entry of oxygen.

 

Flexible Like Your Wine

It always takes the shape of the remaining wine, allowing no space for the contact between wine and air.

 

Eco Friendly

Each part of the packaging is 100% recyclable.

 

 

 

Use your own wine

POURED SMART WINE BAG

Rediscover your wine collection. Time to open the treasured bottle and discover the taste as intended by winemakers, without wasting a drop.

  • Step 1. Take any wine bottle and pour it into the Smart Bag
  • Step 2. Select your wine from Albi’s huge database, or add your own with the app
  • Step 3. Let Albi automatically detect your wine and set it to the perfect temperature

Take a glass and enjoy!

 

Order from Albi's exclusive collection

SEALED SMART WINE BAG

Explore new tastes with our list of hand-picked wines. Your one-stop-shop to the wealth of exclusive and unique world’s flavors.

  • Step 1. Choose from 200+ wineries available for order
  • Step 2. Get pre-filled Smart Bags delivered right to your door
  • Step 3. Let Albi automatically detect your wine and set it to the perfect temperature

Take a glass and enjoy!

 

 

Pouring the wine from your bottle into the Smart Bag is super easy! Simply uncork the bottle and pour it into your Smart Bag through the one-way tap. Now nothing will change your wine’s taste!

 

 

With the compact Smart Bags, you can store many wines at once with no waste! Store them in your fridge and whenever you want a perfect glass, easily take out the Smart Bag placed in your Albi and replace it with the one you want to enjoy at an ideal temperature!

 

 

Made of 100% recyclable and BPA-free packaging, the Smart Bags are washable, durable and lighter. Unlike traditional glass bottles, they reduce carbon footprint by 40% and are 90% lighter.

  • 80% less waste than wine bottles
  • 33% less volume than glass bottles
  • 20% energy savings during the transport of wine
  • 90% energy savings during the transport of packaging only

 

 

 

  • Ask your home assistant to pour you a glass of wine
  • Use the Albi app to pour the wine
  • Press the button on the top of Albi

 

 

The Albi app is easy to use and allows you to make the most of your Smart Wine Dispenser. Manage your wine cellar right from the coach, get useful recommendations, set the temperature for your wine, browse new wines or go place an order at a single touch.

 

Set Your Ideal Wine Temperature

If you have a special temperature preference for your wine, you can easily set it through the app. You can even set the temperature while away to have the perfect glass ready for you once you return after a busy day.

 

World Famous Wine At Your Fingertips

Order from 200+ world-famous wine brands through our app or use the Albi Smart Wine Bags to store your own wine. Once you’ve placed your order, we will ship the wine directly to your door, in pre-filled Smart Wine Bags.

 

Learn More About Albi Wine Selection

Our app gives you all the details you need to know about your favorite wine. Learn everything from the alcohol percentage of your wine and its food pairing to the type of grape used, the ideal temperature recommended for it and much more.

 

 

Albi works with your home assistants, which makes it the smartest wine dispenser in the market. Ask it to pour you a glass or recommend the wines in Smart Bags that are about to finish or are nearing the end of 6-month preservation. Only make sure to say ‘please’!

 

Take portable Albi with you wherever the fun requires a perfect glass. Now the barbecue party in your backyard, picnic with your family in a park or your short vacation in a villa will have a totally different flavor!

 

Albi has parental control features that allow you to lock your wine dispenser from the app so that your children can't use it when you are not there.

 

Enrich your home interior with a touch of elegance and functionality. A preserving system and a wine chiller with the most compact design on the market. Bringing elegance to any room it is placed in, Albicchiere is perfect for any situation that calls for wine. With an elegant design, Albi can make your kitchen modern and add a sense of dignity and class. It stands out enough to catch the eye and be a conversation centerpiece while hardly taking up any space.

 

 

 

Albi comes with covers of different colors. If you get bored with your Albi’s color, simply replace it with another one in only 5 seconds. Now you can enjoy new Albi every day!

 

 

 

 

Albi is the perfect wine dispenser for your business. Preserve leftover wine and sell it till the last drop, serving each glass at a perfect temperature. Know everything about your customers and business needs through lifelong marketing data and in-depth analytics.

 

Albi for Hotels, Bars & Restaurants

Give your customers a memorable experience. Leave them speechless by serving them a glass at the perfect temperature. Click here for more information. Increase your revenue without wasting a drop.

For more info on using Albi at your hotel, Restaurant or Bar click here.

 

Albi for Wineries

Take your wine to the next level. Enhance your brand perception with a perfectly preserved glass of wine. Click here for more information.

For more info on using Albi at your winery click here.

 

 

Currently, we are actively working in all directions to turn Albi into the exact wine dispenser you would like to have at home. The first prototype is already ready, making us a step closer to our production. Besides, our campaign has passed the Arrow Certification Program run by Arrows, a $29.7B global technology company providing expertise to entrepreneurs so they can successfully design and produce their product. This certification guarantees that the company reviewed Albi’s electronic and software design and verified that it is feasible for manufacturing. All the components necessary for manufacturing Albi are already available and our engineering team working very hard to deliver the final product according to the scheduled timeline.

 

 

We ship worldwide! But, as you know, shipping costs vary by country, so before backing please check out the reward for details on the shipping cost that applies to you. Also please note that costs like VAT, GST, duties, taxes, etc. are not included in the perk pre-order price and are covered by backers on delivery, according to the amount determined by the given country. 

 

Lockdown has affected almost any business, including our company. Nevertheless, we continue working hard. To make the process more transparent and predictable for you, we will keep you updated on all the developments in detail. 

 

By backing now, you’ll get to own one of the smartest wine dispensers on the market and a new way to enjoy the unique flavor of your wine. What’s more, you’ll join our community of wine enthusiasts and provide your valuable feedback to shape future generations of Albi.
story_txt:
Albi is a smart wine dispenser that uses the latest preservation technologies to serve you the perfect glass of any wine up to 6 months after opening the bottle.   Once you uncork the bottle, your wine starts losing its flavor, aroma, and taste. This is due to oxidation. This chemical reaction happens when air gets in contact with the liquor and immediately starts ruining it.As a result, you throw away the bottle with the leftover wine, which is already past its best.   Albi uses Smart Bags & proprietary technology to preserve your wine for  up to 6 months after uncorking the bottle. This is 8x longer than any other existing technology!Wine lovers, rejoice! Now you can open any of your treasured valuable wines without worrying to waste them. The taste intended by winemakers is waiting for you to savor. Drink your wine at the optimal temperature to reveal the wealth of its unique aromas and flavors.   Thanks to its multi-layer structure, the Smart Bag blocks the passage of UV rays and oxygen into your wine and prevents its oxidation up to 6 months. It also has an NFC label, which allows Albi to recognize your wine and adjust it to its optimal temperature. Multilayer ProtectionIt keeps the wine safe from oxygen and UV rays by blocking the wine oxidation and preserving it up to 6 months. Wine Detection FunctionWith the NFC tag included in the label, Albi recognizes your wine and brings it to an ideal temperature. One Way TapsThese taps are specially designed to let the wine out and block the entry of oxygen. Flexible Like Your WineIt always takes the shape of the remaining wine, allowing no space for the contact between wine and air. Eco FriendlyEach part of the packaging is 100% recyclable.   Use your own winePOURED SMART WINE BAGRediscover your wine collection. Time to open the treasured bottle and discover the taste as intended by winemakers, without wasting a drop.

Step 2. Select your wine from Albi’s huge database, or add your own with the app
Step 3. Let Albi automatically detect your wine and set it to the perfect temperature

Step 1. Choose from 200+ wineries available for order
Step 2. Get pre-filled Smart Bags delivered right to your door
Step 3. Let Albi automatically detect your wine and set it to the perfect temperature
Take a glass and enjoy!  Pouring the wine from your bottle into the Smart Bag is super easy! Simply uncork the bottle and pour it into your Smart Bag through the one-way tap. Now nothing will change your wine’s taste!  With the compact Smart Bags, you can store many wines at once with no waste! Store them in your fridge and whenever you want a perfect glass, easily take out the Smart Bag placed in your Albi and replace it with the one you want to enjoy at an ideal temperature!  Made of 100% recyclable and BPA-free packaging, the Smart Bags are washable, durable and lighter. Unlike traditional glass bottles, they reduce carbon footprint by 40% and are 90% lighter.
80% less waste than wine bottles
33% less volume than glass bottles
20% energy savings during the transport of wine
90% energy savings during the transport of packaging only
   
Ask your home assistant to pour you a glass of wine
Use the Albi app to pour the wine
Press the button on the top of Albi

Once you’ve placed your order, we will ship the wine directly to your door, in pre-filled Smart Wine Bags. Learn More About Albi Wine SelectionOur app gives you all the details you need to know about your favorite wine. Learn everything from the alcohol percentage of your wine and its food pairing to the type of grape used, the ideal temperature recommended for it and much more.  Albi works with your home assistants, which makes it the smartest wine dispenser in the market. story:
Short Summary

We thank you all who have supported our project.

I am Hope Kemirembe the leader of the project.The project is based in rural area of Kabale  District.

The project was started by we the women peasants in Mparo Parish,Rwamucucu Sub-county Rukiga-Kabale in South western Uganda.

The purpose of the project is to make sure the indigenous good seeds which reproduce good seeds are not made to diminish by the organizations promoting and selling genetically modified seeds which cannot produce seeds but make the peasant continue buying seeds every time of planting.

It also serves as source of food for the participants as well as selling extra as an income generating project

It also helps directly and indirectly promotes plant food against people destroying animals as source of food.

We also use natural organic farmyard manure AND ALSO FERTILIZERS OF OUR  OWN INNOVATION that does not contain chemicals and which improves soils.

What We Need & What You Get

20 kilograms of seeds yield approximately 100 kilogrammes on harvesting.

Bean seeds cost Uganda Shs 3000/- per kilogram while Maize seeds cost Uganda Shs 2000/- per kilogram

20 Kgs of Bean seeds cost Uganda Shs 60,000/- while 20 kgs Maize seeds cost 40,000/- .Totaling to Uganda Shillings 100,000/- (One hundred thousands).This makes the package for  one woman.

We wish to increase the number of SEND A SEED members by 40 thus having a sixty women members  which will enable them multiply the seeds quickly on harvesting and giving the same amount of seeds each woman to another woman who then joins the group.

To provide such an amount to 40 women peasants

40x 100,000/- = 4,000,000/= (Uganda Shillings Four millions)

Equivalent to Euros 1000

We raised Euros 420 from the previous campaign. We are receiving Euros  360.

So we need  Euros 640 Equivalent to British Pound Sterling 510

This is the amount we are fundraising for.

The Impact

We started with bean and maize seeds in that once a home has a good harvest of these two seeds it can have a reasonable diet source and food security. Especially so in times like this during the COVID-19 pandemic where nutritious food is key to survive the virus.

With SEND A SEED. The women peasants, who are provided seeds, grow them and on harvesting they provide the same amount of seeds that they were given, to another woman peasant each. Then use the remaining as seeds and some as for food and extra sold for income to cater for other basic needs of the families.Hence the name SEND A SEED.

Risks & Challenges

So in September 2018 we started the project as three women .Now we have grown in number to 20.Had it not been the break out of COVID-19 pandemic we could by now have even reached 40 but because of the COVID-19 we had last year to share most of the seeds with others living in town who were under lock-down and had no source of food as the promised food from Government was not provided. Also unlike in the past where we would work as a group and attend a single member's garden to completion before we could go to another one's garden,now with the break out of COVID-19 and social distance being one of the measures to take to avoid contracting and spreading COVID-19,each member attend her garden separately.We don't have tractors which could easy the digging work. Also our land is fragmented,so we move from garden to garden several kilometeres of distances apart.

All in all our determination coupled by support locally and international makes the project keep moving.

Other Ways You Can Help

Contribute Using the Back it Button on the fundraising page.We welcome any amount one can afford to contribute.If you may not be able to contribute;help and spread the word about our this campaign using the indiegogo share tools and any other means at your disposal.

Contact me through:  Tel +256789434106

                                    E-Mail: hopekemirembe4@gmail.com

                                    Facebook: https://facebook.com/hope.kemirembemoreen

NEW: This campaign is remaining with less than 2 days to close.

Help make it happen by contributing to it.

THANK YOU

story:
A Café for BS

A couple of years ago, the small, private coffee shops in Blue Springs began closing or changing ownership. We realized Tammy was no longer going to have anywhere to write and our weekly coffee dates were being relegated to bigger chain shops.

So one day, we thought, why not start up our own? Tammy would do the baking and we could bring good, Kansas City-area coffees to town. Barry has always wanted to cook, so he could stretch his culinary muscles as well. If we’re going to do this mid-life crisis thing, let’s do it right! Thus, Le Café Bleu was born.

We wanted to be downtown, in the heart of the community, and be part of the growth we hope will come to Main Street. It took a while, but we found a place to set up shop. We’ll be serving coffee, local beer and wine all day; pastries in the morning, sandwiches and soups at lunch and small plates during happy hour.

Our goal is to bring as much of KC to BS as we can. We will be highlighting local roasters like Blip and Thou Mayest. We’ll be working with area farmers as much as possible and the menu items will change frequently, as their harvests/offerings do. 

So please, come join us in our adventure! See below how you can help get us up, running and on track for success.

What We Need & What You Get

We are trying to raise $10,000 for Le Café Bleu in the next three-four weeks. The funds will go toward final expenses as we get up and running.  

We are offering a number of tiers so people can donate whatever they are comfortable with. For each donation point we are offering food and merchandise from the café.

$20 Simply because you love us.

$25 You’ll receive a Le Café Bleu to-go coffee mug and free drip coffee for a month.

$35 You’ll receive 1 food and 1 drink token good for anything on our menu.

$50 You’ll receive a Le Café Bleu t-shirt, a Le Café Bleu to-go mug, and free drip coffee for a month.

$75 You’ll receive 2 food and 2 drink tokens good for anything on our menu.

$100 You’ll receive a Le Café Bleu ball cap, a membership card granting you $1 off your first drink every time you come in for 6 months, and 2 food tokens good for any item on our menu.

$150 Afternoon tea party for four.

$150 Coffee Lovers! This level will get you a 12 oz. bag of our seasonal coffee every quarter for a year (4 bags total), a Le Café Bleu to-go coffee mug, and a membership card granting you $1 off your first drink for 6 months

$200 You’ll receive a Le Café Bleu t-shirt, a Le Café Bleu Ball cap, a 12 oz. bag of coffee, 2 food and 2 drink tokens, and a membership card granting you $1 off your first drink every time you come in for 6 months.

$400 Tasting menu/dinner for 4 people.

Other Ways You Can Help                    

It’s the holidays and not everyone has extra to contribute to our campaign. But you can still help our cause! If you know anyone else who might want to take part in the campaign, forward the information to them. Please like and share our Facebook posts so everyone knows what we are up to. And finally, come see us when we open. We look forward to sharing our creations with everyone as we move into a wonderful new year and kiss 2020 au revoir for good!

story:
Siki's Roastery…

Just saying these words out loud already brings goosebumps to me, Sikelela Dibela, owner of Siki's Koffee Kafe. After the 5 year anniversary of my business, a big milestone, it’s time for the next step.

When the pandemic started, I went in survival mode like most entrepreneurs, using my creativity and perseverance to get my business through this tough time. And I did, mostly because I managed to grow my local customer base significantly prior to covid, which made me less dependent on tourists visiting. But survival is not what I am here for. My journey has only just started and to grow my impact on the coffee culture and community in Khayelitsha, I need to take the next step. Not only brewing great quality coffee, but also roasting the beans. YES, IT’S TIME FOR SIKI'S ROASTERY!

 

Why a roastery?

  • Independence - Being able to roast my own beans, allows me to become more independent and share my vision on coffee as well as an opportunity to scale.
  • Education - By adding a roastery to my coffee shop, I aim to educate young talented people of Khayelitsha in the world of coffee but also inspire them in terms of creativity and entrepreneurship.
  • Employment - Scaling my business in the heart of Khayelitsha means I will be able to hire more talents from the community.
  • Empowerment - Of myself, co-entrepreneurs, creatives and the community by being an example of what is possible here, by enabling conversation in my space, by giving talents opportunities to grow.
  • Sustainability - Siki's Roastery will stand for sustainable quality coffee made with the creative and entrepreneurial spirits of Khayelitsha.
  • Transparency - Not just one blend, but multiple sustainable single origins with a transparent value chain, all the way up to the African farmer.

 

Funding need

To set up the roastery, a substantial initial capital investment is required. The main portion of this investment is for the roasting machine and sourcing the green beans. I have already secured part of the required investment, but I need all the support I can get to realise my dream. The crowdfunding target is based on an extensive business case. Please find below more details on how we got to this. I believe it's possible to reach this target. But it’s not going to be easy. All support is welcome, small or large, whatever you can or are willing to spend. By investing in Siki's Roastery, you are also investing in a better Khayelitsha and South Africa. I believe in the future of Khayelitsha. I believe change is coming and I invite you to join us and become part of this change.

 

Funding goal breakdown

I would like to be transparent in how we got to the funding goal of €13.000 (R225,000).  The aim is that all costs for year 1 will be covered by investments. Please see the breakdown below.

Total estimated costs Y1: €21.565 (R366.700):

  • Roasting machine and additional equipment   - €7.290 (R124.000)
  • Salaries - €5.090 (R86.500)
  • Materials (beans and packaging)  - €7.350 (R125.000)
  • Logistics - €1.835 (R31.200)

About 55% will need to come from this crowdfunding campaign.  We also need to include Indiegogo & processing fees (8-10%). That's how we got to €13.000.

story:
We Need Help Expanding to Your City 

We've created a beta mode website, curated over 200 reviews in two major cities, and established partnerships with a growing community of social media food influencers— and we need you to help us keep going. 

We Bring Social Equity to Hospitality 

Urbanoire brings visibility to eateries where all patrons feel safe and valued and amplifies minority-owned businesses. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help. You can: 

  • Get the word out and make some noise about Urbanoire
  • Share with friends on your social media

 

Thank you for taking the time to check out the Urbanoire campaign! 

Sincerely, 

Naomi D. 

CEO
story_txt:
We Need Help Expanding to Your City 
We've created a beta mode website, curated over 200 reviews in two major cities, and established partnerships with a growing community of social media food influencers— and we need you to help us keep going. 

We Bring Social Equity to Hospitality 
Urbanoire brings visibility to eateries where all patrons feel safe and valued and amplifies minority-owned businesses. 

Other Ways You Can Help
Even if you can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help. You can: 

Get the word out and make some noise about Urbanoire
Share with friends on your social media

 
Thank you for taking the time to check out the Urbanoire campaign! Sincerely, Naomi D. CEO

story:
The Boroughs Brewing History 

For those of you that know us well, I'm sure you've heard bits and parts (or all) of this story at some point. For those who haven't, or for those that need a refresher, feel free to educate yourselves on Boroughs history. If you're not interested in that stuff then skip down to all the swag that you can get for yourself!

Greg and Josh first got to know each other as they were lowly employees at the Brooklyn CVS. Shortly after, we became roommates in Willimantic as we were both enrolled at ECSU. In our free time we were huge supporters of beer, but were never satisfied with the generic stuff we were surrounded by.  We wanted something different, something more satisfying, something with flavor. A few beers that come to mind from our college days are Killians irish red, Magic Hat #9, Sam Summer Ale, etc. We were always searching for the next new thing in the beer world, and the rest is history.

Yikes, Greg without weight and Josh with hair! An oldie but a goodie. 

After college, we went our own separate ways as is usually the case. I quickly took to homebrewing with a couple different brew kits. After a few years, we had both moved back to our hometown of Danielson, and I invited Josh over for a brew day. We brewed our first beer together in 2017 and Josh was immediately hooked as well. Since that day, we have brewed religiously every weekend or every other weekend for the past 4 years or so. 

We wasted no time in sharing our beer with family, friends, friends of friends, co-workers, strangers, you get it; literally everyone that was willing to drink a beer, we were putting a bottle of our stuff in their hands. We are both humble people so gathering as much constructive criticism as possible was exciting to us. This allowed us to determine which recipes were fan favorites or which recipes needed some tweaking.

Eventually, that model of feedback wasn't enough for us and we started entering into local and not so local BJCP sanctioned competitions. We entered 13 beers into competitions from 2018 through the first couple months of 2020 (seriously, screw you Covid). In that short time frame, we took home 7 awards from those 13 entries. This is when we felt fully validated that the product we were making was legit. 

It's been a long road filled with set backs and hurdles galore, but here we still stand, pushing forward towards our dream. 

 

Why you matter!

As some of you already know, we will be moving into Black Pond Brewing's current location of 21A Furnace Street, as soon as they are able to fully move into their new facility. We have already gotten our federal TTB license approved, and the Town of Killingly has already signed off on their portion of our state application. The next step for us is to submit the state application and wait for them to do their thing. However this process can take months and this will be the final hurdle before we can open our doors to the public. 

We have used our personal finances to acquire a 3.5 BBL brewing system along with three 3.5 BBL stainless steel fermenters, along with several other pieces of equipment. We will be purchasing some supplies from Black Pond and are essentially moving into a turn-key brewing operation.

Road trip to Western Pennsylvania netted us these two beauties.

Only had to drive down to Niantic for this beast 

Also, we have acquired funding from the Town of Killingly that is allocated to new businesses in the downtown area. All of the steps taken by us were done in a meticulous manner to avoid extravagant startup costs because nobody enjoys crippling debt, right? Well, we are no different!

So why are we turning to all of our friends, family, supporters, and possible newcomers now? We want to create a space where you won't see Black Pond Brews when you walk into our taproom. We want you to see The Boroughs Brewing Company. Well, when we put our budget together for the Town of Killingly, it was before the great lumber and material shortage of 2021 (no really, Covid.. you've overstayed your welcome). The cost of renovations we will be performing on the taproom, are now starting to significantly eat into our working capital. 

We're asking you to help us out with funding so we can more comfortably handle any random situation that may pop up between now and when our doors open. That could involve buying brewing materials, paying for rent, or just holding onto as a break glass in case of emergency fund. Either way, what's important to us is that we make sure our bases are covered at all times so we can avoid getting blindsided with any potential bad news. Also, if you could spread the word about our brewery and the crowdfunding campaign, it would be greatly appreciated!

 

What you get!

Now that we've talked about ourselves long enough, let's move onto what you can get out of all of this. We will be including 2 Boroughs Brewing coasters with every prize awarded and an invitation to a special event for all of our supporters. At this event, we will have our 2019 Harmonies and Hops brew fest banner and we'll ask everyone to sign their names. After we open fully, the banner with signatures of our supporters, will be framed and hung in the taproom for all to see!

Our first brew fest banner with our original logo could be signed by you and put on display for everyone to see!

 

Simple Donation

Not a fan of any of the merch available, but still want to help support us? No problem! Here's a way to support us with no strings attached. When you pop in for a beer we can thank you with a hand shake, elbow bump, hug, or whatever you feel comfortable with. We're just thrilled you're willing to help us out. 

 

20 Ounce Libbey Pub glass

Most breweries provide a 12 or 16 ounce tulip glass and we will have those options, but we wanted to give you the opportunity to have something different. It's a bigger version of our default glassware with our logo!

 

Boroughs Brewing T-Shirt

This unisex T-shirt is a cotton/poly blend. It's soft, comfy, and allows you to rep Danielson's newest brewery! If you purchase this, we will coordinate with you on what size T-shirt you'd like.

 

Drink Voucher

Not a fan of the merch available yet you still want something from us? Pay ahead for your first tab (or two) once we're open!

 

Boroughs Brewing 20 oz tumbler

We already have our own customized tumblers and they are fantastic. Keep your drinks ice cold in the summer! If you purchase this, we will coordinate with you on what color you would like your tumbler to be. 

 

Boroughs Brewing Hoodie

It's New England  and sweater weather is on the way. Keep warm with this Boroughs Brewing hoodie! If you purchase this, we will coordinate with you on what size hoodie you'd like.

 

Name a Fermenter

We have 4 fermenters that are ready for names. By choosing this perk, you will be able to name one of them (as long as it's deemed appropriate of course). This name will be displayed on the front of the fermenter and will be used for documentation purposes. You'll also receive a T-shirt, Hoodie, and 20 ounce Libbey Pub Glass, and drink voucher!

 

Lifetime Mug Club Member

Alright here's the big one. By buying this perk you will have a 16 ounce dimpled Oktoberfest glass mug waiting for you and only you in our taproom with your own personal engraving. If you purchase this, we will coordinate with you so you get to choose what your mug will say in the font you request. You will receive a 15% discount on all purchases from us forever! You'll also receive a T-shirt, Hoodie, 20 ounce Libbey Pub Glass, 20 ounce tumbler, and drink voucher!

story:
What is Sewell Sweets?

Sewell Sweets Artisan Cakes was previously a custom-order-only cake shop run from a private licensed kitchen, but that's all about to change with the opening of a bakery storefront! Cat, the one woman who has run the show, has had her heart set on opening a storefront from the young age of 13 and it's never wavered. It all started with small orders and kid's birthday cakes, then grew to high end wedding cakes and hand made sugar flowers.  Sewell Sweets has become known around the PDX metro area for high end wedding cakes in the last several years. With a storefront though, Cat will be able to continue making gorgeous wedding cakes, but also once again she'll be able to create birthday cakes and now small treats to fill the bakery cases with, too. Her hope is that every day can feel a little more like a high end celebration for everyone who comes in the shop!

 

Funding Needs

Sewell Sweets needs your help to raise funds to open! Cat has been buying and storing a few pieces of large equipment over the years already, like a big 20 qt. Hobart mixer, a fondant sheeter, and most recently even a commercial bakery oven. There is still about $25,000 of bakery equipment and small wares needed such as refrigerators, freezers, food cases, work tops, coffee machines, and the like. There's also going to be construction costs within the space that we are in negotiations with right now to get everything plumbed, hooked up, and ready for customers. All funds raised will go directly to purchasing equipment, outfitting the space, and if by chance we raise more than that covers, the rest will go to buying starting ingredients and packaging to make all of the delicious goods! If we don't reach our goal, the funds raised will still go towards buying equipment. If we don't raise enough funds to get into the specific storefront we're working with right now in downtown Salem, we will use the funds to get into a different storefront. Regardless, this dream is happening people!

 

Our Perks

We are so grateful for all of your generosity and help in bringing this dream to reality and we're thrilled to offer the following perks along with our biggest heartfelt thank you!

Your Name on our Grand Opening Banner - Forever publicly thanked and remembered...in black permanent marker, of course!

Baby Cake - Mini Cakes in a variety of flavors. Pick up from Domestic Location in Salem, OR at the end of August, 2021. Yum!

A Baker's Dozen Cookie Punch Card - 13 free cookies, one per visit! 

A Candle and 1 Free Case Item Coupon - A locally made 8 oz candle from Jacobs Ladder Craft in your choice of scent options: White Tea & Berries, Spiced Honey & Tonka, or Mango & Coconut Milk. Bring in that coupon for a free treat!

A Specialty Blend of Loose Leaf Tea and 1 Free Case Item Coupon - Your choice of a specialty blended loose leaf tea from local tea company, Cup of Tea, in either caffeinated Lavender Rose (white tea, white peony, rose, lavender) or caffeine-free Sweet Dreams (apple, silver linden tree blossoms, lemon balm, lavender, rose, sweet blackberry leaves, orange blossoms, mallow blossoms). Bring in that coupon for a free treat!

A Custom Made Sewell Sweets Coffee Mug, 30 days Free Drip Coffee, and 1 Free Case Item Coupon - Come fill up your mug for FREE for the first month that our storefront is open and then keep your mug forever as a reminder of how you helped make dreams come true! Bring in that coupon for a free treat!

Treat of the Month Coupon - Say What?! 1 FREE single serving treat, of your choice, every single month for a YEAR! Just come on into the bakery and bring your punch card with you to claim!

Date Night for Two - Bring your sweetie to the storefront after hours for a private, romantic, dessert date complete with SO MANY fancy mini treats and dessert flights (and a to-go box if your eyes are bigger than your tummy...)! An experience like no other! *Sewell Sweets supports love for all so please know that you and your loved one are safe here!* The sweetest proposal idea anyone?! 

Custom Created Cake Flavor based on YOUR favs, named after YOU,  taster cake, and a birthday cake in YOUR flavor in 2022 - That's right, we'll work together to find out all about your sweet tooth and custom create a flavor just for you! You'll get a mini cake once the flavor is perfected, for your stamp of approval of course, and then it's time for you to get creative with naming the cake flavor. You'll also receive a 6" cake in your flavor for your 2022 birthday. Limited to 1! 

1 on 1 Private Cake Class - Three hours of Cat Sewell's time to teach you all the tips and tricks of filling cake layers, frosting the outside of a cake, and then covering that cake in sugar paste (fondant, but scratch made and better!) the Sewell Sweets' way. Take your cake home! Limited to 10!

A Private Sugar Flower Class for 3 people - Grab your two besties and tell me what flower you want me to teach you! You three will get two hours of Cat Sewell's time to learn all the tips and tricks to create that sugar flower. Limited to 6!

A Private Sugar Rose Class for 10 people - Up to ten people will have a private class for three hours to learn how to make Cat Sewell's signature Sugar Rose. Great for ladies' night out, your creative staff party, or the birthday party of a future foodie's dreams! Limited to 5!

 

All perks will need to be picked up from the bakery storefront and we suggest doing so ASAP after opening so that you can enjoy them for the longest amount of time possible! All perks, tangible or otherwise, expire 12/31/22. Please contact us directly with any questions at Cake@SewellSweets.com

 

The Extra Fluff -

Sugar, flour, butter, vanilla...sure, they're great starting points for any recipe but they mean a lot more to Cat than just ingredients. Cake has allowed Cat to connect with people over the years, to find her calling, her happy place, and her way to make a difference in people's lives with her edible art. For years Sewell Sweets has been a successful tiny business but has had to share Cat with raising kids, full time jobs, and the daily life of a wife and mother. It's time for Sewell Sweets to come to the forefront now! Sewell Sweets will be a beautiful space for the community to enjoy each other, to celebrate the big and small milestones, and to see dreams happening! The storefront will be a place to get a great cup of drip coffee, an espresso drink, or quality brewed cup of tea, there will be oodles of goodies to choose from in the bakery cases such as cookies, tarts, cupcakes, and Sewell Sweets' unique cake flavors by the slice or whole, as well as ordering your birthday, all occasion, or wedding cakes! Come sit on our pink comfy couches and soak in our dream space! Cat and her family have always been big supporters of shopping small and local and they are ecstatic to get to do so once again with a local downtown Salem storefront of their own, outfitted with Salem bought equipment, and hired hands to help. Sewell Sweets believes small businesses can do big things!  

 

Risks & Challenges

Money! That's our biggest hardship right now and for a small business, it's a giant one. Our seed money was supposed to be our profit from the 2020 wedding season. We were lined up with our biggest year ahead of us full of incredible wedding cakes, but Covid-19 took that all away from us. All of our 2020 weddings were cancelled, and with them, our seed money was gone. About half of those weddings never ended up happening as couples decided to elope and do small private weddings instead, and the remaining weddings were rescheduled over the next 2 years and all but one haven't even happened yet. But here we are, ready to open up shop, and now we need help with the funding. Bakery equipment is very expensive. It's designed to last for years of daily use, so once we get ours, it will take us far. We have applications out with the SBA and other sources for small business loans, and we have our personal money invested as well. None of this will compare with the help that you, the general public, can offer us, and none of it will mean quite the same as yours will!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Share this campaign so that anyone who is able can help us out. Every penny really does add up and mean the world to our dream!

Like, follow, and share our social media pages! We’re on Instagram (@sewellsweets) and Facebook (Sewell Sweets). www.SewellSweets.com

Talk to your friends, family, and community about our business and make plans to visit us once we open!

story:
Hi Crowd,  we’re back. At your request Crowd Cookware proudly presents:

 

What if you could cook with rock-solid cast iron without heavy lifting or burning your hands, on any heat source? The Buccaneer is a carefully designed, lightweight cast iron pan for everyday use. Equipped with our redesigned honeycomb pattern for the perfect non-stick cooking experience, and a handle that remains cool whatever your heat source. All for a fair price.

Just as strong as traditional cast iron, but 50% lighter thanks to the pressed casting innovation technique. The Buccaneer is produced through pressed casting, allowing more pressure compared to traditional sand casting. 

This ensures thinner walls and 50% less weight than a traditional cast iron skillet without compromising on performance. 

The handle of the Buccaneer was originally created for the Blackbeard frying pan, one of our previous campaigns. Now we’ve perfected it on every single detail with our crowd, but it will still match your collection. It’s made of full cast stainless steel, riveted and optimized for the best grip. Thanks to the well-thought-out thin attachment to the pan, burned hands or tinkering with potholders is history!  

 

Since the Buccaneer is made from cast iron, it can be used on all heat sources including gas, induction, ceramic and electric. It can even be put in the oven or on the barbeque.

Our honeycomb pattern ensures better substance distribution, which enlarges the cooking area, even with a little oil or butter. This creates the perfect non-stick cooking experience, as well as our famous Crowd Cookware stamp.

Due to its weight, the pan is easy to hold and perfect for everyday use. Whether you're a meat lover, a fulltime vegetarian or just love all food, you can cook the most delicious dishes in your Buccaneer. Bonus? Super easy to clean and dishwasher safe.

In just over 2 years, Crowd Cookware evolved into a worldwide community of kitchen enthousiasts creating their own chef-grade cookware for a fair price.

Thanks to frequent feedback moments, we come up with new products together, such as the Blackbeard pan set, the Wigbold knife set and now the Buccaneer.

Creating cookware with our crowd is all about translating feedback into new products or actual changes to the final designs. We believe this is the only way to create great cookware together.

 

 

This is what we’re proud of and at the same time, these are our three promises to you. 

Because we create our chef-grade cookware at the request of the crowd, develop our products together and kickstart with a crowd of thousands of backers, we can put top-notch factories to work on our own terms. So only by working together with you guys, we’re able to deliver chef-grade cookware for a fair price. Thank you so much!

Shipping costs will be charged when you pledge for your order. We have calculated the shipping costs as cheaply as possible and will do our best to get your Buccaneer to you as fast as possible!

 

Tacco Marijnen - Captain of Crowd Cookware: YES WE PAN! On behalf of the team, thank you so much for your support! #staysafe #homechef

In just over 2 years, we brought Crowd Cookware to life together. And now we are ready to press that big "Go" button for production. Are you ready to back?! 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

Crowd Cookware’s Buccaneer is the fifth campaign we launch on Kickstarter and our 4th campaign on Indiegogo within 2 years. So far, we’ve managed to design, produce and deliver chef-grade cookware to our backers. All according to - and sometimes ahead of - schedule. We learned a lot and we’re taking this into consideration during our next adventure!

The Crowd Cookware Buccaneer is one of the newest requests received from our crowd. Similar to our knife set, the Wigbold and two earlier cookware campaigns, we’ve run a pilot production round with a manufacturer who meets our high-quality standards and produces skillets like ours on a large scale for premium brands. Our crowd tested the Buccaneer and now we have confirmation: the pans are ready for mass production. We’re good to go!

We will keep you posted
Although we’re doing everything we can to make sure our campaign runs smoothly, there are things that can go wrong that are beyond our control. Setbacks, such as delays at the port due to an overcrowded port, can always occur. However, our motto is: ‘for every problem there is a solution’. We’re ready to hack the industry together with you!

 

This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best crowdfunding projects with 1200+ successful projects with over $470MM raised between them.
