story:
AVENSI is a revolutionary coffee glassware line that combines the science and engineering from wine and spirit glasses with what was missing from coffee.

The result is a new category of coffee cup that not only has a beautiful iconic design but also keeps your coffee hot, hands cool, and enhances taste, aroma, and flavor like never before.

It's a new way to appreciate and experience your coffee.

 


So why drink your coffee from a mug that doesn’t reveal its full potential?

The ordinary ceramic mug is ancient—literally. Even the insulated metal mug was designed as a simple vessel—a means to an end for consuming coffee without any purpose or thought for enhancing the flavor or the drinking experience.  
 

 

Ordinary mugs (3000 BC) were not designed to focus aroma or enhance taste. Likewise, insulated mugs (1980 AD) conceal aroma and hinder taste due to the lid and small opening.

 

The wine and spirit industries have spent decades taking a scientific approach to creating the perfect glass shapes that improve taste, aroma, and flavor.  Connoisseurs of these drinks have figured out that the type of glass you serve it in can make or break the entire drinking experience—they consider their glasses the MOST important tool for the fullest appreciation of taste, aroma, and flavor.

 

The modern wine glass (1950 AD) and whiskey glass (2001 AD) are designed to allow the beverage to aerate and oxidize through swirling, which helps to volatilize the beautifully fragrant aromatics.

This is what inspired the AVENSI–a revolutionary glass that combines the science and engineering of wine and spirit glasses with what was missing from coffee. The result is a new category of coffee cup that allows you to taste and appreciate your coffee in a way never before possible. 
 


AVENSI transforms coffee drinking from quick consumption to an immersive experience.

It’s time for you to unlock a new way of enjoying coffee.

 


Before we tell you more about the AVENSI, it’s important to share how it became a reality.

Creating the world’s best coffee cup is no simple task.

We had a big vision: to change the way coffee is appreciated around the world. A vision this big could only be possible by working with the passionate coffee community from around the globe–people who love coffee and care about making it better. 

 

One of our many experiments to test our prototypes. This one with Gabriel Carol, 2x Romanian Brewers Cup Champion at Kohi Roastery in Bangkok

 

Collaboration is what guided our approach.  

We were very fortunate and grateful that there was such an outpouring of support for the project. Throughout the entire development process, over 90 coffee experts from 30 countries volunteered their time to offer their ideas and test our prototypes (and of course copious amounts of coffee were consumed).

Here are just some of the passionate coffee lovers who helped to bring the AVENSI glasses to life and make this new way of enjoying coffee possible! (For a bigger list of people we want to thank, see the section below called “by coffee lovers, for coffee lovers”) 
 


Here are what some of them had to say about the AVENSI:

 

 The AVENSI is a next generation coffee cup designed to maximize your coffee's taste, aroma, and flavor. 

A masterpiece in glass architecture that marries form and function, blending an interior scientific shape with a sleek exterior design. 

The unique anatomy features a single-wall top, fused with a double-wall base. This doesn’t only look aesthetically beautiful, it functionally allows you to appreciate your coffee’s full potential in a whole new way

Be the first to experience the world's first patent-pending, scientifically engineered coffee glass that will redefine your coffee ritual. 
 


 

The AVENSI has the most unique design for a coffee cup you’ll ever use. Inspired by nature, the glass architecture has gentle facets of a hexagon, which represents freedom and flow. In between sips, cradle the facets in your hand as a daily reminder to appreciate the moment and the brew you’ve crafted. 
 

Whether you prefer to savor the peaceful moment alone or enjoy sharing it with friends and family, the AVENSI coffee glasses will forever transform your coffee drinking experience. 
 

With 15 hidden features, the AVENSI is more than just a beautifully designed glass.  
 

Below we’ve highlighted 6 key features of the AVENSI that will redefine your coffee ritual.  
 

 Inspiring a revolution to change the way people appreciate coffee isn’t a small task—we knew we couldn’t do this alone. 

So we shared our ideas with the coffee community around the world and received an overwhelming outpouring of support. 

 Wine and spirit glasses are intentionally designed to alter variables that enhance your drinking experience. The most notable ones are: enhancing and amplifying aromas, directing liquid to specific locations of your mouth/tongue, speed and flow rate of liquid entering your mouth, and rate of aeration and oxidation which is controlled by the surface area exposed to air. 
 

By adjusting different elements of the glass architecture, such as glass shape, wall curvature, thickness, lip flare, rim diameter, bowl-to-rim ratio, and the overall volume (to name a few) they have been able to create optimal shapes for their glasses to enhance different flavor properties for the best drinking experience.  
 

We were surprised that although coffee is one of the most consumed drinks in the world (with some of the most beautifully diverse flavors of ANY drink) there hasn’t been innovation to create something that upgrades the coffee experience.

We saw what was missing from coffee cups, and took inspiration from wine and spirit glasses to create something that has never been done in the coffee world.  
 

The result? The AVENSI, a new generation of coffee cup. 
 

AVENSI is the world’s first coffee cup that allows you to do something no other cup can, its unique shape allows you to turn coffee drinking from quick consumption to an immersive experience through swirling.  


This unlocks 2 revolutionary flavor upgrades that will redefine how you taste and experience coffee:

 

Unlock these two new flavor upgrades: (1) flavor amplification & (2) flavor exploration.

Similar to wine and spirit glasses, swirling amplifies your coffee’s flavor through taste and aroma. 

90% of what we perceive as flavor comes from our sense of smell. To design a coffee glass that enhances flavor, it had to enhance aroma.

The AVENSI does this better than any other coffee cup.


 

The shape of the glass maximizes the surface area of your coffee when you swirl. This simple action isn’t just fun, swirling aerates and oxidizes your coffee revealing a spectrum of dormant aromas and flavors hiding in your brew that are normally lost in an ordinary mug.

The “Diffusion Chamber” captures the rich bouquet of aromas and delivers them to your mouth and nose. 
 

The shape of the glass is optimized to direct the flow of coffee perfectly onto your tongue. Similar to high end wine and spirit glasses, the AVENSI also has an ultra thin rim, which is 60% thinner than ordinary coffee cups. This maximizes the flow of coffee onto your tongue, immersing your palate with rich flavors in every sip.  


 

Each of the AVENSI Glasses (VIDA, SENTI, and ALTO) are also designed with unique rim architectures of different diameters and curvatures. Each shape was engineered and tested to direct the flow and spread of coffee onto specific areas of your tongue and palate, creating a unique tasting experience that will enhance your coffee’s flavor notes. 
 

Pair each glass by following our recommend flavor and roast pairings, or experiment and explore your coffee’s hidden flavors by drinking the same coffee in each of the AVENSI glasses.  


 

Flavor exploration is a special experience that most coffee drinkers haven’t yet had the chance to discover. 

It’s made possible by temperature control and temperature retention.

Coffee is a very unique drink because it exhibits deliciously different flavor profiles at different temperatures. As your coffee cools, there’s a brief window of time at each temperature where you can experience those unique flavor notes. 


 

In other words, at 65 degrees Celsius your coffee may taste like black tea and dark chocolate with hints of brown sugar, but at 45 degrees Celsius that same coffee may taste smooth and sweet, with hints of citrus and blueberry. 

But most people miss out on this experience. That’s because traditional mugs either cool your coffee too fast or keep it hot for too long. You have no control.

The AVENSI does something no other cup can: it turns coffee drinking into an active experience by allowing you to control the temperature through swirling. While the hybrid thermal wall retains your desired drinking temperature for longer.

This extends the window of time for the flavors you want to experience, and transforms a typical coffee drinking experience into an immersive ritual where you’ll enjoy discovering new flavors in every cup.  

Watch the video below to learn more about how swirling your coffee with the AVENSI will allow you to unlock your coffee’s full potential and give you a completely new way to experience your coffee’s flavors. 


 

As a coffee lover, you know the journey is just as important as the destination—and the AVENSI glasses will give you a whole new way to appreciate the entire adventure. 

The AVENSI Ritual is four simple steps that reconnect you with your senses and allow you to fully immerse yourself in the beautiful experience of enjoying your coffee.  


As we were developing the next generation of coffee glasses, we had our eyes set on creating the world’s best coffee cup. 

But made an interesting discovery along the way. 

Through all of our experiments between the various prototypes and iterations, there wasn’t just one glass that stood out as the ‘best’. There were 3 unique shapes that consistently emerged as top performers. 

 

Below is a summary of all three of the AVENSI glasses and their unique flavor enhancing properties. 

 

Like the AVENSI glasses, the Discovery Felt Coasters are inspired by the hexagon: one of nature’s most beautiful shapes. The design features a mesmerizing optical illusion that symbolizes the depth and complexity of coffee’s flavors. It’s a simple reminder to slow down and take a moment to appreciate your coffee—when we do this, there’s so much we can discover. 
 

 

You know the journey is just as important as the destination.

You’re drawn to discover new ways to stay ahead of the curve, and you always seem to find them.

This what brought you to coffee. You believe that coffee should be experienced, not just consumed.

You’re a Coffee Adventurer and, as an early supporter of the AVENSI glasses, we created this online masterclass video series just for you.

This online masterclass is all about the fun and adventure of exploring coffee. It will feature everything we’ve learned on our coffee journey to help you get the most out of your coffee experience. From brewing methods and best practices, to new gear and unique coffees, you’ll want to keep coming back to learn how to up your coffee game.

 

You enjoy novel experiences. You’re an explorer that likes trying new things and experimenting. 

We get that. So we've made it easy for you!

The AVENSI glassware line is all about the adventure of coffee and exploring the diverse flavors in every cup. To kick-start your adventure, we've assembled the best collection of beans to experiment with your new glasses. 

Complement your AVENSI glasses with our special offer: a unique coffee tasting experience - where we’ll ship you freshly roasted beans and explore coffee’s diverse flavor notes with you and your new glasses. 

We’ll choose 3 bags of beans (75g each) with distinctly different flavor notes that you can use to taste and explore the diverse flavors of coffee from around the world. Experience the full spectrum of flavors as you embark on your adventure with your AVENSI glassware set.

**Currently only available in the USA. We'd love to make this experience available to all our backers internationally, but shipping coffee beans internationally has its fair share of challenges. If there's enough demand in your region, we'll be able to make the Coffee Explorer's Experience available to you and the other backers in your area. We will be sending a survey to all our backers after the Indiegogo campaign ends to gauge demand and we’ll do our best to make this available in your region.    

 

The AVENSI glasses work with your favorite coffees and brew methods.

The philosophy behind the AVENSI is to elevate your appreciation for coffee by inspiring you to experiment with new coffees and brew methods, and explore the unique aromas, tastes, and flavors in your cup.

Coffee is an everyday adventure. Whether it’s enjoyed in a peaceful moment alone or shared with friends and family, the AVENSI is your perfect coffee companion on your journey of discovery. 

ICOSA Brewhouse is a small team with a big vision to change coffee. Founded by 3 coffee loving friends, our mission is to change the way people perceive coffee: from quick consumption to an active experience.

          With the AVENSI glassware line, the idea that you can interact with your coffee in a way that actually impacts the flavor is what we hope will encourage more and more coffee drinkers to enjoy and appreciate coffee in a way never before possible.

          AVENSI to us means ‘an adventure of the senses’. For us, coffee is an everyday adventure–being able to slow down and appreciate the moment by exploring the diverse flavor notes of our coffee. It’s this same inspiration that drives our passion for coffee and fuels our creativity to design innovative products that coffee lovers enjoy using everyday. 

Shipping Details

Please be aware that we cannot mark any shipments as a gift. This is illegal so we will not be able to do this.

Our prices do not include VAT, GST or other applicable country taxes. Our terms of sale are CIF destination. Backers are responsible for any and all import fees, VAT, duties, taxes, post office fees, and or any other fees their country or government imposes, which in the past have ranged from 0% to 20% in the US and EU countries, to as much as 200% for certain South American countries. As we are shipping these products all over the world, it is impossible for us to build in the various duties, VAT and GST tax for each location through Indiegogo.

Shipments that could not be delivered due to an inaccurately provided address (including failure to update an old address) will have additional costs to be reshipped. Due to the size of your rewards, we cannot ship to PO Boxes.

Estimated Delivery: Once production is complete on all of the orders, we will provide updates for shipping dates. As you know with international shipping there can be unpredictable delays that are out of our control, however, we will do our absolute best to ship based on the predicted time frame.

To kick-start your adventure, we've assembled the best collection of beans to experiment with your new glasses. Complement your AVENSI glasses with our special offer: a unique coffee tasting experience - where we’ll ship you freshly roasted beans and explore coffee’s diverse flavor notes with you and your new glasses. We’ll choose 3 bags of beans (75g each) with distinctly different flavor notes that you can use to taste and explore the diverse flavors of coffee from around the world. Experience the full spectrum of flavors as you embark on your adventure with your AVENSI glassware set.**Currently only available in the USA. We'd love to make this experience available to all our backers internationally, but shipping coffee beans internationally has its fair share of challenges. If there's enough demand in your region, we'll be able to make the Coffee Explorer's Experience available to you and the other backers in your area. We will be sending a survey to all our backers after the Indiegogo campaign ends to gauge demand and we’ll do our best to make this available in your region.      The AVENSI glasses work with your favorite coffees and brew methods.The philosophy behind the AVENSI is to elevate your appreciation for coffee by inspiring you to experiment with new coffees and brew methods, and explore the unique aromas, tastes, and flavors in your cup.Coffee is an everyday adventure. Whether it’s enjoyed in a peaceful moment alone or shared with friends and family, the AVENSI is your perfect coffee companion on your journey of discovery.   




      ICOSA Brewhouse is a small team with a big vision to change coffee. Founded by 3 coffee loving friends, our mission is to change the way people perceive coffee: from quick consumption to an active experience.          With the AVENSI glassware line, the idea that you can interact with your coffee in a way that actually impacts the flavor is what we hope will encourage more and more coffee drinkers to enjoy and appreciate coffee in a way never before possible.          AVENSI to us means ‘an adventure of the senses’. For us, coffee is an everyday adventure–being able to slow down and appreciate the moment by exploring the diverse flavor notes of our coffee. It’s this same inspiration that drives our passion for coffee and fuels our creativity to design innovative products that coffee lovers enjoy using everyday. Shipping DetailsPlease be aware that we cannot mark any shipments as a gift. This is illegal so we will not be able to do this.Our prices do not include VAT, GST or other applicable country taxes. Our terms of sale are CIF destination. Backers are responsible for any and all import fees, VAT, duties, taxes, post office fees, and or any other fees their country or government imposes, which in the past have ranged from 0% to 20% in the US and EU countries, to as much as 200% for certain South American countries. As we are shipping these products all over the world, it is impossible for us to build in the various duties, VAT and GST tax for each location through Indiegogo.Shipments that could not be delivered due to an inaccurately provided address (including failure to update an old address) will have additional costs to be reshipped. Due to the size of your rewards, we cannot ship to PO Boxes.Estimated Delivery: Once production is complete on all of the orders, we will provide updates for shipping dates. As you know with international shipping there can be unpredictable delays that are out of our control, however, we will do our absolute best to ship based on the predicted time frame.

story:
INDIEGOGO PRE-ORDER BONUSES

Meet the Arctic. More than just a coffee maker, it’s going to be an integral part of your new lifestyle. Designed with equal elements of function and form, the Arctic is sleek, elegant, and makes amazing tasting cold brew. It’s simple to use, so you can easily add it into your everyday coffee routine - no professional barista experience necessary. Great coffee awaits.

 


 

The best-kept secret in the coffee world has been brewing for centuries. Cold brew coffee was invented in Japan during the 1600s, recently popularized by upscale coffee shops, and perfected for making at home with the Arctic.

If you haven’t tried cold brew yet, you’re missing out. The flavor is delightfully smooth compared to the taste of your usual cup, and it packs more than enough of a caffeinated kick to get you going in the morning. 

Skip your morning trip to the coffee shop and save time and money during your morning routine.

Everything we’ve learned about cold brew coffee has been put into the Arctic. After discovering something so great, we couldn’t help but share it.
 

You don’t need to be a professional barista to make your own cold brew. The Arctic is specifically designed to make brewing easy at home.

So what is cold brew? It’s a way of brewing coffee in cold water rather than the traditional method of using hot water. Cold brew has a longer extraction process which gives it a few advantages over your typical cup of coffee. For one, it tastes a lot smoother. The familiar bite of hot brewed coffee is caused by fatty acids, which are left behind during the cold brewing process. This means it’s not only easier on your taste buds but on your stomach as well.

After brewing coffee grounds in cold water for a set amount of time (more on the ideal schedule later) you’re left with a tasty cold brew.

Your brew can be used as a base for many different drinks: hot, cold, iced, or in a shake! The versatility of cold brew is a true game-changer in how you consume your daily dose of coffee.

Plus, with the Arctic, you can brew up an entire batch of cold brew at once to store in the fridge for up to 2 weeks.


 

There are a million reasons to love cold brew coffee made by the Arctic. But for starters, here are the main benefits we think you should know about:


 

 

The Arctic is incredibly easy to use. Here's our preferred cold brew method to get you started.

Remember, you’re in control of the brewing process from start to finish! If you prefer stronger coffee, simply add more coffee grounds, use less water, or increase your brew time. The beans you choose will also determine how your brew turns out, so experiment to find out what makes your favorite coffee. 
 

As part of your daily life, we knew the Arctic had to be designed with equal elements of function and form. What we came up with was something sleek, and simple to use, so you can easily add it into your everyday coffee routine.

The carafe is made of 100% borosilicate glass and has a capacity of 50.7 oz (1.5L) to hold enough cold brew for 1-2 weeks. The Micron Filter is laser cut with tiny holes, 200 microns in diameter, to keep coffee grounds from leeching into your brew. Each feature was chosen to enhance the entire coffee-making process, from the simplicity of brewing to enjoying the smooth taste in every cup. 
 

Your favorite cup of coffee should be as unique as you are. The choice is yours in how little or how much you want to customize! If you’re someone who is very particular about your coffee, you’re going to love making cold brew with the Arctic. From fine-tuning the brewing process itself to choosing which beverage to make with your finished cold brew, the Arctic makes it easy to experiment and find out what works best for you. The possibilities are nearly endless with the Arctic.


 

One of the great benefits of the Arctic is how customizable each brew can be. For all you coffee connoisseurs out there, you’re able to control not just the bean type or roast level, but also the brew time and water-to-coffee ratio. This affects the taste, aroma, and caffeine level, so you’re in complete control to adjust these levels to your liking and make your ideal brew each time. If you prefer to keep things simple, find out what works for you and stick to it.

  If you prefer stronger coffee, simply add more coffee grounds, use less water, or increase your brew time. The beans you choose will also determine how your brew turns out, so experiment to find out what makes your favorite coffee.
 

Once you’ve made a batch of cold brew with the Arctic, you can use it as a base in a variety of coffee beverages. Not only can you serve it as hot coffee, over ice, or with cream or milk, but there are also plenty of ways to think outside the mug. Try it in a smoothie or milkshake, over ice cream, mixed with your favorite spirit, or even use it to bake with! Any coffee lover will surely have no shortage of creative ways to incorporate cold brew into drinks and desserts. Here’s a few of our favorite recipes:

 

 

The journey for developing the Arctic was a process that was driven by our love and passion for coffee. And, of course, it was fuelled by coffee, too. Our goal was simple: bring to life an awesome cold brew system we would be proud to use ourselves and share with our friends. We envisioned it would be functional and an attractive conversation piece. Take a closer look at our journey with the Arctic!


 

The Arctic isn’t just a coffee maker—it’s going to be an integral part of your new lifestyle. If you’re like us, you need coffee in the morning and it needs to be well-made. Cold brew made with the Arctic simply tastes better than regular coffee: it’s smoother, more flavorful, and has less bite. The Arctic can save you money by avoiding those daily trips to the coffee shop, and save you time by brewing big batches at once that can last up to 2 weeks.  

You’re going to love the versatility that the Arctic provides, which lets you adjust both the brewing process and your beverage of choice as well. Say hello to hot coffee, iced coffee, shakes, and anything else your imagination can dream up for cold brew. Best of all, the Arctic itself is a prime example of when beautiful design is masterfully executed. Because when all your guests compliment you on serving them the best coffee they’ve ever had, you’ll be proud to show them the Arctic.

Your pledge will not only help us bring the Arctic to life, it will help us build our brand and take our business to the next level. We thank you for believing in us.

Join the movement now and make a pledge to get your very own Arctic. Great coffee awaits.

 

The amount of support that we've received for the Arctic has been incredible.  As a thank you, every Arctic Cold Brew System pre-order will be now be shipped with a beautifully crafted stainless steel coffee scoop. Thanks for being a part of our journey!

 

Please be aware that we cannot mark any shipments as a gift. This is illegal so we will not be able to do this.

Our prices do not include VAT, GST or other applicable country taxes. Our terms of sale are CIF destination. Backers are responsible for any and all import fees, VAT, duties, taxes, post office fees, and or any other fees their country or government imposes, which in the past have ranged from 0% to 20% in the US and EU countries, to as much as 200% for certain South American countries. As we are shipping these products all over the world, it is impossible for us to build in the various duties, VAT and GST tax for each location through Indiegogo.

Shipments that could not be delivered due to an inaccurately provided address (including failure to update an old address) will have additional costs to be reshipped. Due to the size of your rewards, we cannot ship to PO Boxes.

Estimated Delivery: Once production is complete on all of the orders, we will provide updates for shipping dates. As you know with international shipping there can be unpredictable delays that are out of our control, however, we will do our absolute best to ship based on the predicted time frame.

Our team is made up of friends and colleagues, all of which have one major thing in common: we’re 90% powered by caffeine. Which is why we thought it was so fitting to collectively put our energy into making an amazing home coffee system.

We’ve been through a lot from day one on our long journey of developing the Arctic. We’re proud to share our creation with the world and appreciate all the interest that we’ve been shown by our supporters.

Because no matter how we spend our days, we all start them the same. And that’s with a good cup of coffee.

story:
An all-natural, safe and simple sticker that keeps fruit fresh up to 2 weeks longer. That’s StixFresh! Just peel and stick to fruit to reduce spoilage. It’s that easy!

 

When faced with external and potentially harmful environmental factors, plants produce secondary metabolites to protect themselves. Naturally produced substances like alkaloids, steroids, fats, tannins and sugars help ward off pesky predators like insects, pathogens, or in some cases, even other invasive plant species. Some of these compounds activate and travel in their vapor-phase, effectively protecting a relatively large area.

We created a patent-pending formulation from these substances and applied it to the non-sticky side of a sticker. In essence, StixFresh has re-purposed these compounds to provide fruit with a similar protective shield.

 

Independent studies have shown StixFresh may inhibit bacterial growth, thus slowing down over-ripening. Additionally, treated fruits show increased sweetness and firmness, as well as higher moisture retention.

 

A study by Dr. Phebe Ding compared the cellular structure of a mango with StixFresh (left) and one without (right). She concluded that “The sticker has reduced the disease incidence of fruits, which could indirectly prolong the shelf life of fruits.”

For more, check out our FAQ's, or message us directly.

 

Absolutely. StixFresh’s all-natural, chemical-free ingredients are food-grade and meet GRAS (Generally Recognized as Safe) requirements in accordance with the FDA.

Also, standard migration tests concluded that none of the sticker’s substances migrate directly into fruit. That means StixFresh won’t discolor fruit or change its taste. Rather, it keeps it naturally sweet and delicious!

 

 

StixFresh has been recognized by these food and packaging publications:

 

Check out what’s being said about StixFresh:

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

StixFresh stickers perform best when placed on avocados, apples, oranges, and mangoes.

 

Every year, the average US household throws away $2,200 of food.* Fruits and vegetables make up ~ $500 of that loss.

A 1-year supply of StixFresh is only $149. So do the math. StixFresh pays for itself more than three times over! Plus you get cool swag!

Or look at it this way: On average, an organic avocado cost $2.00. At our 1-year supply price, each sticker costs just $0.40. Rather than risk your avocado going bad before you can use it, apply a StixFresh and save yourself $1.60 plus a trip to the store!

 

Part of our mission to reduce food waste is understanding the pains from the farmer’s perspective. So, we’ve been busy visiting some of the largest fruit producers in the US. Based on data from the growers we’ve met, on average 30% of crops are lost before they even get on the truck. Not only is that a terrible waste of food, but it’s a loss that hits farmers hard. We’re working with farmers to ensure StixFresh can save as many of their fruits as possible.

 

 

 

Globally, 45% of fruits and vegetables go to waste. No one product alone could ever topple such a massive problem. But with all-natural StixFresh, together we can peel and stick our way to great progress. With each and every sticker, you’re making a difference in the world, right from your own kitchen.

 

 

StixFresh won two awards at the World Food Innovation Awards, Best Sustainability Initiative and Best Packaging Technology.

 

Beyond doing our part to reduce global food waste, we’re also helping reduce hunger right here in America by partnering with City Harvest. The organization started in 1982 when a group of New Yorkers found that the city had an abundance of excess food while many of its residents struggled to feed themselves and their families. Since then, City Harvest has supported nearly 1.2 million hungry New Yorkers. Now that’s a cause really worth sinking our teeth into. 

Once our campaign is fully funded, we’ll donate $1 for every 1000 StixFresh stickers purchased.

The more StixFresh stickers you buy, the bigger the difference you’ll make. Reducing worldwide food waste while fighting hunger right here at home. That’s like killing two birds with one sticker.

 

 

We welcomed Dr. Patrick Van Dijck as our new Chief Scientific Officer earlier this year. A true thought-leader with more than 28 years’ experience in molecular microbiology, Dr. Van Dijck leads our R&D team in our mission to reduce food waste around the world.

As our formula uses natural non-synthetic ingredients, inevitably there will be biological variability from batch to batch which could affect effectiveness and reliability. Currently, Dr. Van Dijck and team are developing a platform that will allow quantitative measure and control of our formulation’s effectiveness.

                                

Dr. Kanchan, who holds a PhD in Botany and Biochemistry, carries out comprehensive testing and validation of our formulation to optimize its effectiveness.

Learn ways to reduce in your kitchen by following these simple tips. 

We appreciate all your support, financial or otherwise. Your funding, your feedback, your likes and your shares will go a long way in helping us bring the amazing StixFresh technology to market. On behalf of the entire StixFresh team, thank you for sticking with us!

story:
Warriors of Wyrd, 

The time has come...

We are proud to announce the next chapter of our business and we will be rebranding ourselves as Wyrd Leatherworks and Meadery LLC. This new transition will include a fully functional and medieval themed mead hall and a new venue space for live acts. With this new Indiegogo campaign, we are reaching out to our friends, followers, supporters, and to our clan to help us achieve our goal.

By backing us on Indiegogo here is what you would be helping create:

The New Meadery

As production increases and demands has risen, we are outgrowing our current meadery space. With this new space, we will double the currently available brewing space, which means we will be able to increase overall production volume, as well as increase our quantities of mead. With multiple recent releases selling out within days, and expanding our market to include shipping to over 40 states, we want to meet the demands of our thirsty patrons! The space will also allow us to have room for a new brewery section, where we can make braggots (think honey beer). Funds go exclusively into acquisition of our new space and equipment needed to operate. Any additional funds will be used to expand inventory and food selection, any unforeseen expenses during the buildout, all while aiming to provide the greatest immersive experience possible while visiting us.

The New Mead Hall

With the acquisition of this new space, we are planning to open a brand new feature to our business. A fully functional mead hall, which is something that doesn't exist currently in Portland. Our mead hall will be a place where friends can gather, sit down and have some food and mead, while being immersed within an atmosphere transporting you back to times of old with medieval vibes. We plan to go all out with the aesthetic of the space to make it a truly unique experience. This will include wooden tables and chairs, barrels, banners on the walls, swords, axes, and anything you might find in a medieval tavern or mead hall. We plan to serve our mead on tap, as well as other mead from other regional meaderies with whom we have become close along with a selection of complimentary food items.

The Venue

Within the Mead Hall, this new space has a room that we would like to dedicate to being a venue space. Portland right now has seen the loss of many venues over the years, and we are slowly losing places where local acts and touring acts can play. We know so many musicians from around the globe and we would love to be able to offer a space for them to play, even if it isn't the biggest around. This space can include live shows, performances, karaoke nights, themed parties or game nights, and more!

The Storefront

Our shop isn't going away! Included in this new space is ample room to continue our current operations as a storefront, where we will continue to host our own leather and mead products and feature local artists work on consignment. We will just have a little more space!

The Leather Workshop

Our leather goods department will still be functional and operating the same as we always have! We may even have more space to work, as well as the ability to get better equipment for the department down the road. All leather goods will still be available in our storefront, don't worry!

Heed the Call

Those are the features that we wish to bring to the table. Our goal is to create a totally unique place in Portland, something that will make us stand out from every other bar, meadery, and leather goods shop around. We want to take people out of the modern world and into medieval fantasy, where folks can relax after a hard days questing. By backing us on Indiegogo, you are helping us turn this dream into reality!
story_txt: Warriors of Wyrd, The time has come...We are proud to announce the next chapter of our business and we will be rebranding ourselves as Wyrd Leatherworks and Meadery LLC. This new transition will include a fully functional and medieval themed mead hall and a new venue space for live acts. With this new Indiegogo campaign, we are reaching out to our friends, followers, supporters, and to our clan to help us achieve our goal.By backing us on Indiegogo here is what you would be helping create:The New MeaderyAs production increases and demands has risen, we are outgrowing our current meadery space. With this new space, we will double the currently available brewing space, which means we will be able to increase overall production volume, as well as increase our quantities of mead. With multiple recent releases selling out within days, and expanding our market to include shipping to over 40 states, we want to meet the demands of our thirsty patrons! The space will also allow us to have room for a new brewery section, where we can make braggots (think honey beer). Funds go exclusively into acquisition of our new space and equipment needed to operate. Any additional funds will be used to expand inventory and food selection, any unforeseen expenses during the buildout, all while aiming to provide the greatest immersive experience possible while visiting us.The New Mead HallWith the acquisition of this new space, we are planning to open a brand new feature to our business. A fully functional mead hall, which is something that doesn't exist currently in Portland. Our mead hall will be a place where friends can gather, sit down and have some food and mead, while being immersed within an atmosphere transporting you back to times of old with medieval vibes. We plan to go all out with the aesthetic of the space to make it a truly unique experience. This will include wooden tables and chairs, barrels, banners on the walls, swords, axes, and anything you might find in a medieval tavern or mead hall. We plan to serve our mead on tap, as well as other mead from other regional meaderies with whom we have become close along with a selection of complimentary food items.The VenueWithin the Mead Hall, this new space has a room that we would like to dedicate to being a venue space. Portland right now has seen the loss of many venues over the years, and we are slowly losing places where local acts and touring acts can play. We know so many musicians from around the globe and we would love to be able to offer a space for them to play, even if it isn't the biggest around. This space can include live shows, performances, karaoke nights, themed parties or game nights, and more!The StorefrontOur shop isn't going away! Included in this new space is ample room to continue our current operations as a storefront, where we will continue to host our own leather and mead products and feature local artists work on consignment. We will just have a little more space!The Leather WorkshopOur leather goods department will still be functional and operating the same as we always have! We may even have more space to work, as well as the ability to get better equipment for the department down the road. All leather goods will still be available in our storefront, don't worry!Heed the CallThose are the features that we wish to bring to the table. Our goal is to create a totally unique place in Portland, something that will make us stand out from every other bar, meadery, and leather goods shop around. We want to take people out of the modern world and into medieval fantasy, where folks can relax after a hard days questing. By backing us on Indiegogo, you are helping us turn this dream into reality!

story:
Meadery Coming Soon!

We're opening a meadery in Orlando! After years of developing mead recipes at home and spending the past year on the details of setting up a business, we're excited to be officially moving forward with plans to open Zymarium Meadery - Orlando's FIRST meadery - by the end of 2021.

Who Is Zymarium?

Zymarium Meadery is a collaboration between co-owners Joe Leigh and Ginger Leigh who are bringing together their individual and shared passions to showcase the art and science of making high quality, flavorful meads. Joe Leigh, who is Zymarium's master mead-maker, has developed over 85 unique and highly rated meads with over 30 medals and awards in mead making in the past 3 years, including 6 Mazer Cups, and was named one of the top 10 AMMA National Mead Makers of the year in 2018 and 2019. Ginger Leigh, who is known professionally as Synthestruct, is a multisensory artist and experience designer whose large scale audio-visual works and interactive installations have been presented at venues around the world, and was voted Orlando's 'Best Visual Artist' (Orlando Weekly 2020) for her works throughout the city at Snap! Gallery, Immerse, Dazzling Nights, and the Orlando Science Center. 

This delightful duo have been married for 10+ years and are excited to be joining forces professionally to create something truly unique...

Our Meads

Mead is the oldest fermented beverage and is made from honey, in contrast to wine which is fermented grapes, or beer which is fermented grains. Honey can have many dimensions of flavor, with millions of different varieties that vary by region and season. Mead has the ability to emulate any beer, wine, cider, cocktail, or even dessert, giving it more range than any other type of craft beverage. Meads can range from dry to sweet, refreshing to decadent, be still or carbonated, 4% to 24% ABV, and offer flavors from new to nostalgic. Mead improves with age, it’s gluten free, and it has as much terroir as wine, if not more, since we can blend honeys and fruits. When made with fruits, it gives the mead an additional depth and complexity, and when barrel-aged, the oak barrels impart flavors of vanilla, coconut, and spice. 

 

At Zymarium, we love exploring these endless possibilities and pushing both the art and science of making high quality, delicious meads. We focus on creating modern meads using the latest fermentation methods and honoring the long history and tradition that comes with the world's oldest fermented beverage.  

The Experience 

Creating new experiences for all the senses is at the heart of Zymarium Meadery, both in how we craft our meads, and through our tasting room, which will be designed entirely by Synthestruct, who specializes in creating futuristic and immersive experiences that utilize the latest in creative technology. Our tasting room will embody this passion for sensory exploration as a space for guests to indulge in new experiences to pair with your favorite meads (or flight!) of choice. 

 

We will have 12 different taps for guests to try when they visit the meadery, spanning many different styles of mead, which will be constantly rotating with new flavors to explore!  There will be carbonated Session meads, which emulate craft beer styles and strength, pure honey meads ("Traditionals"), which have a wonderfully balanced semi-sweet profile to showcase Florida's incredible range of local honey flavors, and Imperial Meads, which are big and bold, letting you get lost in the flavors of honey, fruit, or other fun things like coconut, vanilla, or chocolate. 

 

We will also have bottles available! Our limited bottle releases will focus on barrel-aged meads, and luxurious dessert style fruit meads that we make by using an obscene amount of fruit and honey, omitting water from their recipe to maximize the flavors of the ingredients. We will also offer 4 packs of our Session meads to take home, and for those who wish to try our meads outside of Florida, we are able to ship our bottles to most states! 

 

How it all began…

When Joe and Ginger made their first batch of mead in 2014, Joe had already tried literally thousands of craft beers from around the world and had experience with homebrewing a few beers of his own. Before they had met, Ginger had developed her own honey obsession and had been coveting different honeys from the places she traveled, and, alongside studying digital media in college, also began studying bees with the dream of one day becoming a beekeeper. Together they began seeking out meads to try, and in 2014 decided to celebrate Ginger's birthday by making their first mead together. It was a great introduction to the process of mead-making, and sparked what would later become a full-time passion.

Over the next few years they continued to seek out the best meads from around the world, and Joe became dedicated to studying the art and science of fermentation. With hundreds of pages of notes taken over years of research, Joe had set out to create the highest quality, complex, flavorful, balanced meads using modern fermentation methods, and a few experimental methods of his own. In 2017 Joe began making mead again and channeling all of that knowledge into making meads that embodied the qualities they had originally sought to produce. What started as a hobby quickly changed into an obsession, continuously learning and pushing each mead to be better than the last, with Ginger lending her expertise with ideas on new flavors to explore and valuable critique that would shape each mead's final profile.

By 2018 Joe was entering and winning every American Mead Makers Association (AMMA) competition and started to dream of opening a meadery to share this passion.  Together Joe and Ginger envisioned what the meadery could be, as a space to bring people together to try new things, experiment with new ideas, expand public knowledge about mead, honey, and the bees that create it, and become a destination that people in Orlando and visitors will love. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are looking to raise $40,000 or more so we can get everything we need to make you some amazing meads! Your generous donation will be helping purchase stainless steel fermenters, glycol chiller, bottle filler, corker, labeler, wine pumps, hoses, fruit press, barrel racks, and a bunch of other things needed to make delicious meads. 

 

THE PERKS!

•​Zymarium Sticker Pack ($5):

Includes not one...not two...but THREE different Zymarium stickers made from the highest quality weatherproof vinyl.


•Zymarium Corkscrew ($15):

This Coutale Sommelier corkscrew is completely bombproof and built on an unbreakable stainless steel frame. It features a manual double lever, and includes an automatic knife closure, a sharp micro-serrated knife, and a teflon-coated worm.

 

•Zymarium Founder's T-shirt of Tank Top ($40):

Limited edition Founder's shirts in your choice of style! The Unisex T-shirt is Bella Canvas 3001 and Tank is  Bella Canvas 6488 (in other words, super soft + great quality!). These shirts are printed using a special discharge printing technique which removes the shirt's color and replaces it with the printed color (instead of putting ink on top), so the print becomes part of the shirt and will never fade!

 

•Zymarium Founder's Glasses "Home and Away" Set (2 Glasses)($50):

This limited edition Founder's glassware set is available only to the OG Zymarium founders (that's you!) and includes the gold-printed founder's insignia on side 1, "Zymarium Meadery Founder 2021" on side 2, and gold rim. The set includes one 18.25oz Libbey Vina Diamond Balloon Mead Glass, and one 4.75oz Rastal Bugatti Goblet, perfect for home and away!

 

•Part of the Hive ($75):

Your name will become enshrined in the tasting room forever as one of our founders, to honor you for your generous donation. Everyone who sees it will know you helped build Zymarium! 

•Soft Opening Invite (+guest) ($100):

You and your guest will be among the first people ever to experience Zymarium and try our meads! Join us for an exclusive soft opening night before the crowds at the grand opening. This perk includes a drink ticket at the event for each of you!

•First In Line For Membership ($100):

Invitations to join the membership will be chosen at random from a long waiting list, but this perk would guarantee you an invitation to join! Since all six of the exclusive club bottles will be barrel-aged, we have a very limited number of spots in the membership and members will have first right of renewal, so the 'First In Line' perk is a way of guaranteeing your spot so you don't miss out on the membership opportunity. This perk does not include or discount the cost of the club membership ($450+taxes&fees).

The club membership will include:

  • Six exclusive barrel-aged meads (4 of which are Multi-Berry Endless Meads)
  • First access to public release bottles
  • The option to add a proxy, or ship to your state if possible
  • Special glassware, tasting room discount, first right of renewal, first access to events, etc

•VIP Tasting + Tour (+3 guests)($400):

You and three guests will get a private tour and tasting with the owners! The tasting will include some very special selections unavailable to the public. We’ll schedule a time that works best for everyone, on a night the meadery is closed to the public (Mon-Thurs).

•Make a Session Mead ($1,000):

We will consult with you on the development of a new mead recipe that will be tailored to your personal tastes. You will also assist in the naming of the mead and your name will always be included in the description on the menu and/or label!

•Name a Honey Fermenter ($1,500):

With this perk you'll be directly helping us to purchase the special fermenters to create our traditional meads which celebrate Florida's local honeys! Your name will be prominently displayed on the tank as a thank you for helping build the meadery! If you don’t want to use your name, you can name it after your pet, your band, or dedicate it to a loved one! 

This also includes two very special lifetime perks!

  • Every year for your birthday, come in that week and celebrate with a $50 tab on us!

  • Every time we are going to do a public bottle release, you will have the ability to purchase it before anyone else! All of our bottles will be very limited, so this would ensure you never miss out on a mead you want. You also won't have to wait in line or deal with timed online releases. All purchased bottles will be held until you (or a proxy) pick them up, or if you want them shipped (and we can ship to your state, see the FAQ), we will be happy to hold your bottles until you have a full box.

 

•Name a Large Fermenter ($5,000):

With this perk you'll be directly helping us to purchase our session mead tanks! Your name will be prominently displayed on the tank as a thank you for helping build the meadery! If you don’t want to use your name, you can name it after your pet, your band, or dedicate it to a loved one! 

This also includes two very special lifetime perks!

  • Every year for your birthday, come in that week and celebrate with a $75 tab on us!
  • Every time we are going to do a public bottle release, you will have the ability to purchase it before anyone else! All of our bottles will be very limited, so this would ensure you never miss out on a mead you want. You also won't have to wait in line or deal with timed online releases. All purchased bottles will be held until you (or a proxy) pick them up, or if you want them shipped (and we can ship to your state, see the FAQ), we will be happy to hold your bottles until you have a full box.

 

•Name a GIANT Fermenter ($10,000):

With this perk you'll be directly helping us to purchase our main production tanks, so we can make those giant fruit meads you love! Your name will be prominently displayed on the tank as a thank you for helping build the meadery! If you don’t want to use your name, you can name it after your pet, your band, or dedicate it to a loved one! 

This  also includes THREE very special lifetime perks! 

  • Anytime you come into the meadery, your first pour is on us (one pour per day)!
  • Every year for your birthday, come in that week and celebrate with a $100 tab on us! 
  • Every time we are going to do a public bottle release, you will have the ability to purchase it before anyone else! All of our bottles will be very limited, so this would ensure you never miss out on a mead you want. You also won't have to wait in line or deal with timed online releases. All purchased bottles will be held until you (or a proxy) pick them up, or if you want them shipped (and we can ship to your state, see the FAQ), we will be happy to hold your bottles until you have a full box.

 

The Adventure Ahead!

We are currently in the process of selecting our location in Orlando and are looking for a 5,000 - 7,000 square foot facility that will be home to both our production space and our tasting room! With your valuable support, once our location is ready we will use the funds to purchase the necessary equipment needed to produce our meads. After we sign a lease on the new location we will be able to apply for our remaining licenses, and as soon as the production space is all set up, we can begin making mead at the new meadery! We've been working hard to get everything ready to open the meadery by the end of the year, but there are many moving parts that are outside of our control. In the event that there are unexpected delays, the grand opening of the tasting room may not be until the first quarter of next year, but we would still have the ability to sell our meads before the tasting room opens.

 

Other Ways You Can Help!

We deeply appreciate any support you are able to give! If you prefer to help out in other ways, sharing our campaign with your friends through the Idiegogo share tools, and getting the word out about the meadery is also a great way to help!

story:
New York…The Empire State…Home to 20 million people and a thriving craft beverage community that is supported by our State’s vast agricultural resources. We’re a diverse state, with tastes as varied as our residents. We love our salt potatoes and riggies, our plates and our wings. We boast no fewer than 9 different hot dog manufacturers that someone will claim is “the best.” We have a lot to celebrate…and it was in that spirit that Nine Spot Brewing was formed.

 

Nine Spot Brewing, coming soon to Rochester, NY, is a brewery and taproom that takes all of its inspirations from this incredible state that we call home. Built on the truest intentions of the New York Farm Brewing Initiative, we source the majority of our ingredients from local producers. When you walk in, you’ll have the ability to sample not only our great beers, but guest taps and pours that we’ve scoured the state to find.

The concept of Nine Spot Brewing is a culmination of Marina Christopher’s 20-year career in the craft beverage industry. In 2017, her concept found the shared ideals of Chris Nothnagle, Gary Rodriguez, and Edd Taylor, who came from the world of sales and planning craft beer events. This group of friends worked tirelessly to get Nine Spot off the ground until tragedy hit in 2019 when we lost our head brewer, founder, and friend Edd. An unimaginable loss, but we tried to carry on in his spirit. 3 months later, (now engaged) Marina and Chris lost their home in a devastating fire...just weeks before their wedding. We don’t need to remind anyone what 2020 brought us. But time in hibernation gave us an opportunity. We welcomed longtime friend, and financial guru, Bill Merkle to the Nine Spot family. We used quarantine and multiple furloughs to fine tune our recipes and plans. We waited…until the time was right again, and THAT’S what brings us to today.

With the help of too many people to list, Nine Spot Brewing was reborn, and ready to make up for lost time. We’re excited to share our core lineup. Beers like Stuyvesant Ale. A hop forward pale named for the Governor who handed New Amsterdam over to the British. And Unique New York, a wheat beer made with exotic hibiscus, lime, and regional honey that was originally brewed for International Women in Brewing Day. Each of our recipes captures the spirit of New York from bine to barrel. 

 

Nine Spot is more than just a craft brewery. We found an incredible location, rich with city history, and smack dab in the middle of a growing craft beer mecca. We’re building our brewing facilities and kitchen with a focus on energy and water conservation. We’ve made a commitment to be a benchmark employer that advances diversity in our industry, and also one that offers benefits and wages that set a “new normal” in craft beer. There are less expensive ways to get a brewery off the ground, but we’ve all worked within the “status quo” for long enough.

 

That’s where you come in…We are launching a crowdfund campaign through Indiegogo. The funds raised through this campaign will go directly to help restore our location, originally built in 1940, back to its architectural splendor. It also will allow us to upgrade our proposed brewing system. This upgraded 5-barrel brewhouse will allow us to brew more New York inspired goodness, more often. Support levels start as low as $10. We are offering so many great rewards to accompany your support level. Everything from drink tokens and stickers all the way up to sponsoring a fermenter or the opportunity to tell your New York Story by having a beer named after you.

So, in the words of Frank Sinatra, “it’s up to you New York.” With your help we can make Nine Spot Brewing a place where spectacular beer is brewed, New York State is celebrated, and maybe, just maybe…we figure out which of those 9 types of hot dog are “the best.”
story_txt:
New York…The Empire State…Home to 20 million people and a thriving craft beverage community that is supported by our State’s vast agricultural resources. We’re a diverse state, with tastes as varied as our residents. We love our salt potatoes and riggies, our plates and our wings. We boast no fewer than 9 different hot dog manufacturers that someone will claim is “the best.” We have a lot to celebrate…and it was in that spirit that Nine Spot Brewing was formed.
 
Nine Spot Brewing, coming soon to Rochester, NY, is a brewery and taproom that takes all of its inspirations from this incredible state that we call home. Built on the truest intentions of the New York Farm Brewing Initiative, we source the majority of our ingredients from local producers. When you walk in, you’ll have the ability to sample not only our great beers, but guest taps and pours that we’ve scoured the state to find.

The concept of Nine Spot Brewing is a culmination of Marina Christopher’s 20-year career in the craft beverage industry. In 2017, her concept found the shared ideals of Chris Nothnagle, Gary Rodriguez, and Edd Taylor, who came from the world of sales and planning craft beer events. This group of friends worked tirelessly to get Nine Spot off the ground until tragedy hit in 2019 when we lost our head brewer, founder, and friend Edd. An unimaginable loss, but we tried to carry on in his spirit. 3 months later, (now engaged) Marina and Chris lost their home in a devastating fire...just weeks before their wedding. We don’t need to remind anyone what 2020 brought us. But time in hibernation gave us an opportunity. We welcomed longtime friend, and financial guru, Bill Merkle to the Nine Spot family. We used quarantine and multiple furloughs to fine tune our recipes and plans. We waited…until the time was right again, and THAT’S what brings us to today.

With the help of too many people to list, Nine Spot Brewing was reborn, and ready to make up for lost time. We’re excited to share our core lineup. Beers like Stuyvesant Ale. A hop forward pale named for the Governor who handed New Amsterdam over to the British. And Unique New York, a wheat beer made with exotic hibiscus, lime, and regional honey that was originally brewed for International Women in Brewing Day. Each of our recipes captures the spirit of New York from bine to barrel.

We’re building our brewing facilities and kitchen with a focus on energy and water conservation. There are less expensive ways to get a brewery off the ground, but we’ve all worked within the “status quo” for long enough.
 
That’s where you come in…We are launching a crowdfund campaign through Indiegogo. The funds raised through this campaign will go directly to help restore our location, originally built in 1940, back to its architectural splendor. It also will allow us to upgrade our proposed brewing system. This upgraded 5-barrel brewhouse will allow us to brew more New York inspired goodness, more often. Support levels start as low as $10. We are offering so many great rewards to accompany your support level. Everything from drink tokens and stickers all the way up to sponsoring a fermenter or the opportunity to tell your New York Story by having a beer named after you.

So, in the words of Frank Sinatra, “it’s up to you New York.” With your help we can make Nine Spot Brewing a place where spectacular beer is brewed, New York State is celebrated, and maybe, just maybe…we figure out which of those 9 types of hot dog are “the best.”

story:
Notice: the original product name "Artbrew" will be changed to "iGulu"

Using only the highest quality of beer brewing ingredients, you'll be able to select your recipe from a library of hundreds of master recipes and, with the push of a few buttons, you'll have perfect beer in as little as one week. Fully customizable and community-integrated, it will change the way you both brew and experience beer for the rest of your life!

 

Turn on and grab a pre-created Brewing Pack , water, and yeast.

Using the LCD screen, select the type of beer you would like to brew from our built-in recipe library - or - create your own recipe through our App.

Open the panels on top of it and pull out the lids to expose the MiniKegs where you will pour your ingredients. Following the LCD screen’s instructions, pour in the correct amount of water (typically around 6L) and put the correct amount of ingredients.

Every ingredient has a dedicated container/compartment.

Press "Start" and it will automatically boil your malts, mix in the hops, add in the yeast, and ferment for 1 to 3 weeks. Then - enjoy!

 
 

Our goal has always been to create a one-stop-shop where craft beer enthusiasts can simply and effortlessly brew amazing tasting beers without having to be a master brewer. While most beer brewing machines have their body, kegs, and some variable components that require a steep learning curve to be mastered, it combines both the "Brewing Tank" and the "Fermentation Tank" into one unique, structurally advanced body. Through the LCD screen, mashing tank window, and the app, you can easily program, monitor, and create a brick-and-mortar brewing experience in your very own kitchen!

With the the library of built-in recipes at your fingertips, you’ll be able to create Pilsners, IPAs, Porters, Weizens, Lagers, Stouts, and heck - you can even brew a batch of Blueberry Beer! All ingredients will be sourced from the best certified US suppliers.

 

 

 

You’ll have a variety of customizable combinations that have been curated by our Master Brewer - Aobo Sun - who is a certified sommelier from the Doemens College of Beer in Germany. We will continue to add new recipes to the library which will be automatically updated through your wifi connections, so if it’s not there today, you can bet it’ll be there soon!

 

 
 

Outfitted with state-of-the-art sensors, it allows for maximum control and feedback with minimal brewing experience and attention. You can monitor the brew time, brew phase, temperature, and - for the advanced users - you can even monitor the Saccharify Curve. The user interface is intuitive and easy-to-use with sliding scales for variables such as alcohol content, bitterness, flavor profile and more!

As any home brewer knows, the post-brewing cleanup process can be a messy hassle - so we’ve taken care of it for you. First, you can remove the built-in MiniKegs (1.6 Gallons) with a simple handle-pull and store them to be enjoyed at any time without having to move or carry it. Second, it has a built-in, automated, self-cleaning system that, with some added fresh water, will take care of the clean-up process on its own. Simply add in a liter of fresh water, scroll through the menu on the LCD screen to the “Clean/Rinse” feature, select it, and it will clean itself in a few hours!

Through the Community social network, you’ll be able to share recipes, create virtual tasting parties, and even sell your recipes to other users! Our team will test your recipe before verifying and releasing it to our Market. With this amazing feature, we hope to create an economy where the best home craft brewers can be rewarded through crowdsourcing.

 
  • Dimension (LWH) :50 cm (19.7") x 29 cm (11.4") x 39 cm (15.4")
  • Weight : 8 kg/17.63 lbs 
  • Volume: 5 L/1.3 Gallons 
  • Voltage: 110V ~ 220V AC 
  • Power: 1000 W (in mashing) & 100W (in fermenting)
  • Temperature Sensors, Electrical Pumps 
  • Stainless Steel Containers 
  • Solid States Relay Control 
  • ARM Processor 
  • LCD Touch Pad 
  • Smartphone App (Android & iOS) 
  • Wifi b/g/n

story:
Short Summary

Thank you for considering contributing to Forever Craft Urban Winery.  Matt and Melissa Smith have a love for craft beer and delicious wine.  They decided to open a winery with a brewery concept.  Why not have fun and interesting wine flavors that others are not doing.  Forever Craft Urban Winery focuses on fun, flavor forward wines that even the novice wine consumers will enjoy.  The funds raised through this program will help with the build out of the new tasting room coming soon!

What We Need & What You Get

There are so many big and little things that go into building a tasting room.  We found the space.  We have the wine.  Now we need to fill the space with furniture, glassware, and equipment.  We are also hoping to improve our wine making equipment.  All contributions will help toward the build out and furniture in the tasting room.

With your contribution Forever Craft Urban Winery will be able to have a great tasting room full of delicious wine and comfortable seating.  There are several options of contribution tiers.  The base contribution and all tiers after that will be a part of the Founders Club.  The Founders Club will get the contributor 10% off their individual food and beverage tab, 20% off merchandise, and 1 admission to all Founders Club events.  The other tiers will include this and some other great options.

 

The Impact

Your contribution will help Matt and Melissa build their dream of a destination tasting room that is warm and inviting.  It will be a place where they craft wines for a better forever!

 

Risks & Challenges

Matt and Melissa opened the winery production site during a pandemic.  They took a leap and thanks to their wonderful patrons, they were able to come out on the other side with a successful wine.  They are ready to share their wine with the rest of the community and a tasting room will help do that.  This tasting room is being funded with their own money and investments.  Your contribution will help lighten the burden and it will go a long way!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't help monetarily, we understand.  Please help by spreading the word about this campaign and the opening of the tasting room.  And once we are open, come enjoy a delicious beverage with us.  CHEERS!!

story:
The uKeg Twist Hard Seltzer Maker from GrowlerWerks allows you to make your own favorite seltzers at home, or anywhere really. Custom, carbonated concoctions that taste amazing!

 

EASY TO USE = GOOD VIBES ALL DAY LONG

 

 

CHOOSE FROM 2 SIZES AND 6 COLORS!  

MAKE IT and TAKE IT!  

 

DELICIOUS FLAVORS INCLUDED

A five-flavor sample pack is included with every perk. You can also save on extra supply at checkout if there's a flavor you know you'll love! 

 

 

 

 

 

NO NEED FOR A KITCHEN APPLIANCE 

 

FEATURED IN:

 

THE ONLY HARD SELTZER THAT MATTERS- YOURS.

 

 AS EASY AS A TWIST AND A SHAKE!

Hard Seltzer 101

A step-by-step to making the perfect hard seltzer using the uKeg TWIST.

STEP 1: Add ingredients

  • unthread the Seltzer Cap and add ice
  • add one cap full of uKeg TWIST flavoring (1.5 cap-full for 36 oz TWIST) OR, add fresh fruit to taste
  • add cold water to the 'FILL LINE"
  • re-install the Seltzer Cap

STEP: 2 Carbonate

  • remove the Easy Twist Regulator
  • insert a new 8 gram CO2 cartridge into the Cartridge Well (small end pointing up).
  • re-install the Easy Twist Regulator until fully tight (you may hear a gas "rushing" sound (this is normal)
  • shake the TWIST for 30 seconds

STEP 3: Enjoy!

Rotate the SPOUT out fully. Either pour using the DISPENSE BUTTON or sip directly through the SPOUT (you do not need to push the DISPENSE BUTTON to sip through the SPOUT)

 

A TASTY RECIPE   

 

REFRESHING PERKS

 

Risks & Challenges

We are very confident in our ability to deliver effectively, efficiently and on time with this project. We have completed two successful campaigns, delivering rewards to 15,000 backers that have gone on to become best-rated products. Through this process, we’ve learned how to plan and run a successful campaign from product design to funding and delivery.

Our company has established a solid supply chain, shipping and fulfillment system, and a Customer Service Team ready to deliver. In addition, we’ve taken other safeguards to ensure success:

  1. The uKeg TWIST is designed and developed to production-ready status.
  2. We will limit the available quantity and delivery dates to levels we know we can deliver.
  3. We know with confidence that our pledge tiers are sufficient to support our cost of goods and delivery.
  4. We have built slippage time into the schedule to adapt if we run into production issues. Of course, there are always timeline risks associated with bringing new innovations to life, but we are 100% committed to ample communication in the event of any schedule delays, and we’ve gone to these aforementioned lengths to ensure that the likelihood of delays is low. If you have additional questions or concerns regarding Risks & Challenges, please reach out to info@growlerwerks.com for support.

 

Spread the word!

  • If you know someone who loves hard seltzer or delicious bubbly beverages, please tell them about the uKeg TWIST!
  • Don't forget to click the heart icon button at the top of the page to follow our campaign.
  • Use the social buttons to share!

Thank you for your support!

story:
Introducing Yolin, the smart auto-vacuum food storage container. It’s a simpler, more efficient, and more convenient way to maintain your food’s freshness, flavor and nutrition. Yolin’s design ensures that no air enters the vacuum-sealed container, keeping whatever you store at top quality, for longer.

 

Utilizing a vacuum environment to reduce the contact between oxygen and food, Yolin extends your food’s life 5 times longer than other storage means. It might seem like magic, but it’s just good, cutting-edge science at work.

So much food is wasted every year, just because it doesn’t stay fresh in storage. Yolin has perfected the art of preserving food, so that nothing goes to waste.

Never worrying about opened snacks becoming stale, not spending three hours defrosting meat from the freezer, mixing seasonings in advance, cooking any kind of delicacy, and preventing moisture and mildew from ever getting into your stored food.

Click to see the full table

The fresh-keeping containers out there on the market are small, and not suitable for family-size food storage. Yolin has a large, flexible storage capacity. No matter the volume or needs of a household, we can keep all of its food effectively preserved.  

Plus, each lid has the same dimensions. You can use either lid to seal either container. With YOLIN, large food items like fish, spaghetti and baguettes will never go to waste again. 

 

Compared with the traditional manual vacuum pump, the Yolin is more efficient, more stable and less work. Just put your favorite food in the jar and press the button on the lid. The air will automatically evacuate from the container and become air-free within 50 seconds.

Yolin is equipped with an automatic air pressure maintenance system. As the air makes its way into the container, the system automatically expels it. You’ll never need to worry about harmful air infiltration again.

Even though Yolin’s storage is airtight and secure, it only takes one click to inject air and open the lid. Traditional food containers need you to zip out the seal or struggle to pull off the lid. With Yolin, you just push a button, wait 3 seconds, and your fresh food is readily available to you.

YOLIN has a built-in lithium polymer battery. Plug it into any micro-USB socket to fully charge in two hours. Then it can be used once or twice a day for 60 days (i.e. at full power, the air can be evacuated 60 consecutive times). It is the ideal refrigeration companion - securing the freshness and nutrition of your food for a long time.

Each fresh-keeping container is equipped with a detachable, separating partition, which can turn one container into two when needed. When not needed, easily pull it out to use the space more effectively.

Yolin's production materials are all food-grade and BPA-free, and the lid is made of ABS. Meaning you can safely use the jar to protect your food and your health.And since Yolin's working temperature is -4 °F～212 °F, you can safely put it in the freshest part of the refrigerator. You can also use boiling water to disinfect it.*NOTE the lid is equipped with a precision mainboard and batteries, please do not place it in a Microwave for heating or freezing below 32 Fahrenheit Degrees or 0 Celsius Degrees.

Abandoning the glass material used in a conventional fresh-keeping container, Yolin's overall weight is reduced by 70%. The entire body is only 380g. Take it outdoor camping, take it anywhere in fact. It is easy to carry.

Meat, seafood, fruit, produce, snacks, YOLIN is designed to keep them all crisp, invigorating and delectable. No matter what it is, YOLIN will maintain its freshness. Always. 

Guaranteed Delivery 

We guarantee the delivery of Yolin to all our backers. If for any reason, we are unable to ship your Yolin to your location, you will receive a full refund.

1 Year Warranty 

We guarantee that Yolin is free from any defects under normal use and conditions, for a period of 1 year from the date of purchase. 

Tax-Free Delivery 

We ship worldwide without applying a Value Added Tax (VAT) or other import taxes on shipping. 

We are more than a startup. We’re a team where each member has a passion for developing tools to better improve efficiency and promote automation and intelligence in daily life. We believe Yolin can benefit our world by extending foods’ shelf-life to eliminate wastes. Yolin is just the first step in a long-term journey of technological innovation. What we are looking forward to is not just the pre-orders, but your feedback and advice with new perspectives. This is the only way we can improve our products. With your help, we truly believe we can achieve our goals and make things happen.
