It is the ideal refrigeration companion - securing the freshness and nutrition of your food for a long time.Each fresh-keeping container is equipped with a detachable, separating partition, which can turn one container into two when needed. When not needed, easily pull it out to use the space more effectively.Yolin's production materials are all food-grade and BPA-free, and the lid is made of ABS. Meaning you can safely use the jar to protect your food and your health.And since Yolin's working temperature is -4 °F～212 °F, you can safely put it in the freshest part of the refrigerator. You can also use boiling water to disinfect it.*NOTE the lid is equipped with a precision mainboard and batteries, please do not place it in a Microwave for heating or freezing below 32 Fahrenheit Degrees or 0 Celsius Degrees.Abandoning the glass material used in a conventional fresh-keeping container, Yolin's overall weight is reduced by 70%. The entire body is only 380g. Take it outdoor camping, take it anywhere in fact. It is easy to carry.Meat, seafood, fruit, produce, snacks, YOLIN is designed to keep them all crisp, invigorating and delectable. No matter what it is, YOLIN will maintain its freshness. Always. Guaranteed Delivery We guarantee the delivery of Yolin to all our backers. If for any reason, we are unable to ship your Yolin to your location, you will receive a full refund.1 Year Warranty We guarantee that Yolin is free from any defects under normal use and conditions, for a period of 1 year from the date of purchase. Tax-Free Delivery We ship worldwide without applying a Value Added Tax (VAT) or other import taxes on shipping. We are more than a startup. We’re a team where each member has a passion for developing tools to better improve efficiency and promote automation and intelligence in daily life. We believe Yolin can benefit our world by extending foods’ shelf-life to eliminate wastes. Yolin is just the first step in a long-term journey of technological innovation. What we are looking forward to is not just the pre-orders, but your feedback and advice with new perspectives. This is the only way we can improve our products. With your help, we truly believe we can achieve our goals and make things happen.

story:
Your Tumbler is GOOD, Let's make it GREAT!

Tumbler Buddy uses a stacked design made of high quality stainless steel to compliment your existing tumbler like never before. Before today, you could only use your tumbler to keep liquid cold that was already cold when you poured it in. You also were never able to use your tumbler to drink your favorite beverage directly from the bottle, can, or skinny canwithout it going warm. That ends TODAY!

 

THE PROBLEM:

You know the pains of warm beer, soda, or whatever else you drink. So well, that you tell yourself you like the taste. No, you've probably never said that. Sure, you could buy a $35beer insulator, a $25 can insulator, another $20 can insulator because you want to try those fancy skinny cans, and not to mention the $30 tumbler you already own to pour liquid into. That's a costly $110 just because they want to sell you more! More! More!

Or... Just drop a Tumbler Buddy in your Yeti. PROBLEM SOLVED!

Beer out of refrigerator for under 10 minutes.

Beer out of refrigerator for over an hour.

You probably already own one of the 20oz. tumblers above. Otherwise, you probably wouldn't be here. What you didn't realize when you bought it is that you're very limited. IT ONLY HOLDS LIQUID! You can't simply place a can or bottle in it. 

Tumbler Buddy is the all-in-one solution to your problems.

Tumbler Buddy fits bottles, cans, skinny cans, and naturally you can use your tumbler  to keep liquid cold or hot.

You no longer need 4 devices to keep your drink cold. Free up your cabinet space and your headache. Tumbler Buddy has arrived!

We could list thousands of beers and sodas that it fits, but lets make this simple:

 

Example of some bottles that fit using Tumbler Buddy.

If it's a pretty normal 11oz-12oz glass beer bottle, it fits. If it's pretty close to normal, it also fits. Honestly, if it's a bottle, there's a very good chance it fits.

Example of some cans that fit using Tumbler Buddy.

If it's an 11oz, 12oz, 15oz, or 16oz can, it probably fits. Doesn't matter if it's normal, tall, skinny, fat or in-between.

 

WHAT TUMBLERS WE KNOW IT FITS:

The above pictured are just some of the many tumblers that Tumbler Buddy fits.

BUT WAIT, THERE'S MORE!

Forget to put your beverage in the fridge but are thirsty now? 

3D exploded view rendering showing frozen gel inside Tumbler Buddy which keeps drinks colder, longer. 

I've got some good news for you! Inside the stainless steel walls of Tumbler Buddy, there is a quick freeze gel that will cool down your beverage in a Tumbler. Combined with the Tumbler of your choice, Tumbler Buddy creates a cool, freezer like atmosphere to quickly cool down the warm beverage you just put into it.

All you need to do is keep your Tumbler Buddy in the freezer and now your beverage will be super chilled! Take your drinking game to the next level with Tumbler Buddy.

Tumbler Buddy comes to you from the firefighter behind Grill Rescue and Beer Buddy.

If you don't know: 

Grill Rescue truly is the world's greatest grill brush and we proved this by completing a Kickstarter campaign raising over $210,000 going on to sell millions shortly thereafter. 

Beer Buddy is the world's first all-in-1 beverage insulator. This was also proven by the more than 941% successful Kickstarter campaign, and now an Amazon favorite.

 

...so we know a little bit about world class products.

 

So, why Indiegogo?

We learned that this is by far the best platform to bring new product to life and give people the opportunity to help back this project at a discount. Grill Rescue sold on Indiegogo for less than half of it's current retail price. The discounts on Indiegogo are no joke.

THE PROCESS:

Designing Tumbler Buddy was very very difficult. Wanting something that doesn't exist is easy, creating it is hard; Very very hard. It took over a year to design and create the perfect version of Tumbler Buddy. Constantly adding minute details and changes that you may not notice at first glance. Take a look below and get a 30 second view of the last year creating the perfect version of Tumbler Buddy.

Rendering of original 3D printed prototype. 

Testing prototype for proper fit in various sized cans and bottles.

CAD file used to print prototypes for testing.

3D printed prototype fitment testing.

We created Tumbler Buddy out of frustration of companies trying to sell you 4 different insulators when we knew just one could do the job of all 4. We know most people already own an insulated tumbler, so we thought, "What if you don't need to buy a new one at all!?" That's when Tumbler Buddy was born. 

 

REWARDS:

TIMELINE:

WHO ARE WE?:

Scott is a Firefighter-Paramedic and the inventor of Tumbler Buddy, Beer Buddy, and the Famous Grill Rescue. He is a full-time Fire Fighter since 2012. Scott is involved with the Technical Rescue Team and part of The United States Task Force II Team, which helps with many natural disaster missions. Scott attended Florida Atlantic University, where he studied and developed his business and entrepreneurial journey. 

In his free time, Scott spends time developing and constantly bettering Tumbler Buddy, Beer Buddy, and Grill Rescue. He enjoys the Florida weather with friends and family and takes full advantage of outdoor activities such as scuba diving, fishing, and Golf.

Scott also loves Anthony very much. Almost as much as he loves Kyle.

Anthony is a Business Consultant and co-creator of Tumbler Buddy, Grill Rescue and Beer Buddy. While the majority of Anthony's time is spent on branding and marketing Tumbler Buddy, Beer Buddy, and Grill Rescue, he is also responsible for all the events, video, imagery, and design.

Anthony spends his free time volunteering as a mentor to aspiring entrepreneurs. Oh yea, and he loves the ocean! Surprisingly, he doesn't drink! Often... 

Kyle might just be your most important resource for Tumbler Buddy. Kyle recently joined the Grill Rescue team for one purpose; EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE! Kyle is your go-to guy when it comes to any questions or concerns with this campaign. If we learned anything through our previous Indiegogo campaigns, it's that beyond great customer service is not only needed, it's deserved by all of our day one supporters. Where would we be without the backing from you through Indiegogo? That's why Kyle's mission is to make sure you are 100% happy with everything we do. If anything isn't absolutely perfect, just ask for Kyle!

story:
Fromaggio takes the technology from advanced factory machines and combines it with the artisanal aspect and convenience of home cheesemaking. With fromaggio, you can ensure your cheese is more authentic, natural and healthier than store bought cheese. When you try homemade cheese made with fromaggio, you might be tasting real cheese for the first time! 

*latest version shown in image below

Fromaggio makes almost any type of soft or hard cheese (and healthy yogurts too!) — cream cheese, chevre, ricotta, cottage, mozzarella, parmesan, camembert, comté, cheddar, bleu, colby, provolone, keffir, kosher, lactose-free, or even vegan cheese. 

With fromaggio, you can create your own unique cheese recipes and save or share them in the app. Many cheeses are enjoyed fresh, or users can remove the cheese and then age it if they desire. 

You’ll love the efficiency and convenience of fromaggio. Making cheese at home will now be simple and nearly effortless — forget all the accessories and labor that at-home cheesemakers of the past required.

An LCD touch screen display walks you through a few easy steps, and then fromaggio does the rest. Fromaggio also connects to a mobile app, via Bluetooth connectivity, where you can control the machine, read instructions, order ingredients, customize and share recipes, and more.

Fromaggio has detachable heads that feature different size cutters, and even a press, to help create your perfect cheese. Additionally, fromaggio has a removable whey container. Whey is a healthy byproduct of cheesemaking that has many uses, from making ricotta cheese, to fertilizing your garden to preparing a protein shake. 

 

With a removable, dishwasher-safe drainer, various size detachable curd cutters, and a press, fromaggio is extremely easy to sanitize, maintain and re-use.

Thermophilic cultures can make a variety of high temperature cheeses including mozzarella, provolone, swiss, romano, gruyere, and parmesan.

After living in Paris for 15 years, Glen returned to the U.S. and was surprised to find people were still eating the same, tasteless, artificial, grocery store cheese. He gathered a team of innovators and foodies — from the director of partnerships at YouTube to the head cheesemaker at a dairy farm, Fromaggio is a team of engineers, designers and cheese experts. We have lined up the best manufacturers, suppliers and engineers we could find. Together, we are on a mission to bring affordable, artisanal quality cheese to kitchen countertops worldwide.

While there are quite a few cheese options to choose from at the grocery store, most cheeses on the shelves are over-processed and full of additives. Imports are very expensive and not always a local option. Vegan, kosher, lactose-free and other types of specialty cheeses are often not easily available. 

If you decide to make your own cheese at home, the current products on the market require a lot of knowledge and equipment, and you’ll probably end up making a mess. People need a solution that combines the efficiency and technology from advanced factory machines with the simplicity and affordability of homemade, craft foods. 

We are proud to introduce a more convenient and customized way to make your own natural, affordable cheese. Fromaggio is an all-in-one, automatic home cheesemaker that can easily produce a variety of delicious cheeses.

We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make fromaggio a reality. 

We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t give a dollar or purchase fromaggio, if you’re a supporter of fromaggio, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!

Mesophilic cultures can make a variety of moderate temperature, hard cheeses including cheddar, colby, gouda, monterey jack, muenster, blue, and stilton. It can also make a variety of semi-ripened and fresh cheese including camembert, brie, gouda, edam, blue, feta, and havarti.Thermophilic cultures can make a variety of high temperature cheeses including mozzarella, provolone, swiss, romano, gruyere, and parmesan.

We are collaborating with Genimex, a Kickstarter referred company, to ethically and efficiently engineer, manufacture, control quality, package and deliver the best fromaggio product to market. 
Genimex works with startups and mid-size and Fortune 500 companies, and they have extensive experience in the hard-goods consumer products space in categories such as home, bath, baby, fitness, and electronics. They have experience working with mixed materials and eco-friendly, sustainable materials as well.

Imports are very expensive and not always a local option. story:
Who Are The Sisters?

Chartreuse Sisters is a sister-owned French-American fusion bakery that we started in our home kitchen under Cottage Food Law in October 2019. Mallory (pictured above on the left) is the younger sister, the head baker & recipe designer. Alyson (on the right) is the older sister and our marketing manager, photographer & will be our future head of beverage. We are working on a lease agreement with a location on Wealthy Street in Uptown GR and need your help to bring our vision to life!

What's French-American Fusion?

Our products are inspired by our French-American heritage and our nostalgic food and drink experiences from traveling here and abroad. We combine French & American pastry techniques and pair them with flavor profiles found in both cuisines to create unique and exciting treats!

Mission & Vision

Our mission is to provide outstanding baked goods and beverages in an inclusive, welcoming, and visually stunning environment. Our baked goods menu is always evolving and our non-alcoholic beverage menu will consist of housemade syrups, a classic espresso menu, a selection of teas, and rotating specials, including garnished mocktails and table-side special beverage service. 

Our vision is to change the way people consume coffee and baked goods by providing a transportive experience through our unique flavors, relaxing ambience, and friendly customer service. Our products are created using high quality ingredients, sourced locally when possible. We are proud & excited to be partnering exclusively with Mapcap for our coffee selection!

Funding Needs

Base Kitchen Equipment — this would cover our base kitchen equipment needs such as our oven, 3 compartment sink, 20 qt mixer, refrigerator, freezer, etc

Base Espresso Bar Equipment — this would cover our base equipment such as an espresso machine, espresso & drip grinder, drip brewer, water filtration system, etc

Our Perks

As a thank you for your support, we're excited to offer the following perks, some of which we were able to create with other local businesses! Depending on how much you donate, you will receive a variety of these perks (for more information, refer to the perks section).

If you are interested in donating more money than our highest perk, and would still like to receive the highest perk items, please email us at contact@chartreusesisters.com. 

Chartreuse Sisters Logo Sticker: You'll receive a 3" circle sticker with the Chartreuse Sisters Logo designed by local artist Matthew Zabler (check out his designs on instagram @sad_sparrow_gallery) to jazz up a laptop, car, water bottle, you name it!

Our Custom Candle Scent: You'll receive an 8oz candle locally poured at Wax Poetic Candle Bar in Grand Rapids, MI, which we are calling "Pause Café". One whiff of this candle, and you'll be transported to a patio on the cobblestone streets of the south of France.

Alyson's Tea Blend: You'll receive 1 oz (approximately 8-12 cups of tea) of Alyson's loose leaf blend, made in collaboration with Global Infusion. It has an Earl Grey base with cacao nibs, cinnamon bark & orange peel.

Mallory's Tea Blend: You'll receive 1 oz (approximately 8-12 cups of tea) of Mallory's loose leaf blend, made in collaboration with Global Infusion. It has an Earl Grey base with rose petals, vanilla bean & cornflower petals. 

12 oz Miir Travel Tumbler: You'll receive a white, BPA Free, 18/8 stainless steel, 12 oz Travel Tumbler from Miir with our Chartreuse Sisters Logo on it. This leak free design is perfect for those frenzied morning commutes, an adventurous hike or even a relaxing picnic! 

Chartreuse Sisters Crewneck Sweatshirt: You'll receive a black Crewneck Sweatshirt with our Chartreuse Sisters Logo on the front, printed locally by Unitas Printing (a second chance employer). 

Other Ways You Can Help

Like, follow, and share our page — we’re on instagram (@chartreusesistersgr) & facebook (Chartreuse Sisters GR)! 

Talk to your friends, family, and community about our business — and make plans to visit us once we open!

story:
Greetings from SEND A SEED women’s project Mparo,Uganda.

We wish to thank those who gave us support in all forms; financial,material,ideas and otherwise that enabled the start of the project.

I am Kemirembe Hope,the leader of  SEND A SEED women’s project Mparo Kabale

The project was started by the women peasants in Mparo Parish,Rwamucucu Sub-county Rukiga-Kabale in South western Uganda.

The purpose of the project is to make sure the indigenous good seeds which reproduce good seeds are not made to diminish by the organizations promoting and selling genetically modified seeds which cannot produce seeds but make the peasant continue buying seeds every time of planting.

It also serves as source of food for the participants as well as selling extra as source of income generating project.

It also helps directly and indirectly promote plant food against people destroying animals as source of food.

The peasants also use natural organic farmyard manure and compost manure that does not contain chemicals and which improve soils.

So since September 2018 the women peasants started with bean and maize seeds in that once a home has a good harvest of these two types of seeds it can have a reasonable diet source and food security.

With SEND A SEED, the women peasants who are provided seeds, grow them and on harvesting they provide the same amount of seeds that they were given, to another woman peasant each. Thus the name SEND  A SEED. Then use the remaining as seeds and some as for food and extra for sale to get income for other basic needs.

At the moment we have a good harvest of seeds we are to distribute.

From our own efforts and support of well wishers we have managed to purchase a 10,000 liters rain water harvesting tank and we are able to store the water and use it during the dry season to irrigate the gardens and our crops that are not near the water sources but can benefit from the tank.

At the moment the elderly people in our community use the rain water harvesting tank to get water since they cannot easily access the far away good water from water protected springs.

As a result the rain water harvesting tank is emptied before the rains come again.

Hence we are kindly requesting that we get YOUR support so we buy and install an extra rain water harvesting tank of same volume too, that is 10,000 liters,so it can separately serve our elderly people and especially so during this pandemic of the Corona Virus where water, good sanitation and hygiene are very essential for survival, but also thereafter for these vulnerable people in our community.

The cost budgeted materials are as follows:

Cost of the rain water harvesting tank including its transport and transport of its accessories = 650 British Pounds.

Cost of tank accessories; gutters,taps,pipes and other related plumbing

= 100 British Pounds Sterling

Cost of slab materials, construction and general labour for the tank installation

= 100 British Pound Sterling

Totaling to British Pound Sterling 850.

Contribute using the “BACK IT” button.

HOPE KEMIREMBE

Contact me: hopekemirembe4@gmail.com

NEW: THIS FUNDRAISING CAMPAIGN ENDED.CONTACT US THROUGH ABOVE EMAIL:

THANK YOU.

story:
Greetings from SEND A SEED women’s project Mparo,Uganda.

We wish to thank those who gave us support in all forms; financial,material,ideas and otherwise that enabled the start of the project.

I am Kemirembe Hope(In the above photo),the leader of  SEND A SEED women’s project Mparo Kabale

The project was started by the women peasants in Mparo Parish,Rwamucucu Sub-county Rukiga-Kabale in South western Uganda.

The purpose of the project is to make sure the indigenous good seeds which reproduce good seeds are not made to diminish by the organizations promoting and selling genetically modified seeds which cannot produce seeds but make the peasant continue buying seeds every time of planting.

It also serves as source of food for the participants as well as selling extra as source of income generating project.

It also helps directly and indirectly promote plant food against people destroying animals as source of food.

The peasants also use natural organic farmyard manure and compost manure that does not contain chemicals and which improve soils.

So since September 2018 the women peasants started with bean and maize seeds in that once a home has a good harvest of these two types of seeds it can have a reasonable diet source and food security.

With SEND A SEED, the women peasants who are provided seeds, grow them and on harvesting they provide the same amount of seeds that they were given, to another woman peasant each. Thus the name SEND  A SEED. Then use the remaining as seeds and some as for food and extra for sale to get income for other basic needs.

At the moment we have a good harvest of seeds we are to distribute.

From our own efforts and support of well wishers we have managed to purchase a 10,000 liters rain water harvesting tank and we are able to store the water and use it during the dry season to irrigate the gardens and our crops that are not near the water sources but can benefit from the tank.The rain water tanks also serve the purpose of collecting water from the roofs of the buildings which would otherwise be running water causing soil erosion and floods thus damaging the environment, peoples property and crops.

At the moment the elderly people in our community use the rain water harvesting tank to get water since they cannot easily access the far away good water from water protected springs.

As a result the rain water harvesting tank is emptied before the rains come again.

Hence we are kindly requesting that we get YOUR support so we buy and install an extra rain water harvesting tank of same volume too, that is 10,000 liters,so it can separately serve our elderly people and especially so during this pandemic of the Corona Virus where water, good sanitation and hygiene are very essential for survival, but also thereafter for these vulnerable people in our community.

We also modify the rain water harvesting tanks such that they are able to carry more water than specified one, make no water losses as well as be able to serve other smaller  tanks and dug out wells.

The cost budgeted materials are as follows:

Cost of the rain water harvesting tank including its transport and transport of its accessories = 650 British Pounds.

Cost of tank accessories; gutters,taps,pipes and other related plumbing

= 100 British Pounds Sterling

Cost of slab materials, construction and general labour for the tank installation

= 100 British Pound Sterling

Totaling to British Pound Sterling 850.

We have so far raised in total British Pound Sterling 200.

So we need British Pound Sterling 650.

This does not include indiegogo fees 0f 5% and bank transfer charges of £25.

Contribute using the “BACK IT” button.

HOPE KEMIREMBE

Contact me: hopekemirembe4@gmail.com

NB: THIS CAMPAIGN ENDED.CONTACT US THROUGH ABOVE EMAIL.

THANK YOU.

story:
ProntoBev chills a whole bottle in 30 seconds.

 

No one likes a warm drink on a hot day. Wine, vodka, lemonade, tea, water, and everything else tastes better chilled. Stop wasting time by the fridge and don’t water your drinks down with ice. Use ProntoBev the world’s fastest beverage chiller! Its simple, efficient, and easily portable.

 

ProntoBev chills just about any drink!

 

You can finally free up your fridge space and get rid of those ice buckets. ProntoBev uses patent pending technology to chill an entire bottle to a specific temperature in just 30 seconds or less. 

 

 

So whether you forgot to chill that special bottle, just got a new one, or prefer your drink chilled at a certain temperature, ProntoBev is here.

 

 

ProntoBev is the fastest way to rapidly chill your warm beverages to refrigerator cold. In 30 seconds, it can can bring the temperature of the your drinks down by 20 degrees Fahrenheit in 30 seconds! That’s 40x faster than putting it in the freezer!

Save refrigerator space and get your beverages cold when you want them. Instantly chill wine, coffee, tea, liquor, juice, water, or just about anything!

 

 

ProntoBev’s interior is constructed with wine-grade stainless steel, the same material used in the winemaking process so it won’t affect taste or quality.

And our ProntoGel is so powerful, it can chill your drink to sub-freezing temperatures!

 

ProntoBev can bring the temperature of the your drinks 40x faster than putting it in the freezer!

 

ProntoBev can chill your drinks to below freezing temperatures!*

*Chilling a drink to below freezing temperatures will null the taste of your drink. But if desired, ProntoBev will take a few minutes to bring drink to below freezing temperatures.

 

ProntoBev can hold 750ml of liquid, that’s a whole bottle of wine!

 

ProntoBev can be used multiple times before returning to the freezer.*

*The first bottle should take about 30 seconds. Additional bottle may take slightly longer, but still way faster than a fridge or freezer

 

Use the built-in thermometer to know when your beverage is perfect

Wine-grade stainless steel means taste is kept pure and unaffected.

 

 

 

We wanted to perfect every part of the wine experience. That's why we also made ProntoAer, the world’s fastest aerator. which fits seamlessly on your ProntoBev or any glass.

 

 

No more backlog on your pour, spilled drinks, or large decanters. Use it for any occasion to improve the taste, aroma, and overall enjoyment of your wine drinking experience.

 

 

Sometimes a single glass is all you need and other times, you want to enjoy the entire bottle.

 

 

ProntoAer works comfortably on top of a variety of glasses, so you can aerate and enjoy as much or as little wine that you want.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

You don't have to be a sommelier to understand the importance of serving wine at the right temperature. Chill an entire bottle of wine in 30 seconds! So whether you forgot to chill that special bottle, just got a new one, or prefer wine at its intended temperature, ProntoBev is here.

 

 

 

 

Love iced coffee? So do we. With ProntoBev, you don’t have to wait and water down your coffee. Chill your whole batch instantly so you can have a refreshing wake-me-up immediately in the morning.

 

 

Iced tea is a refreshing summertime drink that takes a bit of time to prepare and let cool. Brew your tea the usual way and throw it in ProntoBev chilling it quickly creating instant ice tea that everyone can enjoy.

 

 

 

Watery, ice-cold whiskey is difficult to enjoy, which is why we avoid using ice in our whiskey. Quality whiskey is determined in tasting its unique characteristics. Ice diminishes the fragrance and dilutes the taste. ProntoBev allows you to chill your whiskey without destroying what makes it great.

 

 

Sweet, sweet vodka can sometimes not be so sweet. ProntoBev will quickly chill your vodka to an enjoyable temperature that can completely nullify the taste of alcohol. No more waiting by the freezer to get the party going!

 

 

The prototype in this demonstration had some issues with the built-in thermometer. So we decided to show you the temperature difference with an external thermometer.
 

Watch the ProntoAer in full speed action!

story:
We are Rosemary Wilson and Joseph Perez and we are the co-owners of Flower Coffee Collective, a mobile purveyor of specialty coffee in the Long Branch community.

The vibrant Long Branch business district is full of diverse and interesting options. One thing we knew it was lacking was a specialty coffee shop: a space to get high quality brews and espresso, & for the community to gather.  As local residents invested in our community, we were really inspired by all the work that was being done between local businesses and neighbors to get through Covid and quarantine together. We saw a place for coffee and community and we began building Flower Coffee Collective. While a brick and mortar seemed a bit tricky at a time when the country was only beginning to consider vaccines and reopening plans, we decided to shift to a mobile format. We quickly realized that this business model would also enable us to create relationships and partnerships, which was one of our biggest goals. Throughout the past few months we have learned so much about the Long Branch businesses and the services and collaboration Montgomery County and Montgomery Housing Partnership provides. We have met so many local community leaders and been connected to many resources. We are so thankful and amazed. 

We aim to be an inclusive space that serves offerings at many price points, a community partner complimenting existing business, bringing additional life to parks and outdoor community spaces.  Each of our vendors are local and are thoughtfully chosen...

We cannot wait to serve our neighbors some delicious coffee! 

What We Need & What You Get

Now we are only a few short weeks from our (fingers crossed) mid June opening! But opening a new business during a pandemic is especially tricky and we are trying to raise additional funds to ensure we can have the best shot at success. Our goal is to raise $10,000 for our shop.

Here's where we need your help:

  • Our logo, graphic design and hand-painted menus were done by the extremely talented Halsey Berryman of New Columbia Designs. She will be hand painting our trailer and we would love to have as much of her creative plan completed when we open.
  • We plan to hold some special events to celebrate our opening- we are thinking sunrise yoga, children's musician in the park, live bands; and we could put those on with your support
  • Helping build a cushion for operational costs during a time when Covid continues to effect the the supply chain and pricing. 

In addition to getting a fabulous coffee shop in the neighborhood, everyone who contributes will score some awesome perks!

 

 $25 - 5 drink punch card 

$50 - 5 drink punch card, logo sticker

 $75 -  5 drink punch card, logo sticker, Civilitea sampler

$100- 5 drink punch card, logo sticker, comfy t-shirt and Civilitea sampler

$150 - everything above +Founding Friend Flower Coffee Collective camper mug

$200 - above + Invite to Launch Party 

$500+ VIP invite to Launch Party with drink tickets + above Flower Coffee swag

Other Ways You Can Help

Not all support is financial...

Please share this campaign with your network or on social media! 

Please share this campaign page with friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it, via text or email. 

Shout us out on social media, sharing our website or social media accounts: www.flowercoffeeco.com and @flowercoffeeco on Instagram and Facebook

story:
This wine tool set is compact, simple, and easy to store. It's the most convenient and affordable way to open, pour, and preserve wine.

  • An Easy to Use Foil Cutter

 

Simply remove foil by placing the cutter on the top of the bottle and squeezing it while turning. Lift the cutter away and the foil comes off, leaving the cork exposed. 

  • Conveniently Open Wine In One-click

 

Unlike other manual wine openers, the electric Vinotok wine opener set saves time and effort. It removes the cork in 7 seconds with one click and won't break the cork or chip the wine bottle. Open your wine with ease, every time.

 

  • Decanting The Wine In 30 Seconds

 

Leaving a wine bottle open to the air reduces the tannins & astringency to make wine taste smoother. Now, with Vinotok, there is no need to wait for hours to decant the wine. The built-in aerator device adds oxygen that interacts with the wine quickly, to speed up the oxidation process. Unlike other wine sets that lack this feature, Vinotok allows you to perfectly optimize flavors & aromas in just 30 seconds and make the wine taste better.

 

  • Pour Easily Without Wasting A Single Drop

 

Vinotok’s specially designed pourer lets you pour perfectly and drip-free to avoid messy mistakes for proper presentation. It allows you to serve the wine quickly, is easy to clean, and is suitable for all kinds of wine bottles.

 

  • Preserve The Delicate Taste Of Your Wine

 

Vinotok’s vacuum wine stopper replaces the cork and slows down the oxidation process to maintain the freshness and taste of opened wine for up to 7 days. The vacuum function of Vinotok helps to preserve your wine by removing air from the open bottle to preserve quality. This wine stopper also features a timer, which allows you to keep track of how long your wine has been opened.

 

With contemporary stylish looks, long-lasting durability, and user-friendly design, Vinotok makes a useful accessory for home, restaurant, or bar use. 

The Vinotok 3 in 1 wine tool makes a great gift for family, friends, or to treat yourself. 

 

Vinotok is conveniently rechargeable with an onboard battery. With each charge, Vinotok can be used up to 40 times.

story:
Grace & Joel here...

We're thrilled announce the launch of Wallflower Coffee Company! We can't wait to join the Portland coffee scene and, even more so, to have you as a part of the journey.

Over the course of our friendship, we bonded over our affinity for the craft of coffee, as well as a deep love for building relationships and community experiences. We have always seen hospitality at the core of that: being welcomed into a place where you feel wanted and appreciated — the kind of space you want to return to again and again because you are remembered and known. Our respective work backgrounds reflect this belief, bringing a mix of experience from customer service, to nonprofit work, to event planning and creative entrepreneurship. 

Covid-19 and all the other events of 2020 have had many difficult and heartbreaking effects on our industry and our city. Now more than ever, it is essential to rise to the occasion to bring unity and inclusion to our community. As we begin to open up more, we get to be part of the collective healing of Portland and on the frontlines of a new normal. We understand the tact, compassion, and analytics that will be necessary for this. We look forward to growing as a business alongside this changing culture.

Wallflower is a ragtag, dream-come-true endeavor. When we encountered the opportunity to take over a location in SE, we began tirelessly working on our vision and paperwork to make it happen. THANK YOU for the support and encouragement you've given in this process. We are aiming to open in early May, and counting down the days to when we can have you in our shop.

Many of you have asked how you can help, so here it is:

we can't do this without you -- and, truly, we wouldn't want to. 

 

Long Story Short...

We need funding!  This has always been the dream, but the opportunity came up out of the blue. It feels like everything is falling into place. We have saved up capital, had discussions with investors, and are on our way. Still, startup costs add up quick so, humbly, we are asking for your help. 

All contributions go toward remodeling, first month's rent and payroll, and initial supplies. 

 

Other ways you can help...

It sounds cliché, but actually any amount will help getting us started. That being said, we understand that not everyone is in a place to give right now. Sharing about Wallflower and our campaign by word of mouth and social media is a significant assistance for us. And, of course, coming to visit once our doors open!
story_txt: Grace & Joel here...We're thrilled announce the launch of Wallflower Coffee Company! We can't wait to join the Portland coffee scene and, even more so, to have you as a part of the journey.Over the course of our friendship, we bonded over our affinity for the craft of coffee, as well as a deep love for building relationships and community experiences. We have always seen hospitality at the core of that: being welcomed into a place where you feel wanted and appreciated — the kind of space you want to return to again and again because you are remembered and known. Our respective work backgrounds reflect this belief, bringing a mix of experience from customer service, to nonprofit work, to event planning and creative entrepreneurship. Covid-19 and all the other events of 2020 have had many difficult and heartbreaking effects on our industry and our city. Now more than ever, it is essential to rise to the occasion to bring unity and inclusion to our community. As we begin to open up more, we get to be part of the collective healing of Portland and on the frontlines of a new normal. We understand the tact, compassion, and analytics that will be necessary for this. We look forward to growing as a business alongside this changing culture.Wallflower is a ragtag, dream-come-true endeavor. When we encountered the opportunity to take over a location in SE, we began tirelessly working on our vision and paperwork to make it happen. It feels like everything is falling into place. We have saved up capital, had discussions with investors, and are on our way. Still, startup costs add up quick so, humbly, we are asking for your help. All contributions go toward remodeling, first month's rent and payroll, and initial supplies.  Other ways you can help...It sounds cliché, but actually any amount will help getting us started. That being said, we understand that not everyone is in a place to give right now. Sharing about Wallflower and our campaign by word of mouth and social media is a significant assistance for us. And, of course, coming to visit once our doors open!

story:
Alla har så jävla mycket drömmar i livet,  vi har aldrig haft det förens nu.
Vår dröm är att få öppna Lokalen. 


Lokalen föddes när vi pratade om vad vi egentligen vela göra med våra liv och vi insåg att det var rätt simpelt. Vi vill dricka öl och fika i gott sällskap.
Lokalen är det stället vi alltid saknat, en ungdomsgård för vuxna ish, eller café/bar eller vad man än vill kalla det. 

En viktig faktor för oss är att det ska kännas hemma, familjärt och lättillgängligt. Inget pretentiöst tjafs. du behöver inte vara någon som är någon för att hänga här, du behöver bara vara någon som gillar chips och dipp, brädspel och mysigt häng.

Om denna drömmen får bli verklighet, genom era bidrag, så kan ni komma hit och ta en kaffe som blir en öl, eller en öl som blir en kaffe. Vårt mål är också att kunna ha olika typer av tillställningar som tex vernissager, spelningar, spelkvällar och allt annat som känns kul. 
Vi vill också kunna erbjuda annan typ av affärsverksamhet som att sälja växter och uppgraderade seconhandfynd bland annat.
Allt känns inte solklart att formulera i ord än, men vi vet att detta är ett ställe som inte finns på marknaden än och vi vill så jävla gärna kunna få ge er det.

story:
Greetings from SEND A SEED women’s project Mparo,Uganda.

We wish to thank those who gave us support in all forms; financial,material,ideas and otherwise that enabled the start of the project.

I am Kemirembe Hope,the leader of  SEND A SEED women’s project Mparo Kabale

The project was started by the women peasants in Mparo Parish,Rwamucucu Sub-county Rukiga-Kabale in South western Uganda.

The purpose of the project is to make sure the indigenous good seeds which reproduce good seeds are not made to diminish by the organizations promoting and selling genetically modified seeds which cannot produce seeds but make the peasant continue buying seeds every time of planting.

It also serves as source of food for the participants as well as selling extra as source of income generating project.

It also helps directly and indirectly promote plant food against people destroying animals as source of food.

The peasants also use natural organic farmyard manure and compost manure that does not contain chemicals and which improve soils.

So since September 2018 the women peasants started with bean and maize seeds in that once a home has a good harvest of these two types of seeds it can have a reasonable diet source and food security.

With SEND A SEED,the women peasants who are provided seeds, grow them and on harvesting they provide the same amount of seeds that they were given, to another woman peasant each. Thus the name SEND  A SEED.Then use the remaining as seeds and some as for food and extra for sale to get income for other basic needs.

20 kilograms of seeds yield approximately 100 kilogrammes on harvesting.

Bean seeds cost Uganda Shs 3000/- per kilogram while Maize seeds cost Uganda Shs 2000/- per kilogram

20 Kgs of Bean seeds cost U Shs 60,000/- while 20 Kgs Maize seeds cost 40,000/- .Totaling to U Shillings 100,000/- (One hundred thousands)

This is the cost of seeds for each woman.

There are already 20 members in the project.We would like to increase the members with the seeds to at least 40

To provide such an amount to at least 40 women peasants;

40x 100,000/- = 4,000,000/= (Uganda Shillings four millions)

Equivalent to British Pound Sterling 800.

So we are appealing to you to contribute to this fundraising to enable the project be a success.

You will also get perks for backing our campaign as indicated on the campaign page.

Contribute to the campaign using the BACK IT Button on the campaign page.

HOPE KEMIREMBE

Contact me: hopekemirembe4@gmail.com

NOTE THAT: This campaign ended.Contact us through the above email.

THANK YOU.

story:
An easy-to-use, easy-to-clean lid that lets people serve food from aluminum foil pans that’s eco-friendly and keeps bugs, fingers, and germs out of the food. 

Hi Everyone! Here is my story of QuikLid.

I threw a birthday party for my brother with lots of family and friends.  I cooked enough food for a small army, set up the serving table, then let them know “It's time to dig in".

I watched food dripping onto the table, foil and plastic wrap coverings pushed into the food, food getting on people’s hands, and saw children dipping their dirty hands into the food. I thought, “there has to be a better way.” But it wasn’t until the end of the party when I was cleaning up and saw all the dirty foil and plastic wrap in the garbage...

 

QuikLid is the perfect reusable lid for aluminum pans.  It fits snuggly over the pan and is held in place by flanges on each side. You see the food inside, serve from either side, and you can keep the lid open making it easy to serve food while holding a plate or a glass. We made the QuikLid from thick polycarbonate to help keep foods hot or cold, so the first serving is as good as the last serving.

When the serving starts and lots of people are lined up, you can position the lid to stay open so it’s easy to serve while holding a plate in your other hand.

Since QuikLid's are rigid, they don’t dip into the food and you can stack multiple pans on top of each other for easy transport.

When the party is over, take the leftovers by just closing the lid – no fighting with crinkled, dirty foil or stuck-to-it-self plastic wrap.

 QuikLid can go in the fridge and the oven (up to 230°), so you don’t have to use any disposable coverings on food that is prepared ahead and kept cold or while it’s warming before serving. QuikLid can go directly from the refrigerator to a warm oven, no problem.

Dishwasher Safe – Cleanup is a snap - just put your QuikLid into the dishwasher with your other dishes. 

 

Good for the Planet!

QuikLid is reusable and will last for years, keeping dozens of pounds of plastic and foil out of landfills. Since QuikLid is made of polycarbonate, they can be recycled and made into something else.

 

 

 

 

 

TIMELINE

 

 

SPECIFICATIONS

 

 

1 YEAR WARRANTY

 

We believe in our product and stand behind it.  We give you a 1-year warranty against defects in the material or workmanship. The only thing we can’t warrant against is scratching since we don’t know how you will care for and wash your QuikLid.    

 

MEET OUR TEAM

 

Nicole is a serial entrepreneur and inventor. Quik Lid Products, Inc is her third company. In addition to QLP,  Nicole owns and operates a management consulting firm and a mental health counseling agency, Neighborhood Community Services which is structured to foster and support healthy families, allowing her to be deeply involved in serving her local community. 

Lin is an award-winning industrial designer and artist who has developed consumer, environmental, automotive, and industrial products for companies like Rubbermaid Commercial, Daniel Defense, and Kraco Enterprises, as well as designed office, retail, manufacturing, laboratory, and other spaces for a range of companies.

Alan was Vice President of Marketing & Sales for several US and European companies, co-founded and sold a company to an F500 buyer, and founded his own companies. For the past 20+ years, he has been consulting with startup and early-stage companies helping more than 100 founders bring their ideas to life.

Elonda Stokes is the founder of Stokes Marketing, an Atlanta-based Branding, and Marketing Agency committed to helping small businesses attract more customers, increase their profits, and position their brand as the ultimate solution provider within their industry. As an established professional with more than 12 years of experience in marketing, Elonda has worked with hundreds of small businesses in various sectors, including celebrity clients in the entertainment industry.

 

Risks and Challenges

MANUFACTURING- While we have gone through multiple designs, manufacturing reviews, and prototypes, and have high confidence in our team and the factory team until the production tooling is made and the first production units are produced, we won’t know for sure that the product meets our expectations. We absolutely will not ship a product that we are not 100% satisfied with, but we are highly confident that the work we have done will result in a great product. If not, we will fix it and keep you informed, if we run into problems.

ENVIRONMENTAL COMMITMENTS SUSTAINABLE DESIGN- The whole point of The QuikLid was to eliminate plastic and aluminum going into landfills and we believe that we have achieved that goal. Your QuikLid will last for many years and is made of pure polycarbonate, so it can be infinitely recycled.

SHIPPING & SALES TAX- We expect to start shipping Rewards 60 to 70 days after the close of the campaign, depending on the schedule at the factory. If sales tax is due in your state, we will contact you when the campaign closes with the tax amount and to arrange payment.

story:
Overview

Hello everyone, my name is Eileen Payan. I am an Arizona native, enthusiastic about all things food, and founder and owner of Por Vida Bakery. Por Vida is in collaboration with Palabras Bilingual Bookstore to bring the community a unique experience of Latin culture and art in literature and baked goods.

Mission: To provide Latinx pastries by utilizing local, organic, and high quality ingredients to lend a sense of nostalgia and excitement in every bite. In turn, help my community with resources due to I.C.E. and deportation, and help young adults become entrepreneurs so they too can help their community.

About Me

 I am a self taught baker with 10+ years of kitchen experience. I have such a passion for all things food. I have worked in every type of kitchen setting. This is my life, for life, POR VIDA!!

In August 2014, my family's life changed forever. In front of my neighbors, in front of my child and myself, we witnessed the abduction of my husband by I.C.E. I froze. I was scared for my husband and worried for my 5 year old child. I didn't know who to call, what to do, nor did I have the financial resources to hire a lawyer. I felt helpless and alone. Six years later, this topic still hurts and upsets me. I always wished I knew of some sort of organization or outlet that could have provided help, group sessions, financial resources such as fundraising opportunities due to income being cut in half. I didn't know of any. I felt clueless. One day in 2019 at Palabras Bilingual Bookstore, I shared my story in front of a group of people. As painful as it was to conjure up these feelings, it felt good to let it out. This sparked something in me. I knew it that moment that my experiences could be a source of solace to others. I just didn't know how to go about it. A few months later, Chawa, the owner of Palabras Bilingual Bookstore, spoke with me and told me how much she's enjoyed my pastries and that my story inspired her and she wanted to help. That was the birth of Por Vida Bakery. I believe, through my own personal experience, providing a space for people to share their story while eating pastries baked with love will be therapeutic. I want others impacted the way my family was to know that they are not alone and they have support.

What We Need & What You Get

Currently, I am working in the bakery department for another company. This is my "bread and butter" if you will. This income is to sustain my family's well-being and I intend to remain employed there as long as it makes sense for me and my family. In regards to Por Vida Bakery, I have acquired my proper licenses, secured a kitchen space, and we (Chawa and I) have obtained a beautiful space coming soon in the Central/Downtown Phoenix area. With your help, I will be able to buy what I need for Por Vida to expand and grow my business. In order to do that, I need to raise $13,500 for:

  • Register System
  • New Oven
  • 2x Refrigerator (One for Kitchen, One for Retail Space)
  • Large Freezer
  • Display Case
  • Toaster Oven
  • 6 Months rent and utilities for kitchen space and for shared space with Palabras
  • Other things to be functional such as ingredients, cups, napkins, etc.
  • Additional amount to cover campaign promotion and Indiegogo fees (.03 for each credit card processed and 5% of funds raised)

Perks

As a thank you for your support, I am offering some "sweet" deals including recipes, "How To" videos on how to make some of my favorite pastries, shirt with " Por Vida" logo, Por Vida membership with 10% off, and much more!

The Impact

By supporting Por Vida Bakery, you are:

  • Supporting the success of a Latina owned business
  • Helping Por Vida support the community affected by I.C.E. and Deportation
  • Teach young adults to be entrepreneurs so they can help their community
  • Increase awareness of our culture and give children more of an opportunity to see themselves in books they read from Palabras Bilingual Bookstore because of our collaboration
  • Create a safe space to help those share their most vulnerable moment 

Risks & Challenges

Right now , I find that I am not able to bake at my full potential capacity. I am currently obligated to working two jobs to support my family. By baking a mass quantity, I will be able to bake for Por Vida/Palabras, Farmers Market, and consignment for two locations that I've secured, in addition to future consignments.

The oven I work with now causes me to work double and I encounter constant glitches. In my experience, working in a professional kitchen for so long, I know that I have potential to work more efficiently with more quality appliances.

In regards to baking, everything has to be timed exactly. With a quality oven, my time will be used to its maximum capacity which will allow me to work more efficiently for my business and customers. The extra free time will be appreciated because I can spend it with my family.

Other Ways You Can Help

Your donations will support me in purchasing the remaining items needed to launch Por Vida Bakery. If you are not in position to support with a monetary donation, please know that sharing this with your network would be invaluable to me and greatly appreciated.

Thank you from the bottom of my heart

Por Vida Bakery's founder and owner,

Eileen Payan

story:
An intelligent locking mechanism allows a solid grip between storage boxes and lid, whilst having a special slot to perfectly fit our silicone joint preventing any potential leakage and making the boxes airtight.  

Our modular box system allows you to choose the variety of food you would like to enjoy anywhere, anytime. The food compartments come in several shapes and forms, all with an exclusive semi-transparent, milky finish.  

The most groundbreaking innovation are our special pads. For each food box there is a matching pad which is directly placed below the box. Thanks to the soft touch locking mechanism the pads can easily be attached and removed.

Freeze it, than... 

...heat it at lunch!


 

Fork, spoon...and a smaller spoon!

Each lunch box comes with a stainless steel cutlery set, consisting of a fork, spoon, and a smaller spoon for desserts. 

Highest quality, BPA free and LFGB certified plastic materials were specifically designed for food storing purposes. A neatly set up cutlery compartment rounds up a brilliant overall interior case design.  

Design is not everything. Without practicability even the most sophisticated designs remain unused. The Numee boxes securely stack up on each other to safe up refrigerator and shelf space, making it ideal for storing purposes. 

An intelligent locking mechanism allows a solid grip between storage boxes and lid, whilst having a special slot to perfectly fit our silicone joint preventing any potential leakage and making the boxes airtight.  

High tech meets cutting edge design

The boxes are dishwasher friendly, freezer safe and microwave approved. All compartments are made of durable high-quality materials that underwent thorough stress testing processes. Aside from their shock proof nature, all boxes are super lightweight to make them most suitable for transportation purposes. 

Cork has fantastic characteristics that were used since ancient times. Due to the honeycomb structure it is a super light material. However, cork is extremely durable, shock and sound absorbing. We are using a special Cork that was harvested through environmentally  sustainable methods. A 100% natural, biodegradable and completely eco-friendly. Choose between our three exclusive cork types to suit your unique style. 

 Dear Backer,

This is our first kickstarter project and we are more than delighted to finally present you the product we have invested all our blood sweat and tears over the last two years. 

It basically started with two friends complaining about a struggle we had day in day out.

What is our lunch break meal going to be?

We do not know for you guys, but we had only a very limited number of stores we could grab some decent food. Well, after weeks and months and years repeating the discussion, never achieving a satisfying solution, we started to question if we would like to proceed in such a manner. 

It wasn’t adding to a happier, nor healthier life, that’s for sure. Unfortunately, all our endeavors to change these bad lunch habits of ours, were somewhat nipped in the bud. Planning, preparing and carrying our homemade lunches were quite depressing. We could have never imagined that such a conversation would become an obsession that would ultimately lead to such a phenomenal creation, that we have named Numee. During the process we have met and convinced our team members to support us along the journey, that had quite some ups and downs. 

Revisions, delays and doubts have stolen a lot of sleeping hours. But we made it. We have created something, that has never existed in such a form and beauty yet. We have made it so far, that we have even started the patenting process of our cooling mechanisms, as it literally revolutionizes food mobility. At this point we would like to express our gratitude towards our visionary team, that never wavered to believe in our common greater goal. Without them, all this would not be possible.

Your support is essential.

We are ready! Your support is now of outmost importance to realize our big dream and go into serial production, creating a movement, a hype, to make the world a better place by starting with our everyday lunch.fe, that’s for sure. During the process we have met and convinced our team members to support us along the journey, that had quite some ups and downs. Revisions, delays and doubts have stolen a lot of sleeping hours.  

But we made it.  We have created something, that has never existed in such a form and beauty yet. We have made it so far, that we have even started the patenting process of our cooling mechanisms, as it literally revolutionizes food mobility.  At this point we would like to express our gratitude towards our visionary team, that never wavered to believe in our common greater goal. Without them, all this would not be possible.

story:
Meet the IceBreaker Pro –  the food-grade stainless steel sleeve that fits inside virtually any standard cocktail shaker to improve the shaking process, allowing cocktails to cool faster while enabling flavors to open up for a consistently perfect drink experience. Invented and inspired by bartenders who appreciate the craft of creating cocktails, the patent-pending design is a simple and alternative method for dry shaking, muddling, whipping, micro-blending, and even frothing.

 

Why IceBreaker Pro?

Created for both professionals and amateurs to improve cocktail creation efficiency and make experimenting with different mixology methods easier. The IceBreaker Pro is made of flexible yet durable food-grade stainless steel with a protective coating and is dishwasher safe. With 44 micro-blending smooth cut strategically positioned icebreakers, it comes in three sizes to choose from including Large (29-32oz shaker), Medium (25-28oz shaker) and Small (18-24oz shaker).

Who's the IceBreaker Pro for?

We understand that this tool is not a substitute for mixologists who value the art of traditional cocktail making, but we think it is a way to get more people interested in the cocktail craft that we all enjoy. After months of development, our team is excited to share our new product with the cocktail community so everyone can have a cool cocktail with us!
 
 
 

The Gift of Crowdsourcing

The magic of this platform is that it helps a small startup like ours to turn a dream into a reality. We have gone through several prototype iterations and have finalized our designs. We’ve worked with legal teams to secure patent-pending status, as well as packaging, promotions, influencer test samples, and much more.

Now we are ready to launch!

With the help of the Indiegogo platform and YOU, we are raising the capital to manufacture the IceBreaker Pro and fulfill our first orders. We genuinely appreciate you helping turn our passion project into a reality. THANK YOU!

story:
The Noel Family Distillery is a craft distillery and tasting room in Donaldsonville, LA launching soon.  

Our distillery sits on the banks of the mighty Mississippi River in Donaldsonville, Louisiana, where five generations of the Noel family have been born and raised. This is the heart of sugarcane country.  

Our family’s passion and expertise will be poured into every bottle, resulting in a truly exceptional line of craft-spirits perfected with natural flavors - an accessible luxury for anyone who wants an authentic Louisiana experience with every sip.

But...We need your help! 

 

Innovative Spirits 

 

Join Our Movement

The brand we are building is thoughtful, community-driven, quality-focused, & innovative.

You don’t have to be a resident of Donaldsonville to be a part of our community, to appreciate what we are doing for our city and state, and to value the craft spirits industry in Louisiana.  

“We want to bring the beauty of southern culture and a love for the craft together for anyone and everyone to enjoy,” says Natalie Noel when asked about her vision for the Noel Family Distillery and their thoughtfully curated array of spirits. “We are a family business, and we are community-driven in every aspect – from cultivating the crops to distilling to distributing. Our passion and our heritage are laced throughout the entire process, and that’s something worth sharing.”

Community Grown. Family Made.

 

People don’t often emotionally connect with a distillery or spirits brand.  We know most people will continue to grab the same rum or vodka they always chose but for those who expect more than just “whatever you got” - will appreciate what drives us.  

The Noel Family Distillery is a majority woman-owned distillery. Donaldsonville native Natalie Noel, together with her father, Master Distiller Chip Noel, has partnered with local sugarcane farmers to create a truly community-driven distillery which transforms locally-harvested crops into the family’s delicious spirits.

Our spirits are not just a fusion of high-end ingredients, diligent processes, and generations-old family recipes. They’re also the tangible culmination of the grit, passion, and heart of our sugarcane farmers.

We are creating a brand with a foundation that is community-driven  - we will tell the stories of the farmers and people that make our products and community special with every spirit we release. 

A Family Business 

 

(Chip and Natalie, 1984)

During Christmas of 2016, Chip revealed to Natalie his dream of opening a distillery. Through his career as a pilot, he was fortunate to travel around the world and enjoy delicious spirits, especially premium aged rum.

(Chip and Natalie, 1994)

As a lifelong resident of Donaldsonville and son of a second generation sugarcane farmer, he often wondered why no one had turned the sugarcane into rum or another fine spirit. He envisioned that the blend of aged rum distilled with fresh-pressed Louisiana sugarcane juice, molasses, cane syrup, and fresh sugar would make the spirit a bit more Southern and the layers more complex - not to mention, delicious.

Natalie, who earned an MBA from LSU and runs her own marketing agency, felt the marriage of these ideas would be an amazing opportunity to show the passion and products of Louisiana in a unique, delicious, and festive manner. “I have always loved the way spirits and cocktails can bring people closer together and create community, especially here in Louisiana. It’s practically a way of life.” In bringing her father’s dream to life, Natalie says, “I jumped at the chance to create something special that people could enjoy with those they love the most. People having a great time because of something my dad and I made is a super cool bonus, too.”

 

Why Donaldsonville, LA?

Geographic Advantages  

The foundation of our business is built upon partnering with our local cane farmers, taking advantage of our close proximity to our local sugar mill by opening up a world-class distillery right in the heart of sugarcane country.  Millions of pounds of sugar are harvested and processed in our area each year.

In addition to the traditional sugar and molasses, we will produce a unique product known as Rhum Agricole. Originally native to Martinique (like Champagne is to France), Rhum Agricole is made from fresh-pressed cane juice which means the fermentation process must begin within hours of the cane being pressed. This process is only possible for distilleries located within literal miles of the sugar mill, and due to the consolidation of mills over the past decade, there are fewer mills in operation. Fortunately for us, there is one within 15 miles of Donaldsonville, our hometown.

By being perfectly situated to help us produce this rare Rhum Agricole, Donaldsonville is uniquely positioned to house the Noel Family Distillery. The delicious result will be a rum that is complex, distinct, and unlike any other rum in the world.


Economic Impact

Leroy Sullivan, the mayor of the city of Donaldsonville, believes that the development of the Noel Family Distillery will “bring an economic impact to the city” and the surrounding areas, attracting locals and tourists alike for this unique taste of the south. Beyond the delicious sips, visitors can come to the distillery to get a firsthand look at how the product is made and bottled or to simply pull up a chair and enjoy a glass of the curated spirits and cocktails at the bar.

Historical Building

Our distillery is being built in a building that was erected in the late 1800’s. It has a storied past as the former power and light plant for the city of Donaldsonville, and we are excited to restore this historic gem. Upon completion, it will stand as a modern facility with nods to its past, and it will function as a destination for fine spirits lovers to flock to from around the world.

 

Here's where we are: 

For the last two-and-a-half years, we have been working hard on renovations to our physical location as well as completing necessary business steps. We have already:

  • Signed a long term lease for the distillery building
  • Received our permit to distill from the TTB
  • Completed our architectural and construction drawings
  • Ordered our handmade stills from Germany

(Mockup of tasting room)

Since we’re doing this from the ground up, we are now in the middle of a big push to raise capital. With no underwriters, our biggest supporters so far have been our friends, family, community farmers, and hopefully YOU. We are so grateful to everyone who has believed in our dream, and we are excited about the future of this unique distillery.

So, who can help us?
Anyone and everyone who loves fine-crafted spirits. Anyone who believes in the power of small businesses to help revitalize the community around them. Anyone who endeavors to support rural communities and the work of our farmers. Anyone who derives joy from helping others achieve their dreams.

Whether you contribute with a small donation or large scale investment, we are eternally grateful to you for getting us one step closer to our goal.

 

So How Do You Fit In?

Have you ever thought about starting a distillery or thought it would be cool to invest in one?  Now is your chance!

We are so close to the finish line after two-and-a-half years of working hard to make the Noel Family Distillery a reality, and with your help, our community-driven distillery can begin producing our delicious spirits.

Our goal is to raise at least $20,000 but we would certainly welcome anything above that to help pay for the remainder of our still and build-out, which includes our beautiful tasting room. Your support will also help us install the mandatory (but extremely expensive) high hazard, explosion-proof lights for the facility.

We can’t truly be a community-funded distillery without your help!

 

Making A Difference

Your contribution to our dream is literally larger than life. You will help create the moments that propel life. Think of everything realized, decided, and solved over a great cocktail - the good and bad of life.

For this project specifically, you will have the chance to be part of creating a next-generation distillery. 

“From our lands to your hands,” says Chip Noel, the master distiller and patriarch of the Noel Family. “We fill each of our bottles with artisanal spirits that embody our family history, our passion for craft, and the taste of our southern culture.

We can’t wait to share our products with you."

Thank you,

Noel Family Distillery 

 

To support the growth and development of the Noel Family Distillery, you can donate to this Indiegogo Campaign. For investment or equity, contact Natalie Noel at natalie@noeldistillery.com.
