story:
Serpiente Ultra Premium Tequila, the birthchild of innovation & great taste, is a new luxury tequila redefining the super premium spirits category! Serpiente Ultra Premium Tequila is a handcrafted premium tequila made from 100% Weber Blue Agave sourced from the valleys of Jalisco, Mexico. We make Serpiente in the heart of town where the now world famous spirit got its start, Tequila. Then we bottle it in mouth blown, crystal glass bottles handmade by skilled glass artisans. Due to our manufacturing process, no two bottles are exactly the same. Each bottle is unique, just like our consumers.

 

Visiting The Blue Agave Fields In Los Altos, Jalisco

 

We use a meticulously selected group of 100% Weber Blue Agave sourced directly from the valleys of Jalisco to make our tequila. We work with local Mexican farmers who grow and cultivate the blue agave for years until they reach maturity. With each bottle purchased, you will be helping to support the local economy in Jalisco and family owned businesses.

 

 

We utilize traditional slow baking, brick ovens and autoclaves to cook the blue agave hearts, and traditional molinos to extract the juices from the agave plant. We then wash the agave fibers with naturally refined water. Fermentation can take up to 50+ hours which gives us a more full bodied tequila/agave flavor. The final step is our single batch, double distillation process which leaves us with our amazing tasting Serpiente Ultra Premium Tequila Plata profile. 

 

 

Our Reposado & Añejo profiles are aged in American Oak Whiskey Barrels, for up to 8 months and 12 months, respectively. Our Extra Añejo Cristalino is aged for 3 years before it experiences a final special charcoal filtration process, resulting in an aged tequila that has the characteristics and flavor of an Extra Añejo but with the crisp, floral notes and clear appearance of a Plata. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Made To Be Sipped 

 

 

 

But then again who likes rules? Serpiente Ultra Premium Tequila 
can be enjoyed as the perfect marg or the cocktail of your imagination.  

 

Enjoy An Elevated Experience 

 

  

 

In order to increase product security, authentication and transparency in the supply chain, our bottles are equipped and sealed with a tamper-proof technology. Each bottle will have a unique digital ID that allows for chain of custody data to be captured & stored. Permanently registering that bottle & it's unique ID as an authentic product onto our customer loyalty system.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Luxury Redefined 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Our shipments and unique bottle IDs are tracked and maintained, providing all parties involved in the supply chain process increased levels of transparency, real time reporting, efficiency and product authentication. Counterfeit/unregulated alcohol is a growing issue globally and with an average of 25% or more of the alcohol in circulation being unregulated in some countries, with others getting as high as 50% or more! We offer our consumers increased confidence that the tequila they are drinking is an authentic product.

 

Just through a tap of their NFC enabled device to the Serpiente Ultra Premium Tequila bottle, the end consumer will be able to verify the product's authenticity. The enhanced bottles also give us the ability to interact with the consumer post purchase, providing us with an additional, more organic, direct to consumer marketing channel. 
 

 

On the front end, consumers will have the ability to sign up for our private membership club, accessible exclusively through our bottles. Extras like private events, free merchandise, discounts & promos will be sent out through our enhanced bottles.


Serpiente Ultra Premium Tequila is more than just alcohol, it's an experience. We're creating a community. Depending on the tequila profile purchased, the consumer will have access to exclusive extras, such as tequila tastings, art gallery exhibits, network events and private listening parties.

Elegant Packaging

 

 

 

 

 


Transparent Viewing Window

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Snakeskin Textured Box
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Tamper Proof Tech


Satin Inner Lining

 

 

 

 

 

Brand Launch

Serpiente Ultra Premium Tequila has secured distribution through our network of distributors and online retailers to have access to consumers in 30+ states. Your backing of this campaign will secure you one of our first edition limited release bottles. So if you aren't located in one of our designated launch states, don't worry, you can still order a bottle of Serpiente Ultra Premium Tequila! We will be expanding our footprint nationwide as we start to make our initial shipments. Whenever the first shipment is set for your state, your bottle will be a guaranteed part of the allocated inventory. As soon as we receive an contribution from a new state, we work with our independent wholesaler in that specific state to find a retailer in your area to assist in the fulfillment of your order!
 

AVAILABLE PROFILES

Plata | Reposado | Añejo | Extra Añejo Cristalino 

 

After your contribution for your selected tequila profile, you will receive a corresponding e-voucher when shipments are being imported into to the USA to the designated independent wholesaler and then to the retailers in order to claim your bottle. Backers in authorized states/cities that allow the shipping/delivery of alcohol can opt in the have their bottle delivered to their home through a licensed 3rd party!

Logisitics

Our goal is to start making our first deliveries in the USA by summer (June/July). We've been working on this project for almost three years now and we're finally at the end of the first leg of our marathon. We just want to thank you all in advance for those who have supported us already or are planning on supporting with a contribution. For those who can't, thank you for even taking the time our to check out our campaign. Share our campaign with your friends & family, spreading the word about us is FREE! 

 

CONTACT 

tequila@serpiente.io
https://www.serpiente.io
 

FOLLOW US

Instagram: @serpientequila
Facebook: @serpientequila
Twitter: @serpientequila


Serpiente Ultra Premium Tequila | Tequila For The BOLD!
story_txt:
Serpiente Ultra Premium Tequila, the birthchild of innovation & great taste, is a new luxury tequila redefining the super premium spirits category! Serpiente Ultra Premium Tequila is a handcrafted premium tequila made from 100% Weber Blue Agave sourced from the valleys of Jalisco, Mexico. We make Serpiente in the heart of town where the now world famous spirit got its start, Tequila. Then we bottle it in mouth blown, crystal glass bottles handmade by skilled glass artisans. Due to our manufacturing process, no two bottles are exactly the same. Each bottle is unique, just like our consumers. Visiting The Blue Agave Fields In Los Altos, Jalisco We use a meticulously selected group of 100% Weber Blue Agave sourced directly from the valleys of Jalisco to make our tequila. We work with local Mexican farmers who grow and cultivate the blue agave for years until they reach maturity. With each bottle purchased, you will be helping to support the local economy in Jalisco and family owned businesses.  We utilize traditional slow baking, brick ovens and autoclaves to cook the blue agave hearts, and traditional molinos to extract the juices from the agave plant. We then wash the agave fibers with naturally refined water. Fermentation can take up to 50+ hours which gives us a more full bodied tequila/agave flavor. The final step is our single batch, double distillation process which leaves us with our amazing tasting Serpiente Ultra Premium Tequila Plata profile.   Our Reposado & Añejo profiles are aged in American Oak Whiskey Barrels, for up to 8 months and 12 months, respectively. Our Extra Añejo Cristalino is aged for 3 years before it experiences a final special charcoal filtration process, resulting in an aged tequila that has the characteristics and flavor of an Extra Añejo but with the crisp, floral notes and clear appearance of a Plata.       Made To Be Sipped    But then again who likes rules? Serpiente Ultra Premium Tequila can be enjoyed as the perfect marg or the cocktail of your imagination.   Enjoy An Elevated Experience  
   In order to increase product security, authentication and transparency in the supply chain, our bottles are equipped and sealed with a tamper-proof technology. Each bottle will have a unique digital ID that allows for chain of custody data to be captured & stored. Permanently registering that bottle & it's unique ID as an authentic product onto our customer loyalty system.       Luxury Redefined        Our shipments and unique bottle IDs are tracked and maintained, providing all parties involved in the supply chain process increased levels of transparency, real time reporting, efficiency and product authentication. Counterfeit/unregulated alcohol is a growing issue globally and with an average of 25% or more of the alcohol in circulation being unregulated in some countries, with others getting as high as 50% or more! We offer our consumers increased confidence that the tequila they are drinking is an authentic product. Just through a tap of their NFC enabled device to the Serpiente Ultra Premium Tequila bottle, the end consumer will be able to verify the product's authenticity. The enhanced bottles also give us the ability to interact with the consumer post purchase, providing us with an additional, more organic, direct to consumer marketing channel.   On the front end, consumers will have the ability to sign up for our private membership club, accessible exclusively through our bottles. Extras like private events, free merchandise, discounts & promos will be sent out through our enhanced bottles.Serpiente Ultra Premium Tequila is more than just alcohol, it's an experience. We're creating a community. Depending on the tequila profile purchased, the consumer will have access to exclusive extras, such as tequila tastings, art gallery exhibits, network events and private listening parties.Elegant Packaging     Transparent Viewing Window        Snakeskin Textured Box           Tamper Proof TechSatin Inner Lining     Brand LaunchSerpiente Ultra Premium Tequila has secured distribution through our network of distributors and online retailers to have access to consumers in 30+ states. Your backing of this campaign will secure you one of our first edition limited release bottles. So if you aren't located in one of our designated launch states, don't worry, you can still order a bottle of Serpiente Ultra Premium Tequila! We will be expanding our footprint nationwide as we start to make our initial shipments. Whenever the first shipment is set for your state, your bottle will be a guaranteed part of the allocated inventory. As soon as we receive an contribution from a new state, we work with our independent wholesaler in that specific state to find a retailer in your area to assist in the fulfillment of your order! AVAILABLE PROFILESPlata | Reposado | Añejo | Extra Añejo Cristalino  After your contribution for your selected tequila profile, you will receive a corresponding e-voucher when shipments are being imported into to the USA to the designated independent wholesaler and then to the retailers in order to claim your bottle. Backers in authorized states/cities that allow the shipping/delivery of alcohol can opt in the have their bottle delivered to their home through a licensed 3rd party!LogisiticsOur goal is to start making our first deliveries in the USA by summer (June/July). We've been working on this project for almost three years now and we're finally at the end of the first leg of our marathon. We just want to thank you all in advance for those who have supported us already or are planning on supporting with a contribution. For those who can't, thank you for even taking the time our to check out our campaign. Share our campaign with your friends & family, spreading the word about us is FREE!

story:
What's Happening at the Lightbox Cafe

 

Gaby and Jen are service industry veterans on a mission to do something that's never been done. Amidst the drunken debauchery of cheesesteak alley, we're seeking to open an oasis of goodness and bliss. Lightbox Cafe will provide plant-powered food and drink without pretension within a day-to-night space for music, art, and conversation. Expect drag on Sunday afternoons, midday dance parties on a weekday and a booze-free bar scene of herbal elixirs.  Enjoy a shell of kava kava while locals share poetry. Sip tea with a vegan treat. Lightbox Cafe will be a container for brilliant incidences of community connection. 

 

We’ve invested $80,000 of our own funds and nearly a year of our lives hand-crafting PA’s first kava kava lounge, cold-pressed juicery, and plant-based cafe in the heart of Queen Village. We are a few short weeks away from opening our doors, and we need your help to help us push through our final funding hurdles to make it all manifest!

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

$11,111 is our fundraising goal and we'll use the funds towards:

 

  • 6-Panel Day & Night Urban Botanical Mural by Dora Cuenca: $2,500
  • Glass-Wash Machine (Plumbing Install and Operation): $3,000
  • Funky Furnishings and Out-Front Parklet for Outdoor Seating : $5,500
  • Homies Helping Homies: $111

 

We are STOKED to work with the incomparable Dora Cuenca on a one-of-a-kind mural to beautify our bar with scenery to thematically unite the natural with the urban. As people don't just need bread, they need roses too, our cafe needs art, not just equipment and juice! 

 

As we speak, we are awaiting word back from the city on our approval for the outdoor seating. The glass-wash machine would be an ecological dream come true, making reusable glass containers a feasible reality for our offerings! 

 

Giving Back is integral to our operations. We aren't successful as a society until everyone has enough. 1% is the least anyone can do, so we are living that truth out here even before we open our doors. 1% of whatever funds we raise here will be donated to South Philly local Homies Helping Homies, a mutual aid fund. 

 

In exchange for your support of this new community hub, we've got a variety of sweet offerings!

 

  • $3 for a cup of fair-trade Ox Coffee or small herbal tea

 

  • $4 for a shell of premium Vanuatu kava kava with pineapple (4oz)

 

  • $5 for a wellness shot (4oz)

 

  • $8 sweet mylky vegan kava kava (vanilla, chocolate or golden chai 8oz)

 

  • $12 for an herbal mocktail, 12oz juice, superfood smoothie, or savory bowl

 

  • $21 for a limited edition Jaya Kava coconut shell, earning you $1 off each kava drink in perpetuity when you BYO shell (limited to one shell per day) 

 

  • $24 for a women's crop top Lightbox Tank Top by Print Natural 

 

  • $29 for a unisex Lightbox Tee Shirt by Print Natural 

 

  • $33 for a $35 Gift Card to Use at the Cafe!

 

  • $50 for two rounds drinks and a food item for you and a friend ($55 value)

 

  • $55 for a mini juice package (5 12oz juices) ($60 value)

 

  • $69 for a $75 for a Gift Card to use at the Cafe!

 

  • $111 donation - no physically redeemable reward. love and mutual support! thank you!

 

NOTE: OUR PRELIMINARY MENU WILL BE POSTED THIS WEEKEND!!!

 

The Impact

Your contribution to the Lightbox Cafe will kickstart a rippling vibration of positive impacts to the surrounding community. From improvements to our facade and investment in more plants and outdoor seating along 4th street, we will provide a neighborhood beautification benefit with your investment. Travelers and neighbors alike will get to delight in local art and music by simply strolling by, and even moreso should they come in and decide to nourish their bodies with immune-boosting juices, tension-soothing teas, or plant-based treats.

 

Avocado toasts and nutrient-dense grain bowls. Adaptogenic lattes and smoothies infused with superfoods. Herbal elixirs and kavatails made with Pacific Island roots. Our menu will be an honorable offering to all bodies. 

 

This business seeks to be a powerhouse purveyor of all good things, tasty, nutritious, and a little bit spicy. From the food & drink to the proposed roster of weekly happenings: this is the start of the booze-free bar scene you've been craving. 

 

Risks & Challenges

The risk? None for you, unless our Plumbing continues to get held up by L&I and we have to delay opening by yet another month. Your humble co-founders, Gaby Vazquez and Jen Hombach, are sturdy Tauruses that will see this project through to completion, no matter what. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

Can't contribute financially but want to be a part of the Lightbox effort? Do you have social media or make art? Do you want to host a community event like Comedy Nights or Variety Shows? Do you play music or want to DJ a daytime dance party? The world is our oyster. Tell us your luminous ideas! Email jen at jen@lightboxphilly.com or gaby at gaby@lightboxphilly.com. 

 

Indiegogo has share tools right on this page. Click em! We love you so much and can't wait to thrive alongside of you. 

 

Thanks

 

All of this is made possible by friends. Special gratitude to Kat Veri at Veri Productions for pulling this truly awesome video together over many days and many hours of filming, recording and editing. We can't believe how cool it is!!! If you ever have video needs for anything, ever, message Kat!!! She will HOOK IT UP!

 

Gratitude to Phil Asbury for our final logo and icon designs. He is a wizard. His graffiti style can be seen at @es_team on IG. Mel Andrel is to thank for our Jaya Kava logo design and the first passes of our Lightbox Logo and Icon. So many friends have helped us at the shop: Leo Lightwork, Eyota Catori, Nidhi Krishen, and MJ Heart. We wouldn't be here without the support of our friends and families and can't wait to serve you!

story:
Welcome to the party!  

                    

We're Treetop - a team of Texans turned Tennesseean with a passion for great coffee and families affected by foster care and adoption. You can also call us Rachel and Courtney! For the last two years we've been driving around East Tennessee in our big green coffee truck serving at weddings, birthday parties, office gatherings, teacher appreciation celebrations - you get the gist. Behind the scenes, we partner with all kinds of organizations supporting children and families involved in adoption and foster care. In the past, this has looked like anything from monetary donation, to book and school supply drives, to adoption fundraising.

Two years after starting a mobile coffee shop, we find ourselves with an opportunity to add a brick and mortar shop to our current operations- crazy, we know. While a stand alone shop has always been a goal of ours, we didn't realize we'd be in a position to reach that goal this early in Treetop's journey, especially after a year full of challenges and surprises. We're FLOORED by the response of people in our immediate community and elsewhere, and are so excited to bring this shop to life! 

How we got here and Where we're headed

We say this often and earnestly - Treetop would not be in this position if not for the rallying of a community that has welcomed and invited us into the Knoxville coffee scene. From day one you've bought our coffee, said hello at the food truck park, invited us to your parties, and kept us afloat during a pandemic shutdown. We'll never get over the consistent generosity and cheerleading from you all, and it's why we're confident this shop will be a beautiful addition to Treetop with your help.

Immediate Impact: This shop is for you! We'll be in an area that is seriously underserved when it comes to great coffee. Aside from that, though, we want to create a space that encourages people to gather, engage with, and enjoy their community. Your contribution helps you just as much as it helps us! 

Broader Impact: As Treetop continues to grow, so does our reach. The addition of a brick and mortar opens another source of revenue, allowing us to invest more in our partner organizations locally and internationally - the cause behind the coffee is a huge part of why we do this.

                   

 

A Deeper Look

The total amount of capital we'll need to get our doors open is $55,000. Here's exactly how we plan to allocate that money.

                   

The game plan is to reach this number through small business lending, crowdfunding, and private investment. If you're interested in what a private investment would look like with Treetop, we'd love to hear from you. If crowdfunding is more your jam, we've got perks for you! 

What are perks? This platform is great for recognizing those that choose to give - and you deserve allll of the recognition. Throughout the duration of this campaign, we'll have different levels of perks depending on how much you're willing to give. Perks will range from t shirts and stickers all the way to private coffee classes in our new space, bags of coffee, and limited edition "founders" swag. 

 

Why should I give?

The results are in - Knoxville, and the Sequoyah Hills area in particular, want great coffee and welcoming atmosphere closer to home. Think of your contribution to this campaign as a contribution to your immediate community. Additionally, an investment in Treetop's success is an investment in the cause behind the coffee - to bring comfort to the world's kids. Every single cent matters in this campaign - no contribution is too small.

Other Ways You Can Help

Maybe you're unable to give right now - we get that! Here are some other ways for you to show up for Treetop.

  • SHARE THIS CAMPAIGN! Whether you're able to contribute or not, the more people that hear our story, the greater our reach
  • Post about the new shop on your socials - share your excitement to help us generate more buzz in and around Knoxville
  • Grab a coffee from us, or even just say hey when we're out in the wild
  • Sign up for our email list if you're interested in keeping up with all things Treetop

story:
*All perks are 'vouchers' as per the Indiegogo 'terms of use' and you will be redeeming them for the described products on site.


About our campaign  
We are releasing our first ever whisky RIGHT HERE (Get it below!) and we are over the moon with the response.  Its already won a national Gold Medal at the 2021 Canadian Artisan Spirit Competition due to the wonderful balance of ABV and flavor, strong rye notes of purple fruit and tobacco, warmness and long finish of smoke, pine and oak.  You can find our other spirits in over 200 locations across BC, Alberta and Washington State; bars, restaurants, liquor and grocery stores. 

We need your help with funding barrels and grain to produce our Whisky
It takes a lot of early investment and a minimum of 3 years and sometimes longer to make Whisky that's aged to perfection.  As a small-ish distillery, ageing Whisky is challenging due to the cost of storage, extra space required and the added insurance and capital requirements. We are looking to raise $20,000 to put away 20 more barrels of fantastic whisky before June of 2021.

For this we have some really great perks for our supporters. ----->>>>
Our First Whisky release ever is available here, RIGHT NOW! We also have a 2021 Whisky Advent Calendar and a great deal on the first bottles we will be pulling from these barrels in 3-4 years.

We will release two whiskies this year, our first release Cigarettes On a Leather Jacket is a great example of what we have planned for the future and what we would like to add to the Canadian Whisky scene. Whisky that is overflowing your glass with flavor.

What is our Rye like?

  • High Rye mash bill >75% Rye grain
  • Spice that'll make you know its Rye
  • Fermented with yeast that's known for fruity esters like Saison and Rum yeast
  • Aged in Half and Full size casks
  • Aged 3years+
  • Ex bourbon barrels or funky spirit barrels (Rum + Ex-Peated)


Risks & Challenges

There are a number of risks associated with this campaign:

  • We might experience delays in delivery of the necessary grain and barrels
  • We might experience production issues, although we are a fully bonded and licensed distillery that has been producing for six years.
  • We cannot yet say with certainty how long it will take to age the Whisky, which could lead to extended delivery times.
  • If we are not able to raise the funds for this campaign we will have to resort to petty crimes like busking under 'No Loitering' signs.


When you support our campaign, you will get access to single barrel releases of SOV Whisky for the next three years.

Like our approach and what we are doing?
Then please share with friends, via Facebook, email, etc! Help us get the word out!

  1. https://www.instagram.com/sonsofvancouver
  2. https://www.facebook.com/SonsOfVancouver
  3. https://twitter.com/SonsofVancouver

    *All perks are 'vouchers' as per the Indiegogo 'terms of use' and you will be redeeming them for the described alcoholic products
story_txt:
*All perks are 'vouchers' as per the Indiegogo 'terms of use' and you will be redeeming them for the described products on site.About our campaign  We are releasing our first ever whisky RIGHT HERE (Get it below!) and we are over the moon with the response.  Its already won a national Gold Medal at the 2021 Canadian Artisan Spirit Competition due to the wonderful balance of ABV and flavor, strong rye notes of purple fruit and tobacco, warmness and long finish of smoke, pine and oak.  You can find our other spirits in over 200 locations across BC, Alberta and Washington State; bars, restaurants, liquor and grocery stores. We need your help with funding barrels and grain to produce our WhiskyIt takes a lot of early investment and a minimum of 3 years and sometimes longer to make Whisky that's aged to perfection.  As a small-ish distillery, ageing Whisky is challenging due to the cost of storage, extra space required and the added insurance and capital requirements. We are looking to raise $20,000 to put away 20 more barrels of fantastic whisky before June of 2021.For this we have some really great perks for our supporters. ----->>>>Our First Whisky release ever is available here, RIGHT NOW! We also have a 2021 Whisky Advent Calendar and a great deal on the first bottles we will be pulling from these barrels in 3-4 years.We will release two whiskies this year, our first release Cigarettes On a Leather Jacket is a great example of what we have planned for the future and what we would like to add to the Canadian Whisky scene. Whisky that is overflowing your glass with flavor.What is our Rye like?
High Rye mash bill >75% Rye grain
Spice that'll make you know its Rye
Fermented with yeast that's known for fruity esters like Saison and Rum yeast
Aged in Half and Full size casks
Aged 3years+
Ex bourbon barrels or funky spirit barrels (Rum + Ex-Peated)
Risks & ChallengesThere are a number of risks associated with this campaign:
We might experience delays in delivery of the necessary grain and barrels
We might experience production issues, although we are a fully bonded and licensed distillery that has been producing for six years.
We cannot yet say with certainty how long it will take to age the Whisky, which could lead to extended delivery times.
If we are not able to raise the funds for this campaign we will have to resort to petty crimes like busking under 'No Loitering' signs.
When you support our campaign, you will get access to single barrel releases of SOV Whisky for the next three years.Like our approach and what we are doing?Then please share with friends, via Facebook, email, etc! Help us get the word out!
https://www.instagram.com/sonsofvancouver
https://www.facebook.com/SonsOfVancouver

https://twitter.com/SonsofVancouver*All perks are 'vouchers' as per the Indiegogo 'terms of use' and you will be redeeming them for the described alcoholic products

story:
Why we need better treats ? 

There are lots of options like Greenies, Milk Bone or homemade treats, but there was still a gap we noticed. Why did I have the ability to grab a healthy protein bar for myself, but not for my dog? 

Hundreds of conversations with dog parents helped us realize that most treats were not only difficult to use on-the-go, but have been causing health problems for our furry friends. 

That's why we made a delicious and healthy protein bar for the modern dog!

 

Meet Monch Bar: A protein bar for your dog

Perfect for the on-the-go lifestyle

You’ll breathe easier knowing there’s a nutritious snack in your backpack or pocket that’s ready for whatever life throws your way on your adventures.

Proteins for an active dog

 

A deeper dive into our ingredients

We use locally-sourced, natural ingredients that improve digestion and reduce inflammation. These protein bars are formulated with superfoods to support their gut and joints so they can join you on many more adventures ?

Perfect for the Doggo on-the-go

Unfortunately doggos can’t tell us when something is wrong (we’ve tried to ask them before), but we can improve their quality of life with a tasty snack that they’ll look forward to. And you’ll breathe easier knowing there’s a nutritious snack in your backpack or back pocket that’s ready for whatever life throws your way.

 

 

How to Monch

 

Timeline

 

Perks


Customer Reviews

We've given out hundreds of Monch Bars to make sure your furry family member will absolutely love it! Don't take our word for it, hear from customers.

Meet Our Team

We’re 25 dog-lovers that have been delivering the best fresh food for dogs across Canada for over 2 years. At Kabo, we produce all our recipes with the best ingredients that makes meal time healthy and enjoyable again. 
We were in the inaugural Google for Startups program. We went on Dragons' Den (and slayed some dragons). We've been listed on Forbes U30 Retail & Ecommerce brands to watch. And we are just getting started.

 
 

Risk & Challenges

We have been producing fresh dog food at Kabo for over 2 years to thousands of happy pupstomers. We have spent the last 10+ months doing all the work from lab testing, prototyping, and batch productions to ensure you get the healthy snack bar your dog is waiting to chomp down on.

Monch Bar really needs the support of backers like you to succeed, but we do foresee other risks. Although we have done the leg work we still are in the midst of a global pandemic, which may cause unforeseen delays that impact production and shipping. All orders placed on Indiegogo will be prioritized in the queue ahead of our own inventory to ensure we mitigate any potential delays.

We’ve are confident you’ll love our healthy Monch Bar treats!

story:
Who We Are

We’re Aaron & Ryley (and Judah & Aydan), and we’re very excited to share sunday coffee project (@sundaycoffeeproject) with you!

Sunday is our favorite day as a family. It always has been. Sundays look different for us seasonally, but the reason it’s become so special to our family is because it’s the day that we have no agenda. We hang out, we drink coffee, sometimes we get out and explore, but really it’s the day that we get to just be together.

This project is our way of inviting you to enjoy our Sundays with us. We’ll be sourcing and roasting some amazing coffees, and designing some cool apparel & lifestyle goods that we think will bring some fun and enjoyment to not only your Sunday, but every day!

Aaron, our roaster, has worked in specialty coffee for several years, with most of his time being at a cafe near where we live here in Portland, OR.  In 2020 he placed within the top 20 coffee brewers nationally in the US Coffee Championships’ Brewers Cup.  His high attention to detail and pursuit of excellence means we’re dedicated to always offering you a selection of high quality coffees that you can sip while reading a new book, taking a walk around the neighborhood, or catching up on your favorite podcast.

We believe specialty coffee should be exciting and approachable. We realize that isn’t always the experience in this industry, and we’re committed to demonstrating that quality and approachability aren’t mutually exclusive.

 

What We Offer

Offerings:

Retail Coffee (blends and single origins) - Available in 12oz, 2lb, and 5lb offerings.

Coffee Subscriptions - our retail coffee, delivered to your door on a recurring schedule

Merch - Apparel & lifestyle goods

Wholesale Coffee - available for cafes, restaurants, businesses, etc

Visions for future offerings:

Pop-up events - our chance to have a physical presence, brew up some fun drinks, drop some fun merch, and hang with y’all.

Ready to Drink Bottled Beverages - cold brew based beverages, with fun and creative flavor combinations. Sold online, at cafes, and in grocery stores.

Grocery Store Presence - not only ready to drink beverages, but also our classic retail offerings.

 

What We Need

We’re aiming for $10,000 to help us cover initial startup costs and set us up to be in a solid position to begin sourcing some exciting coffees.

These funds will go towards:

  • Business licensing
  • Branding, Packaging, and Website design (if you’ve seen what we already have going - get excited, because there are many more cool things in the pipeline)
  • Sourcing Coffee
  • Administrative fees (website, services/software, etc)

 

The Rewards

One of the most exciting parts of running this campaign is getting some fun stuff into your hands! Each reward tier will come with coffee (of course). Most will come with a mug(s). Some will even come with a fun shirt we’re designing. But there’s one thing in particular that we’re really pumped about:

Starting at our $100 reward tier, and all higher tiers, you’ll receive an invite to our launch party. We’re hosting a celebration here in Portland. We’ll have DJs providing the vibes, drinks and food will be on us, and you’ll have early-bird access to special coffees and merch. It’ll be a great time to celebrate the launch of the brand but also to celebrate all of YOU who have partnered with us to make this possible. So if you’re willing and able, we highly encourage you to join us for that!  

*If you’re not local and able to join us for the launch party in person, we’ll be adding extra goodies when we send your reward :)

 

Risks & Challenges

Every business takes on risk as they launch. In our opinion, our biggest risk is slow growth. However, we believe we are in a good position to minimize the impact of this risk for a couple reasons:

  1. We don’t have a physical storefront. While this comes with some disadvantages, it drastically reduces the amount of startup capital needed and our monthly expenses. It gives us more financial flexibility and time to establish our customer base if we do grow slower than anticipated.
  2. Aaron has worked in the coffee industry long enough to form a strong and supportive network that will be very beneficial in establishing customers and wholesale clients as we launch.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Getting this project off the ground is so much more than just monetary contributions. The biggest thing you can do for us is to engage with what we’re doing. And if you’ve read this far, you’re doing exactly that. Some practical ways you can help us get established and grow are:

  • Share this link on your social media platforms or with anyone you feel might be interested
  • Follow us on social media (@sundaycoffeeproject). Things like turning on post notifications, saving and sharing posts, sending posts to friends, etc., raises our engagement drastically.
  • Give us a good review on Google (once you’ve tasted our coffee, of course)
  • If you have any friends, neighbors, family, businesses, cafes, or restaurants that need coffee, refer them to us!

 

Thank you again for all the support and love. We feel very fortunate to have you all supporting us.

Share this link on your social media platforms or with anyone you feel might be interested
Follow us on social media (@sundaycoffeeproject). Things like turning on post notifications, saving and sharing posts, sending posts to friends, etc., raises our engagement drastically.

story:
Koinu : Professional Flat-edged Bowls

Take advantage of a bowl that has been made for Professionals to be both durable and functionable!

We at Honma Manufacturing have been creating cookware for professionals for the past 70 years under the Koinu Brand, and are looking to release a set of cooking bowls focusing on ease of use and durability. Taking the advice of many different professional chefs, we want to create Kitchenware that all types of users can use easily and reliably!

Changing the concept of the kitchen bowl

Every household has an ordinary bowl or mesh bowl for cooking.

There has been no major innovation in their long history.

Honma, a manufacturer of professional kitchen products, has created a product that is a grade above the rest by incorporating the voices of professionals into the bowl that is found in at least one kitchen.

We have developed a bowl that is highly durable and can be used hygienically for a lifetime -- and this extraordinary bowl is worth every penny.

New Sizes Available 

With this project we also wanted to create a variety of bowl sizes that matches the needs of backers in the West. Our original bowl size was the 18cm bowl, but for this project we decided to create a larger bowl, the 21cm, as well as a smaller bowl, the 15cm bowl! With these bowls, we hope that our backers can find many ways that Koinu can complement your cooking! These bowls are not available anywhere outside of this INDIEGOGO campaign at present, but we plan to go to market after this campaign has finished.

Since our founding, we have focused on creating cookware for professionals under the Koinu Brand name. This bowl was born of the many requests we have received from culinary experts, asking for bowls that incorporate ease of usability into their making.

LEFT:Mitsuru Ishidaka, Factory Manager.   

Right:Kazunari Honma, CEO, Honma Manufacturing Co. 

Most bowls have an edge that curves under. However, this type of edge makes it harder to clean the bowls, trapping waste and water under the rim. This creates unsanitary conditions, not something that you want with a bowl used for cooking.

In comparison, our Koinu bowls feature a flat edge. This makes it easier to clean, and harder for dirt and water to get stuck, which makes it far more hygienic!

The innovative flat edge makes it easier to create a spout that allows for better pouring.  Even the most viscous of liquids, such as eggs, pour with ease. The shape of the spout is much better suited for liquids than a bowl with a rimmed edge.

 

When you look inside the bowl, you can see that the surface is quite smooth and shiny. This is the product of both hand polishing and electropolishing!

Most bowls, when used to whip cream, often allow tiny particles of the stainless steel to come off, slightly discolouring the whip. Until now!

Electropolishing is applied to the surface of our bowls, to keep the particles from separating, and help prevent food discolouration from occurring.

Our bowls also feature a presswork scale on the inside of the bowl, so if you are following a recipe that only needs a rough estimation of ingredients, you can use the scale inside the bowl.

The bowl and mesh bowl have been made with a slight difference in height, meaning when placed together, there is a small space between them. This means that you can fit a finger in between the two bowls, to easily separate and transport them individually.

This also means that when separating water, it is easier to do so without any of the ingredients slipping out. We think that even normal everyday cooks can be free of this bothersome annoyance that happens with other types of bowls.

With other bowls, you might have thought, "Oh it's stainless steel, it should be pretty tough" -- then it breaks on you. Or maybe you've had mesh bowls split apart, or permanently warp, or even the base of the bowl may come undone. 
With our Koinu brand, you can be assured that we only let quality products out of our factory. We ensure this quality by using roughly 0.57mm thick wire -- much thicker than conventional mesh bowls, which helps to strengthen the bowl. 
This strength means that even with heavy everyday use, we feel very comfortable saying that you can use it for the rest of your life. 
In order to back up this claim, we tested out the strength of the bowl. 
We were able to hold over 8.5kg of weight in the bowl, without any sign of it bending. 
Thanks to its durability, you can scrub it with a hard brush without worrying about damaging the wire.

 

We’ve also created a combination tray/lid that is both simple and functional.

Use this lid to secure the ingredients inside the bowl as you pour water out. Give it a good shake to get even more water out, and the lid still holds.

You can also use it as a tray to place ingredients that you have cut and washed.

When you want to put anything in the fridge, you can use the lid to seal the bowl and not worry about using wasteful wraps or unreliable covers.

This tray/lid is a highly functional piece of cookware, but is extremely simple in its design.

We create our mesh bowl by weaving wire together, which is far superior to just hole-punching a sheet of metal. This makes it more efficient when draining water, and smaller items like rice aren’t lost through our weaved wire.

At a glance, it might seem that these are minor improvements, But when brought together, they help to greatly improve an already good product. By helping you to cook smarter, your stress in the kitchen will also be reduced, helping you to enjoy your time cooking!

This bowl series is created at our factory in Tsubame Sanjo in Niigata Prefecture. Tsubame Sanjo is one of, if not the, largest metal processing towns in Japan.

Honma Manufacturing (Honma Seisakujo) has been around for 70 years, with our brand, (Koinu Shirushi) literally meaning Mark of the Puppy. We cater to professional kitchens at restaurants, schools, cafeterias, and food processing companies with our Kitchenware.

We work to create everything in-house, from the planning stages to the production and manufacturing of the product.

We create products from large oversized pots to teapots and bowls, giving us expertise  in a wide assortment of various-sized products.

When it comes to manufacturing, prototypes and moulds are our biggest assets.

Bowls and trays normally come from one sheet of stainless steel.

A flat-edged bowl is considered to be quite difficult to make, for one big reason. When the steel is pressed into the bowl shape, it is common for the steel to wrinkle in the mould, causing the bowl to have imperfections.

Here at Honma Manufacturing, we have succeeded in creating moulds that make the steel conform to the shape properly. This lowers the likelihood of wrinkling, and allows us to adjust and fine-tune the moulds, to help lower this likelihood even more.

Though the bowls are technically mass produced, we still check each bowl thoroughly.

We also have a final inspection, where the bowl is again checked by our manufacturing team. If they feel that the bowl is off -- even slightly -- we don’t allow the product to go out.

With our rigid checks and quality assurance processes, we have gained the recognition and trust of many professionals in the industry.

The Mesh Bowl was created in cooperation with another company in Tsubame Sanjo, Minex Metal Co. ltd. They are a manufacturing company that focuses on items that use the same type of mesh and wire we use.

The Mesh Bowl also starts out as a flat sheet. They cut each bowl and then mould it, one by one, from a single sheet of meshed metal.

In order to create a bowl that is extremely durable and keeps its shape, we went through a large amount of trial and error.

A sturdy but deep mesh bowl is extremely hard to create, but after a long testing period, we were able to create the final product that is found in this project.

New Logo Design

Until now, we have used English with our logo, the cute little puppy logo that has always appeared on our products. But in order to appeal to western backers, we have changed from this English design to a more Japanese design, incorporating our name in Kanji (Chinese Characters that Japanese people use to write).

You can see our new logo below:

This logo mark will be embossed onto the flat edge that makes our bowls unique. This will be incorporated onto all sizes of the mesh bowl.

SPEC

 

Schedule

 

Risks & Challenges

  • The designs, colors and specifications are subject to change.
  • The shipping time may be delayed depending on the order status, the supply status of the materials, and the manufacturing process. 
  • Due to COVID-19, the production of the Flat edge Bowl may take longer than our manufacturing schedule.
  • We ask for your understanding in this matter. COVID-19 is affecting delivery and transportation speed, so please keep in mind that the delivery of the  Flat edge Bowl  may be delayed.
  • If we are successful and the project is funded, we will not be able to offer refunds.
  • Any import taxes and fees will be paid for by the backer.

We cater to professional kitchens at restaurants, schools, cafeterias, and food processing companies with our Kitchenware.We work to create everything in-house, from the planning stages to the production and manufacturing of the product.We create products from large oversized pots to teapots and bowls, giving us expertise  in a wide assortment of various-sized products.When it comes to manufacturing, prototypes and moulds are our biggest assets.Bowls and trays normally come from one sheet of stainless steel.A flat-edged bowl is considered to be quite difficult to make, for one big reason. When the steel is pressed into the bowl shape, it is common for the steel to wrinkle in the mould, causing the bowl to have imperfections.Here at Honma Manufacturing, we have succeeded in creating moulds that make the steel conform to the shape properly. This lowers the likelihood of wrinkling, and allows us to adjust and fine-tune the moulds, to help lower this likelihood even more.Though the bowls are technically mass produced, we still check each bowl thoroughly.We also have a final inspection, where the bowl is again checked by our manufacturing team. If they feel that the bowl is off -- even slightly -- we don’t allow the product to go out.With our rigid checks and quality assurance processes, we have gained the recognition and trust of many professionals in the industry.The Mesh Bowl was created in cooperation with another company in Tsubame Sanjo, Minex Metal Co. ltd. They are a manufacturing company that focuses on items that use the same type of mesh and wire we use.The Mesh Bowl also starts out as a flat sheet. They cut each bowl and then mould it, one by one, from a single sheet of meshed metal.In order to create a bowl that is extremely durable and keeps its shape, we went through a large amount of trial and error.A sturdy but deep mesh bowl is extremely hard to create, but after a long testing period, we were able to create the final product that is found in this project.New Logo DesignUntil now, we have used English with our logo, the cute little puppy logo that has always appeared on our products. But in order to appeal to western backers, we have changed from this English design to a more Japanese design, incorporating our name in Kanji (Chinese Characters that Japanese people use to write).You can see our new logo below:This logo mark will be embossed onto the flat edge that makes our bowls unique. This will be incorporated onto all sizes of the mesh bowl.SPEC Schedule Risks & Challenges
The designs, colors and specifications are subject to change.
The shipping time may be delayed depending on the order status, the supply status of the materials, and the manufacturing process. 
Due to COVID-19, the production of the Flat edge Bowl may take longer than our manufacturing schedule.
We ask for your understanding in this matter. COVID-19 is affecting delivery and transportation speed, so please keep in mind that the delivery of the  Flat edge Bowl  may be delayed.
If we are successful and the project is funded, we will not be able to offer refunds.
Any import taxes and fees will be paid for by the backer.

story:
عادة ع موضوع الدفع قليل لحدا يتحمّس?، بس بنجرّب.

 

——

بكل عيد بتبدأ الجمعيات والمجموعات بجمع تبرعات ليعملوا أضاحي العيد، ومهما كبرت الحملات وصار في أضاحي حول العالم مستحيل يتم تغطية الموضوع بأكمله، وتوزيعه على الناس، ويا ريت كل الناس تعمل مبادرات.

 

وبما إني دائمًا موجّه بوصلة اهتمامي ونشاطي على #لبنان وعلى ملف اللاجئين السوريين بالمخيمات خصوصًا. في منطقة خبّرني عنها صديقي، إن فيها بعض المخيمات بيعرف وضعها سيء جدًا (ما في شي جديد ع أوضاع الناس الله يعين الجميع)، وشجعني أعمل هالمبادرة لنشوف إذا ممكن يتفاعلوا الأصدقاء ونقدر نجمع مبلغ 2500 دولار خلال أقل من 30 ساعة، ونجيب أضاحي ونوزعها بهي المخيمات.

 

فكّرت بطريقتين، اتتمنى إني كون عم بعمل شي منيح: يلي حابب/ة يتبرّع/تتبرع هيك من دون تحديد الأضحية لتكون ع اسمه/ا، وتكون ع اسم اللاجئين السوريين فيكم/ن تتبرعوا بأي مبلغ.

يلي حابب/ة يتبرّع/تتبرع بأضحية كاملة يدفع المبلغ كامل ?.

 

وهيك عيد سعيد على الجميع، شاركوا الفيديو مع الناس يلي بتحب الأضاحي، بلكي ساعدونا بجمع المبلغ لتاني يوم العيد.

وهيك عيد سعيد على الجميع، شاركوا الفيديو مع الناس يلي بتحب الأضاحي، بلكي ساعدونا بجمع المبلغ لتاني يوم العيد.

story:
The problem with salt

Salt makes food delicious. But, it's high in sodium.  High sodium intake increases your chances of high blood pressure which can lead to heart disease and stroke: Two leading causes of death in Americans (CDC.gov) .  According to the American Heart Association, nearly half of US adults have high blood pressure! 

Green Salt is your new healthy salt 

Green Salt is a plant-based salt with 50% less sodium than salt. It's better for you while still giving you the same salty taste. 

You won't believe it's not salt

  •  50% less sodium than normal salt. 
  • Protein (11%), Fiber (20%), Chlorophyll, Vitamin B3, Zinc, Postassium, Iodine, and Calcium.  Green Salt's minerals and fiber help digestion, hydration, blood pressure control, and normal function of our immune and nervous systems. 
  • Salty and Umami flavor. In blind taste tests, equal portions of salt and Green Salt had the same relative saltiness. It also adds natural umami to elevate your dishes. Unlike artificial salt substitutes, it doesn't have a bitter taste.

Percentages by weight. Normal Salt includes Sea Salt, Himalayan Salt, and Kosher Salt.

James Beard award winning chef Rick Bayless and Michelin star chefs Drew Deckman and Javier Plascencia use Green Salt

Made from 100% dehydrated Salicornia

Salicornia or Sea Asparagus is a vegetable that grows by the sea. It has a salty taste and succulent texture. 

Salicornia's salty taste is due to its diverse mineral content. It's a superfood rich in bioavailable nutrients such as amino acids, vitamin B3, and chlorophyll. 

  • Studies have identified health benefits in Salicornia including possible antioxidant (Kim 2009), antidiabetic (Park 2006), and anticancer activities. (Kong 2008)
  • (Zhang 2015) investigated the effects of salt derived from Salicornia on blood pressure in rats. Notably, the results showed that while common salt induced hypertension, Salicornia salt did not.

From farm to you

On our organic farm in Baja California, Mexico, we're pioneers in growing Salicornia for the culinary market. We've spent 20 years innovating cultivation techniques to produce the best tasting Salicornia.  

To make Green Salt, we harvest fresh Salicornia tips, dehydrate using solar power, then grind into a powder.

Traditional farming techniques use fresh water for irrigation, putting a heavy demand on the world’s already scarce fresh water supplies. In fact, of all the water in the world, only 1% is fresh water, of which 70% is used for agriculture! (Salineagricultureworldwide.com)

How do I use Green Salt?

Use Green Salt just like normal salt. It'll give your dishes a salty taste and dash of umami. Green Salt is especially tasty with veggies! 

We love Green Salt with eggs

Great with fish, meat, and veggies

What people say

"Love the vibrant and green color of this green salt and love that it is healthier for me! Upon tasting, I love that it has an umami, seaweed flavor and it complements many dishes well. Can’t wait to replace my cooking salt with this green salt!"

- @jennerous_eats, Jennifer Cheng, Food Network Chopped Champion

 

"Got to try this out today on some eggs as well as yesterday on a salad - it's so good. I really enjoy the earthy / herbaceous notes. Congrats on a super cool product and look forward to staying in touch + continuing to share as I enjoy it!"

- @eastcoasthealth, Maddie Pasquariello, M.S. Nutrition

 

"Tastes like salt and I actually like it more than regular salt!"

-@thatbilloakley, Bill Oakley, Simpsons TV writer and "The Gordon Ramsay of Fast Food"

 

"Green Salt is the perfect option for people looking to reduce sodium intake and look out for their cardiovascular health.  It has much more nutritional value than table salt with vitamins, protein, and fiber.  Green Salt can be used to replace regular salt in any context.  Salicornia is a superfood that we should take advantage of and integrate into our diets."

- Carolina Lavandera, Nutritionist 

Perks

Be the first to try Green Salt! Choose different quantities of Green Salt from a 9 oz - 250g bag to 15% off 4 bags!  

Another benefit of Green Salt's color is seeing how much salt actually goes on your food!

References:

Ahmed KBA, Subramanian S, Sivasubramanian A, Veerappan G, Veerappan A. 2014. Preparation of gold nanoparticles using Salicornia brachiata plant extract and evaluation of catalytic and antibacterial activity. Spectrochim Acta A Mol Biomol Spectrosc 130: 54– 8.

Im SA, Kim K, Lee CK. 2006. Immunomodulatory activity of polysaccharides isolated from Salicornia herbacea. Intl Immunopharmacol 6(9): 1451– 8.

Kang H, Koppula S, Park TK. 2013. Salicornia bigelovii Torr attenuates neuro‐inflammatory responses in lipopolysaccharide‐induced BV‐2 microglia by regulation of NF‐kappa B signaling. Trop J Pharm Res 12(6): 897– 903.

Kim YA, Kong CS, Um YR, Lim SY, Yea SS, Seo Y. 2009. Evaluation of Salicornia herbacea as a potential antioxidant and anti‐inflammatory agent. J Med Food 12(3): 661– 8.

Kong CS, Kim YA, Kim MM, Park JS, Kim JA, Kim SK, Lee BJ, Nam TJ, Seo Y. 2008. Flavonoid glycosides isolated from Salicornia herbacea inhibit matrix metalloproteinase in HT1080 cells. Toxicol In Vitro 22(7): 1742– 8.

Lee GH. 2011. A salt substitute with low sodium content from plant aqueous extracts. Food Res Intl 44(2): 537– 43.

Park SH, Ko SK, Choi JG, Chung SH. 2006. Salicornia herbacea prevents high fat diet‐induced hyperglycemia and hyperlipidemia in ICR mice. Arch Pharm Res 29(3): 256– 64.

Patel S. 2016. Salicornia: evaluating the halophytic extremophile as a food and a pharmaceutical candidate. 3 Biotech

Zhang S, Wei M, Cao C, Ju Y, Deng Y, Ye T, Xia Z, Chen M. 2015. Effect and mechanism of Salicornia bigelovii Torr plant salt on blood pressure in SD rats. Food Funct 6(3): 920– 6.

story:
Whether morning will be spent over a sunrise yoga or intensive commuting to the office, we love the energy coffee brings that leads to new starts, new ideas, or simply great chats. To enjoy a cup of coffee properly, it should be made from freshly ground coffee beans to elaborate brewing, but hardly do we have that time.

So we created SóloCano that dedicates to making your coffee moment much easier without sacrificing the coffee taste. With an easy press on the lid, the automatically ground beans will be ready for fresh brewing. We ensure caffeine lovers a decent coffee anytime, anywhere.

 

The double-layered filter is able to withstand consistent extraction while completely filter out all of the coffee residues, unlike typical single-wall filters. Our reusable dripping mechanism is designed to maximize your coffee aroma. No paper filter needed, allowing the oils and nutrients to pass through to the mug. Enjoy your true taste “cups of Joe”.

 

Simply selecting from 6 different coarse settings, SóloCano makes it easy for you to create different flavors to match the occasion and your mood.

 

When grinding coffee, precision, and consistency are the keys. It's important to achieve the most evenly ground coffee to extract the most flavor during brewing. A poor quality grinder will not grind consistently, leaving your brew over or under-extracted.

We optimized the mug size for an on-the-go lifestyle. Double-wall vacuum insulation keeps drinks hot & iced for up to 7 hours. The 16.2oz capacity holds the perfect amount of coffee to jump-start your day.

 

To ensure the coffee flavor, we applied Grade 316 stainless steel for SóloCano. It's both sturdy and versatile. Due to molybdenum addition, grade 316 stainless steel is more corrosion-resistant than similar alloys, like common grade 304.

Grade 316 is valued for its melting range of 2,500 °F - 2,550 °F (1,371 °C - 1,399 °C) and very popular in high-end kitchenware. As an austenitic stainless steel alloy, it has qualities such as high strength, corrosion resistance, and high concentrations of chromium and nickel—an ideal container for coffee, milk, and carbonated beverages.

 

On-the-go lifestyle is hardly a new idea but rarely has it looked as graceful as SóloCano does. The design features an all-black minimalist outlook with comfy silicone weaved stripes along the top. This sleek all in one travel mug makes a wonderful gift for anyone that is constantly on the go.

SóloCano comes with a manual grinder for those who like to craft their coffee manually.

A little bit of elbow grease manually grinding the beans will generate a more sensory experience.

Enjoy a moment of mindfulness in your coffee ritual.

 

 

SóloCano includes everything you need to make barista-quality coffee in one sleek piece.

Included items:

✔ SóloCano coffee maker
✔ Automatic grinder
✔ Manual grinder
✔ Travel case
✔ Coffee scoop
✔ Cleaning brush
✔ USB cable

 

 

 

We are Team 13Hz Design. Coffee is what we definitely cannot miss while working. 13Hz is not just a name but also dedicates the spirit that we yearn for. The aroma of coffee stimulates alpha waves  (8-13Hz) in the brain, creating a relaxed and cheerful mood, which is also a reflection of creative and artistic thinking. Intaking caffeine will further stimulate the beta waves(13-32Hz), help people enter a state of focus, thinking, decision-making, and learning new concepts.

Derived from the idea of the brain waves, 13hz is the turning point of the brain's transition from alpha waves to beta waves. It symbolizes the spirit of practicing creativity, solving problems with beautiful designs, and improving the quality of life. 

Everyone in our team is a coffee enthusiast. For us, coffee is science, it's art, it is our daily life. So we designed SóloCano, dedicated to elevating coffee experience, to help more people enjoy tasting good coffee and also making it. 

Please back us, and make it happen!

 

Our love for coffee and other takeaway drinks supports an enormous consumption of disposable cups around the world (billions every year).

Over 20 million trees are cut down each year to produce paper cups. The production of cups also requires quite a bit of energy input. Turning trees into paper and paper into usable cups requires a considerable amount of energy input – the source of which is almost exclusively fossil fuels. The worst part is - Less than 1% of the cups we produce are recycled.

Let’s be excited to make positive changes by bringing your own mug. Not just coffees, SóloCano makes sure all your beverages stay fresh with a mug available for separate use.
