story:
Life by Chocolate 

Greetings, Chocolate Lovers! 

           We are the Silvermoon Chocolate family, an Asheville-based company built upon the vision of Aradhana Silverman and her mission to share the uplifting magic of pure, organic, unroasted, handmade-with-love chocolate.

        Aradhana's obsession with chocolate began in Topanga, California in early 2007.  Silvermoon Chocolate was born and nurtured during the height of the Los Angeles raw food movement, growing up alongside its sibling, our husband-wife musical project, I,Star.  She began making treats and selling them at the band's music events, where people went nuts for Aradhana's creations.  Our company was the result of adamant demands from our community! After five years of dazzling taste buds on the West Coast, we were called to relocate to our current home in Asheville, North Carolina to pursue our musical and chocolate dreams and start a family.

         Landing, however, was wrought with perils in our personal lives, causing us to lose nearly everything we had worked so hard for. The setbacks we faced in our first year have taken years to rebuild and heal from, yet somehow during that time, we were still able to establish ourselves as a strong local brand in our community. Our company has been slowly growing, and we've built a significant grassroots network of support in Asheville & the local surrounding areas. 

Our products are sold everywhere from Whole Foods Markets to the largest local farmers' market, coffee and tea shops, boutique hotels and natural foods cooperatives. We've taken our booth on tour with our band to festivals up and down the east coast and into the midwest, introducing our brand to awestruck mouths with the promise of future local availability! Although demand is high, our growth has been slow due to a shortage of time, energy and resources. Growing a small family business is a labour of love, and as with raising our beautiful four-year old daughter, has often  required near round-the-clock effort...

.

Now that we've made it this far without taking on any outside investment, we're so inspired imagining what we could do with a little help from our friends! Dedicated and determined, with our Chocolate Engine running, we're ready to rise to meet our destiny!

  This is our Vision:

Let food be thy Medicine and Medicine be thy Food! 

 

        While we honor and support the numerous artisans and companies now working with organic and fair-trade, roasted cacao, due to the nutrient loss and damage to fatty acids that can occur in the roasting process, we've prioritized using naturally fermented yet unroasted cacao.  We envision a world in which the modern concept of chocolate as a sugary candy or guilty pleasure evolves to embrace the full potential of its natural state . At Silvermoon Chocolate, we know Chocolate in its un-roasted, minimally processed form, packed full of essential minerals (incl. magnesium, iron, calcium), antioxidant flavinoids, intact fatty acids, vitamins, protein and fiber, not to mention its well-documented effect on brain chemistry and cardiac health.  The ancient traditional Mayan, Olmec, and Aztec use of cacao as a sacred heart and spirit medicine has now been proven by modern science!!  Aradhana has alchemized and perfected a blend of cacao, coconut, and almond butter, over 20 different herbs and superfoods, with a touch of honey and bee pollen to create our flagship Medicine Balls, among other delightful Silvermooon Chocolate creations to bring forth the bliss and benefits.             

One of the saddest things about creating a chocolate business has been realizing the degree to which this industry has remained rooted in the exploitative colonial system from which it was born, with massive plantation-style cacao farms, many companies still utilizing unethical labor practices in their supply chain, as well as the modern blights of petrochemical pesticides and fertilizers in standard growing procedure. Many of these workers have never even tasted the final product! Add to that poor quality cacao, refined sugars, additives, and other toxic ingredients, and that’s what most people know as chocolate!

          Now, we need YOU to help transform Silvermoon Chocolate into the tour de force that can shift the chocolate paradigm into one of Health, Sustainability, and Prosperity from grower to producer to consumer.

             

What We Need & What You Get

We have finally gotten to a place of embracing outside support to ask for your help in acquiring the funding for the following... We've itemized our expenses so that you know where your money is going.  Our goal is to at least quadruple our production and accounts by the end of March 2018, expanding our distribution to major markets including Charlotte, Raleigh/Durham/Chapel Hill, Greensboro, Atlanta, and beyond!!

Summary of Silvermoon Chocolate Capital Needs  

 
  •  Finish and Print New Label Design (so close!)                = $2200
  •  Upgrade our new kitchen/community event space     = $2000
  •  Website renovation                                                                  = $3000
  •  Marketing budget (SEO, sponsored ads)                         = $3000
  •  Legal counsel in protecting our brand                               = $3000
  •  Equipment                                                                                    $10,772
    • 20 qt. Commercial Mixer                                                = $1000
    • Enrobing Machine                                                             = $4000
    • 9 lb capacity Temperer                                                   = $1600
    • Melanger                                                                              = $1000
    • Custom Round 35-ball MB Molds                                = $850
    • Custom molds for other products                               = $1150
    • Tray racks for fridge -                                                       = $100
    • Chocolate Fountain for events                                      = $300
    • 20 qt. commercial Mixer                                                 = $772
  • 3 mos Operating Cost & 4x Production Scaling        $46,405
    • Kitchen Rent -                                     $1000 x 3       = $3000
    • Insurance -                                               $300 x 3     = $900
    • Labor -                                                     $8.5k x 3       = $25,500
    • Accountant -                                       $150/mo x 3  = $450
    • Payroll Tax(7.5% x $25.5k x 3)                                = $1900
    • Ingreds -                                                        $4k x 3    =  $12,000
    • Supplies (kitchen, office, booth, etc)$500 x 3   = $1500
    • Gas / Vehicle (est. 700 mi x $.55/mi x 3 mos)  = $1155
  • Campaign Asst.                                                                     = $2000                   
  • Estimate Indiegogo Fee -                                                   = $5400   

Total:

  • Choco Budget:                                                                      = $69,600
  • IGG Campaign Asst.:                                                           = $2,000
  • Est. IGG Fee:                                                                           = $5,400
  • Total Allocations:                                                                  = $77,777

Our Delectable Rewards!

We can't wait to treat our backers to the following rewards!

Support Tiers & Rewards. Rewards are cumulative

("What we get everything from our support tier and below?! #blissface)

  • $1 - Will hoot with joy and send our Love your way!
  • $5 - Have your name read in gratitude/prosperity/ Sacred Fire ceremony
  • $10 - Silvermoon Chocolate Loves You sticker
  • $25 - Signed 8x10 hand-painted SMC logo print
  • $50 - Silvermoon Chocolate Loves You T-Shirt + 5 dark chocolate hearts
  • $100 - Silvermoon Chocolate $20 gift certificate
  • $250 - SMC $50 gift certificate
  • $500 - SMC VIP basket feat. samples of unreleased products, exclusive info on new products (Sprouted Nut/Seed snack mixes, SM Sensual Whipped Cacao Body Cream, SM Herbal Anti-Inflammatory Blend, etc.)
  • $1000 - 1 hour Life by Chocolate Class Zoom session w/ Aradhana or a Custom Choc package of your choice of flavor or a 1 hour Ecstatic Life Consultation w/ Truth-I
  • $2500 - Monthly Gift Box for a year or 1-month of weekly Ecstatic Life coaching sessions
  • $5000 - Ecstatic Life Retreat long weekend in Asheville (a spot in a group retreat)
  • $10000 - Chocolate Faery Party (wedding/corporate event/party) or Ecstatic Life Private Retreat for you and friend/S.O. (*does not include group retreat from previous tier)
  • $25000+ - 6 month Ecstatic Life Coaching w/ Truth-I and Aradhana (tap in, dive deep, dial up!)

Side-Effects of Supporting the SMC Loves You Campaign 

May Include:

Increased feelings of Bliss and Gratitude

Lingering tastes of heaven in your mouth

Heightened senses and emotional bandwidth 

Spikes in feelings of well-being and interconnectedness

Increase in availability in stores near you

Shifts in the Cultural Paradigm and Current Business Models

Ethical Distribution of Prosperity from farmer to producer to consumer

Increased Opening of the Heart and Soul

More frequent compliments from friends and strangers

*Please consult your Intuition before deciding on your support Tier*

Want to Help?

Even if you aren't able to make a contribution at this time, we'd like to ask you take a moment to share our campaign with your network. You never know who you may already know that could make a massive impact on our goal.

Indiegogo has provided a wealth of tools for sharing. Look below and click that share button. Also, like an follow us on your favorite social media sites. SO much gratitude for all of you!

Silvermoon Chocolate LOVES YOU!
story_txt:
Life by Chocolate 


Greetings, Chocolate Lovers! 
           We are the Silvermoon Chocolate family, an Asheville-based company built upon the vision of Aradhana Silverman and her mission to share the uplifting magic of pure, organic, unroasted, handmade-with-love chocolate.
        Aradhana's obsession with chocolate began in Topanga, California in early 2007.  Silvermoon Chocolate was born and nurtured during the height of the Los Angeles raw food movement, growing up alongside its sibling, our husband-wife musical project, I,Star.  She began making treats and selling them at the band's music events, where people went nuts for Aradhana's creations.  Our company was the result of adamant demands from our community! After five years of dazzling taste buds on the West Coast, we were called to relocate to our current home in Asheville, North Carolina to pursue our musical and chocolate dreams and start a family.
         Landing, however, was wrought with perils in our personal lives, causing us to lose nearly everything we had worked so hard for. The setbacks we faced in our first year have taken years to rebuild and heal from, yet somehow during that time, we were still able to establish ourselves as a strong local brand in our community. Our company has been slowly growing, and we've built a significant grassroots network of support in Asheville & the local surrounding areas. 
Our products are sold everywhere from Whole Foods Markets to the largest local farmers' market, coffee and tea shops, boutique hotels and natural foods cooperatives. We've taken our booth on tour with our band to festivals up and down the east coast and into the midwest, introducing our brand to awestruck mouths with the promise of future local availability! Although demand is high, our growth has been slow due to a shortage of time, energy and resources. Growing a small family business is a labour of love, and as with raising our beautiful four-year old daughter, has often  required near round-the-clock effort...
.

Now that we've made it this far without taking on any outside investment, we're so inspired imagining what we could do with a little help from our friends! Dedicated and determined, with our Chocolate Engine running, we're ready to rise to meet our destiny!
  This is our Vision:
Let food be thy Medicine and Medicine be thy Food! 
 
        While we honor and support the numerous artisans and companies now working with organic and fair-trade, roasted cacao, due to the nutrient loss and damage to fatty acids that can occur in the roasting process, we've prioritized using naturally fermented yet unroasted cacao.  We envision a world in which the modern concept of chocolate as a sugary candy or guilty pleasure evolves to embrace the full potential of its natural state . At Silvermoon Chocolate, we know Chocolate in its un-roasted, minimally processed form, packed full of essential minerals (incl. magnesium, iron, calcium), antioxidant flavinoids, intact fatty acids, vitamins, protein and fiber, not to mention its well-documented effect on brain chemistry and cardiac health.  The ancient traditional Mayan, Olmec, and Aztec use of cacao as a sacred heart and spirit medicine has now been proven by modern science!!  Aradhana has alchemized and perfected a blend of cacao, coconut, and almond butter, over 20 different herbs and superfoods, with a touch of honey and bee pollen to create our flagship Medicine Balls, among other delightful Silvermooon Chocolate creations to bring forth the bliss and benefits.             
One of the saddest things about creating a chocolate business has been realizing the degree to which this industry has remained rooted in the exploitative colonial system from which it was born, with massive plantation-style cacao farms, many companies still utilizing unethical labor practices in their supply chain, as well as the modern blights of petrochemical pesticides and fertilizers in standard growing procedure. Many of these workers have never even tasted the final product! Add to that poor quality cacao, refined sugars, additives, and other toxic ingredients, and that’s what most people know as chocolate!
          Now, we need YOU to help transform Silvermoon Chocolate into the tour de force that can shift the chocolate paradigm into one of Health, Sustainability, and Prosperity from grower to producer to consumer.

             

What We Need & What You Get
We have finally gotten to a place of embracing outside support to ask for your help in acquiring the funding for the following... We've itemized our expenses so that you know where your money is going.  Our goal is to at least quadruple our production and accounts by the end of March 2018, expanding our distribution to major markets including Charlotte, Raleigh/Durham/Chapel Hill, Greensboro, Atlanta, and beyond!!

story:
INTRODUCING...

LOSE WEIGHT.... WITH CHOCOLATE??

Absolutely! Chocolate Diet Sticks uses real chocolate (real sugar, butter, and imported Dutch cocoa) to deliver a powerful blend of 18 different vitamins, appetite suppressants, and mood enhancers. People can indulge their sweet tooth AND lose weight!

Additionally, Chocolate Diet Sticks provides a natural energy boost, vitamin supplement, and tasty chocolate snack... all delivered in a unique and convenient tube.

FORGET DIETS -- THIS IS AN EFFORTLESS WEIGHT-LOSS SOLUTION

Chocolate Diet Sticks were designed to address the fact that diets don’t work. But it's not always the fault of the diets. Many diets are well-conceived and medically sound. It's the dieters who give up, because dieting is hard. Sacrifice is hard.

Our solution was to create a product that's just as effective as a diet, but extremely EASY TO USE. Chocolate Diet Sticks doesn't require counting calories, boring foods, new eating routines, or any of the other sacrifices associated with traditional dieting.

EVEN BETTER: IT'S NOT JUST FOR WEIGHT LOSS!

We understand that not everybody is specifically interested in weight loss, so we formulated Chocolate Diet Sticks to address the huge demand for health, energy, and vitamin products. As such, Chocolate Diet Sticks have a variety of useful benefits, including:

1) VITAMINS: As a one-a-day vitamin supplement.

2) HEALTHY SNACK: As a delicious chocolate treat. Imagine sipping a melted chocolate bar out of a tube. You've never done that before.

3) ENERGY: As a mid-day "pick-me-up." 

4) EXERCISE ENERGY: As support for your exercise routine. Nothing increases the desire to move around more than a powerful blast of B-vitamins, sugar, cocoa, and L-Carnitine!

THE SECRET TO DIET STICKS: APPETITE SUPPRESSION!

Appetite suppression works by tricking the body into believing that it is not hungry, or that it is full. Appetite suppressants decrease appetite by increasing serotonin or catecholamine, two brain chemicals that affect mood and appetite. Diet Sticks uses four different appetite suppressants: Caralluma Fimbriata, Chromium Polynicotinate, 5-HTP, and Saffron Extract. All four have clinical evidence of their effectiveness, and have all been recommended by television's Dr. Oz.

We believe that appetite suppression is the future of weight loss, for the following reasons:

·  You can eat as much as you want!

·  There is NO sacrifice... enjoy the same foods you do now.

·  Appetite suppression is NOT a diet.

·  When people require fewer calories to feel satisfied... they tend to make HEALTHIER choices!

With Chocolate Diet Sticks, foods that-- previously-- would not have satisfied you (those 200-300 calorie "healthy meals")... are now completely satisfying!


MEDICAL SUPPORT

Carl E. Olson, MD, Co-Founder

Dr. Olson is a renowned Radiation Oncologist. He began working with the inventor of Diet Sticks on a previous project: a liquid nicotine cigarette called Smoke-Break. It pre-dates the e-cigarette as a stop-smoking method. Earlier this year, Dr. Olson funded the research and development of Diet Sticks, and is excited about its potential to save lives. Obesity causes heart disease, diabetes, cancer, back pain, and numerous other conditions. The importance of a healthy diet and proper exercise cannot be overstated.

Deb Baumgarten, RN, MS, MSN, CCRC

“This product meets a growing need in our society. As a nurse, I have seen a continual rise in the rate of obesity in both adults and children and as such, the health of our society is being impacted. I agree with the stated goal of Diet Sticks, which is to help people “eat better and move more.” This approach to weight loss is healthy, safe and effective. I have used Diet Sticks; the taste is yummy with no aftertaste. The sipper tubes are easy to use and convenient to carry. Before I tried the sticks, the product ingredients were validated as safe by friends who are pharmacists. I wish all who use this product the very best of luck and good health.”


THE DELIVERY DEVICE

Chocolate Diet Sticks obtained the exclusive rights to use a unique and patented device to deliver its chocolate!

Each Chocolate Diet Stick delivers a precise amount of liquid chocolate in a new and exciting way. Just snap off the tab... and sip!

 




How many calories are in a Chocolate Diet Stick?

Each Chocolate Diet Stick is 25 calories... but gives you 100-150 calories worth of “full”!

                               

So eating chocolate is all I need to do to lose weight?

The only way to lose weight (safely, effectively, and permanently) is to Eat Less, Move More. Chocolate Diet Sticks is specially designed to help people eat less (via appetite suppression and mood enhancement), and move more (via natural energy and multiple fat-burning supplements). People who "eat less" tend to eat better foods as a result.

Are there any other benefits to using Diet Sticks?

Yes! Chocolate Diet Sticks is full of ingredients that provide more than one benefit. For example, “Chromium Polynicotinate” is not only a clinically-proven appetite suppressant... but also works as a fat-burner and blood sugar regulator! Below is a list of health benefits that users may receive from using Chocolate Diet Sticks, and the list of ingredients (in alphabetical order) that contribute to these benefits. Please see our Disclaimer by clicking here.

        

What do we need the money for?

Your contribution will support the retail release of Chocolate Diet Sticks. Specifically, we need a dedicated salesperson, sales materials, and an upgraded website. We have a great medical and research team... but need people with sales and retail experience. For production, we need a vacuum chamber, induction heat source, certified dishwasher, improved shelf-life (currently 2-3 months), and new product boxes with updated information.

If we are able to raise enough funds, we will conduct a double-blind, placebo-controlled clinical study of Chocolate Diet Sticks! This would offer indisputable proof of efficacy, and allow us to make specific claims. We are blessed to have skilled volunteers available, and ready to help us, including Carl E. Olson (MD), Deb Baumgarten (RN), and a clinical research assistant... whose daughter lost 75 pounds using Chocolate Diet Sticks! We would also like to hire an independent auditor, and a manuscript writer.

The first dollars raised will go toward supporting the retail release and continued development of Chocolate Diet Sticks. Help us fight the obesity epidemic, and change weight loss forever!


WHAT DO I GET FOR CONTRIBUTING??

     


Packs of Chocolate Diet Sticks!

Chocolate Bumper Sticker/Window Decal

Chocolate Coffee Mug

Chocolate Apron


EXCLUSIVE: Chocolate Peanut Butter Flavor!!

If you've ever wondered what it would be like to sip a chocolate peanut butter cup through a tube... now's your chance to find out!

          

EXCLUSIVE: Vitamin-Only Blend!!

The same delicious chocolate and healthy vitamins, but without the weight-loss and mood enhancing supplements. Ideal as a ONE-A-DAY VITAMIN for children under 18 (who don't always take their vitamins). Click here to see the Nutrition Facts for this kid-friendly exclusive!


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

FINAL THOUGHTS

Obesity is an epidemic... and it needs a new approach. Chocolate Diet Sticks is a special product: a safe, healthy chocolate with multiple benefits, in a unique delivery device. Every contribution helps us to move forward. Together we can make a difference!

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

Please help us spread the word. Like and Share us on Facebook, follow us on Twitter, and like our videos on YouTube. Tell your friends. Nothing is more important than word-of-mouth. Your friends will thank you. And we will thank you!

product the very best of luck and good health.”THE DELIVERY DEVICEChocolate Diet Sticks obtained the exclusive rights to use a unique and patented device to deliver its chocolate!Each Chocolate Diet Stick delivers a precise amount of liquid chocolate in a new and exciting way. Just snap off the tab... and sip!  
How many calories are in a Chocolate Diet Stick?Each Chocolate Diet Stick is 25 calories... but gives you 100-150 calories worth of “full”!

                                
So eating chocolate is all I need to do to lose weight?

The only way to lose weight (safely, effectively, and permanently) is to Eat Less, Move More. Chocolate Diet Sticks is specially designed to help people eat less (via appetite suppression and mood enhancement), and move more (via natural energy and multiple fat-burning supplements). People who "eat less" tend to eat better foods as a result.Are there any other benefits to using Diet Sticks?

Yes! Chocolate Diet Sticks is full of ingredients that provide more than one benefit. For example, “Chromium Polynicotinate” is not only a clinically-proven appetite suppressant... but also works as a fat-burner and blood sugar regulator! Below is a list of health benefits that users may receive from using Chocolate Diet Sticks, and the list of ingredients (in alphabetical order) that contribute to these benefits. Please see our Disclaimer by clicking here.

         
What do we need the money for?


Your contribution will support the retail release of Chocolate Diet Sticks. Specifically, we need a dedicated salesperson, sales materials, and an upgraded website. We have a great medical and research team... but need people with sales and retail experience. For production, we need a vacuum chamber, induction heat source, certified dishwasher, improved shelf-life (currently 2-3 months), and new product boxes with updated information. 
If we are able to raise enough funds, we will conduct a double-blind, placebo-controlled clinical study of Chocolate Diet Sticks! This would offer indisputable proof of efficacy, and allow us to make specific claims. We are blessed to have skilled volunteers available, and ready to help us, including Carl E. Olson (MD), Deb Baumgarten (RN), and a clinical research assistant... whose daughter lost 75 pounds using Chocolate Diet Sticks! We would also like to hire an independent auditor, and a manuscript writer.
The first dollars raised will go toward supporting the retail release and continued development of Chocolate Diet Sticks. Help us fight the obesity epidemic, and change weight loss forever!

WHAT DO I GET FOR CONTRIBUTING??

      

Packs of Chocolate Diet Sticks!



Chocolate Bumper Sticker/Window Decal



Chocolate Coffee Mug


Chocolate Apron


EXCLUSIVE: Chocolate Peanut Butter Flavor!!


If you've ever wondered what it would be like to sip a chocolate peanut butter cup through a tube... now's your chance to find out!           EXCLUSIVE: Vitamin-Only Blend!!

The same delicious chocolate and healthy vitamins, but without the weight-loss and mood enhancing supplements. Ideal as a ONE-A-DAY VITAMIN for children under 18 (who don't always take their vitamins). Click here to see the Nutrition Facts for this kid-friendly exclusive!
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------FINAL THOUGHTS
Obesity is an epidemic... and it needs a new approach. Chocolate Diet Sticks is a special product: a safe, healthy chocolate with
multiple benefits, in a unique delivery device. Every contribution helps us to move forward. Together we can make a difference!OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP
Please help us spread the word. Like and Share us on Facebook, follow us on Twitter,
and like our videos on YouTube. Tell your friends. Nothing is more important than word-of-mouth. Your
friends will thank you. And we will thank you!

story:
**Update

Recently we have found partnership with a group of Evergreen students working on a small island near Panama. The Maya Point Project island holds a food forest built on permaculture values. We hope to be sourcing all of our cacao from this farm very soon!

WE ARE ABLE TO SHIP!


For years we have been amateur chocolatiers, crafting unique and healthy alternatives to the age old treat by using medicinal ingredients to create amazing flavors. We are already producing raw vegan chocolate for local coffee shops and small events, but to turn our operation into a sustainable business, we need equipment and resources that are currently out of our reach.


Why chocolate?
Chocolate stimulates our senses and invigorates our spirits, so why not enhance vitality as well? We include a variety of unusual ingredients in our chocolates to give flavor as well as enhance your life. We add certain Ayurvedic and Chinese medicinal herbs and roots that have been passed down for thousands of years. We even add potent medicinal mushrooms like Reishi (Ganoderma lucidium) and Lion's Mane (Hericium erinaceous), selected to bring you a healthy mind, body and spirit.


How do we strive for sustainability?
We recognize that cacao is a delicious luxury brought to us from afar. In an effort to counter the strain this food places on our precious ecosystem, we not only use sustainably grown and fair trade ingredients, but buy farm-direct whenever possible. In addition, we donate a portion of our profits to the Amazon Mycorenewal Project, a non-profit using fungi to clean up toxic pollution in Ecuador.

What We Need: To meet the demand for nutritious chocolate in the Pacific Northwest, we need to develop our production line beyond our current kitchen supplies. To properly mix large, smooth batches of chocolate, we need..
Large tempering machine ($2500)
Stone grinder ($1000)
Molds, kitchen equipment and sustainable packaging ($1000)
Ingredients and kitchen rental to fill our perks! ($1000)

What You Get: Welcome to Community Supported Chocolate! We will supply you with a monthly subscription of chocolates, based on our current array of exquisite raw vegan flavors. If in Seattle, please join us each month at Black Coffee Co-op for a free cup of coffee or tea when you pick up your chocolate box. And if you can't make it, worry not--we'll deliver your subscription by bicycle right to your door.


Each box consists of 1 chocolate per day. One full share equates to 12 boxes, 1 per month. 6 in a half share, 3 in a quarter share.

 1 month (30 chocolates) $50
 1/4 share (3 month supply- 90 chocolates)-- plus a cup of drinking chocolate with your monthly box $150
 1/2 share (6 month supply -180 chocolates) --plus a cup of drinking chocolate with your box, an extra special creation each month and a private tea tasting at the location of your choice-- $300.00,
 1 full Share (1 year supply -360 chocolates) -- plus a cup of drinking chocolate, a double serving of our extra special creation each month and a private tea tasting at the location of your choice-- $500.00

story:
Thank you very much for taking an interest in our Electric Cocktails crowdfunding efforts! This idea was really born out of two different strands, the first one being to keep our sanity. Our bar has been closed for over a year now, and it's been tough to keep motivated and to keep match fit.

Being closed has given us the time to have a lot of fun coming up with new cocktail menus and bringing new innovation to it, but at the same time we have nobody to share these cocktails with, and that in our opinion is the most rewarding part. It looks like we are going to have another summer of garden parties and sitting at home so we said look, we have come up with these cool recipes, we can't wait to share them with you so lets plough ahead with it.

The other reason, to be honest is probably less exciting but equally important to us, it looks like we are going to miss out on our peak season in Electric. We are really lucky to be next to a really nice park and summer is a really great time for us. Unfortunately, this summer it doesn’t look like we will be serving you cocktails in the park so the next best thing that we can do is create bottled, delicious cocktails and deliver them to you this way. A little piece of the Electric experience to take home!

So the reason that we are raising money is to enable us to do this properly, we practiced at Christmas and were really proud of our efforts but we felt with glass bottles and proper labels, new recipes and new equipment, we could up our game and deliver something really unique. We want to give you delicious cocktails that you can sip wherever you are, until we can welcome you through our doors again with very open arms!

The cocktails range in everything from our take on the modern classic Pornstar Martini, so we are calling it Pornstar Punch, right through to Peanut Butter Jelly, a PBJ Old Fashioned which is something very different. We have a great team in our expert mixologists, Carl and Trafford and no better people to come up with twists and innovations in the cocktail space. We are super excited to share them with you. Hopefully you'll buy one of our new cocktails through the platform and we are excited to see what you think! Thank you for your support.

Our Cocktails:

Pornstar Punch- Vodka, passionfruit, pineapple and vanilla.. serve on its own over ice or topped with chilled soda water or a splash of Prosecco, garnish with passionfruit or lime.

Strawberry Mojito- White rum, strawberry, mint and lime.. serve chilled over ice, topped with chilled soda, garnish with a mint sprig.

Garden Collins- Gin, apple, elderflower, cucumber and mint.. serve over ice topped with chilled soda or tonic water, garnish with cucumber or lemon twist.

PBJ- Old Fashioned- Peanut butter whiskey, strawberry, jam bitters.. serve over ice, garnish with a strawberry slice.

We would be so grateful if you could share this info with friends/family and help us create some noise about our cocktail campaign!

story:
Santosha

My name is Liz and I'm the founder of Santosha Nutrition. Santosha is a Sanskrit word that means contentment, and it is my goal to spread this throughout my community and the world. As a plant-based chef with a passion for food and the environment, I believe that one of the best ways I can do this is with a cookbook!  Plant-based cooking is incredibly creative, delicious and the most friendly to our bodies, the earth and all of living creatures. This cookbook will showcase over 50 simple and tasty recipes that everyone (and their tastebuds) will love. 

I also want this project to support additional organizations dedicated to environmentally sustainable practices, so a percentage of each copy sold will go directly to non-profits aligned with this vision.

My Ask

I am asking for $10,000 to create this cookbook. These funds will go towards editing, design, photography, recipe testing, publishing and marketing costs for hardcopies & an e-book. As a contributor to this campaign you will have a unique opportunity to be an integral part of this project and I plan to thank you in the following ways: 

-Signed cookbook copy

-VIP Release Party & Dinner

-Contributor list & dedication inside the book

The Impact

I believe that eating more plants can change the world, so I started Santosha to provide education & sustainable resources for individuals & organizations seeking to create a healthier, happier planet for all. The best way to impact others is to simply share what you are passionate about and lead by example - this cookbook is my way of doing just that. Together we can make an impact and create a valuable resource to show people that eating healthy & conscious food is easy and delicious.

Eating more plants is the number one way for an individual to minimize their impact on planet Earth. Unfortunately, many people don't know where to begin or are deterred by the challenge of creating meals without the products they've grown accustomed to eating. This cookbook will showcase how enjoyable and rewarding the world of cooking plants can be. 

The Challenge

This project has been a dream for as long as I can remember, but only since the founding of Santosha has it seemed a possibility. Self-publishing will be challenging, but I am excited to work with members of our community to overcome any obstacles and with your support I know we will make it happen. 

Everything Helps

I know that sometimes a financial contribution can be difficult, but remember, anything helps. If you can give money to this campaign, please do so, but if you can't, here are some other ways you can help.

  • SHARE this campaign link on social media and with your community.
  • Are you a restaurant or business owner and are willing to sell my cookbook onsite? Let's talk!
  • Do you have a passion or skill you think would help this project? Reach out & let me know - let's get you involved! 
    • ​Marketing
    • Social Media
    • Cooking
    • Promotional connections

story:
INTRODUCTION

TSUBI SOUP is for anyone who wants to fit more delicious, plant-based foods into their life. Whether you’re a diehard vegan or simply veggie-curious, TSUBI SOUP will add function to your snack-time and become a simple go-to, for your busy lifestyle. 

Our soups are ultra compact, light and travel friendly and have a shelf-life of up to 18 months. They are great for travel and even emergencies when your fridge is empty, you're coffee'd out and you crave something savory, healthy and delicious. All you need is hot water, and voila! fresh soup ready to eat in 10 seconds.

L: Alex, C: Elly, R: Tsubi at Expo West 

We love what we do and our happy customers are the only reason why we keep working hard at what we do.

HOW TSUBI SOUP BEGAN

My name is Tsubi. It's short for Tsubasa. I used to eat a lot of meat and dairy, but a series of health issues led me to a plant-based diet. I was in my early 30's and was willing to try anything. After just a few weeks of eating balanced, whole plant-foods, I noticed a spike in my energy, mental sharpness and overall drive. So I started seeking out plant-based snacks and instant soups that I could enjoy with my busy schedule. I was horrified to find that all the instant soups I tried tasted terrible, and many were made with highly processed ingredients of unknown origins. This ignited a fire in me, and led me to find my true calling: creating delicious plant-based soups made from clean and traceable ingredients! 

WHAT'S SPECIAL?

Following my Japanese roots, I began making soups with Japanese miso, an ancient paste made from fermented soybeans which is packed with natural probiotics and enzymes.  The miso used in Tsubi Soup has been made by the same family since the 1800's Edo period. Instead of using seafood for the dashi — a fundamental stock in Japanese cuisine that adds depth and savory flavor — I created the umami essence using wild seaweed and shiitake mushrooms. This plant-based dashi is the foundation of TSUBI SOUP’s three flavors, each one featuring unique miso blends and original, gourmet vegetable toppings that are fully traceable from farm to fork.  

TSUBI SOUPs are then freeze-dried, compressed into cubes and individually packed into single servings. This makes them ultra-light, mess-free, and easy to grab on the go. Below are our three original flavors. As you can see, there are chunky ingredients loaded into each cube. 

Freeze drying also helps to maintain the ingredients’ molecular structure and nutritional integrity. This is a major reason why space explorers take freeze dried foods into space. Every cube is jam-packed with veggies, whose vibrant colors and textures magically come to life with the touch of boiling water.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

｀

WHY MADE IN JAPAN? 

Our recipes are very simple, yet each hand picked ingredient plays an important role in the flavors and the dimensions. We use only supply chain traceable ingredients from ISO regulated, trusted suppliers in Japan, where the highest quality ingredients, advanced technology, unbeatable pride in craftsmanship, and strict quality control are the norm. This adherence to excellence is why Tsubi’s production is currently — and will always be — based in Japan. Our U.S. headquarters acts as the exclusive importer and distributor which then branches Tsubi Soup to the world.

Pic: L: Tsubi, R:Alex 

 

WHERE WE ARE NOW

We’ve been making our gourmet, plant-based miso soups for three years — and have come a long way since our first trade show, where we stuffed thousands of soup samples into suitcases and nervously shared TSUBI SOUP with the world for the first time. Today, multiple trade shows, vegan events and hundreds of in-store demos later, we’ve been able to reach a diverse audience of customers who truly love our concept and brand. We are super lucky and grateful to have such a supportive, organic fanbase around the world. 

 

We’ve sold over 250,000 soups across the globe — and now we're available in some of the most incredible and innovative plant-focused stores in America (including 27 Whole Foods in the New England area alone!).  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Thank you for reading

The last three years have been an amazing journey of triumphs and challenges and many learning experiences. We've evolved so much as a company and see incredible opportunities to grow our brand to become a household name. Tsubi Soup has been proudly self funded all the way, but this time we need your help to keep spreading this plant-based journey. We realize that we just can't do it alone, and with your support, we can keep this dream alive. Our mission is to continue bringing incredible plant-based soups to the world while also contributing to our environment, focusing on food chain transparency and most importantly, adding nourishment and convenience to your daily meals.

Because great vegan food is great for you, great for the animals, and wonderful for the planet.

story:
Santo Coffee cubes is a high quality, convenient, and easy to prepare Coffee Experience.

Drop, Stir, and Enjoy. 

Three simple steps that allow you to enjoy a perfect cup of coffee anywhere, anytime.

Santo Coffee Cubes are premium quality coffee handpicked in Colombia. We have created multiple flavors with the perfect blend of sweetener. 

All you need to do is just add water or milk...sit back and enjoy. No machines. No mess. 

Santo Coffee Cubes uses only 100% top-quality Colombian coffee without adding any chemicals or preservatives. 

The Cubes are all natural handpicked coffee, partnered up with USDA organic flavors and sweetened with unrefined raw evaporated sugar cane. 

Santo Coffee Cubes are artisan made in Colombia, involving just natural and organic ingredients to conserve their freshness and aromas. They look pretty simple, right? 

Well, that's what we wanted: to make Santo Cubes the simplest way to make a high-quality cup of coffee.

It took more than 2 years of development to find the perfect combination, testing different humidity levels, recipes, and flavors.

Finally, we managed to crack the coffee code for you to enjoy. 

Making a Santo Coffee Cube is as simple as three steps:

One of the best things about Santo Coffee Cubes is that you always know what amount of coffee you are going to need to make your perfect cup. 

Whether you are having a small 6-8 oz cup or making a big tumbler for your whole morning. No waste, no mess.

No longer will you have to stand in line at coffee shops or use single-serve pod machines that serve substandard brews.

Santo Coffee Cubes saves you money and time, and gives you the option to brew the perfect premium coffee in seconds.

 

Santo Coffee Cubes are perfect for outdoor activities! You can simply take your cubes with you and have the perfect cup of coffee anywhere your adventure takes you.

Enjoy every morning without the hassle of a coffee machine or having to brew your coffee for long periods of time. Santo Coffee Cubes makes it easy, in a matter of seconds.

Put it in your backpack, your purse, your pocket, your office desk, absolutely anywhere. Santo Coffee Cubes will go with you, not the other way around.

With this project we have launched Santo Coffee Cubes with the following flavors: * Caramel * Mocha * Amaretto * Vanilla * Cappuccino * Hazelnut * Dark Roast * Light Roast * Decaf.

 

With your support after hitting our $30,000 goal we stretched our goal to $80,000, and now that we have hit that goal, we want to stretch it even further to $150,000.

As we mentioned before and promised we added three additional flavors.

(Check the rewards for our NEW FLAVORS. Be quick and get them, they are going to be really limited. Thanks for supporting us! ) 

Refreshing, delicious, something to look forward to. That is the way I have always viewed coffee, dating back to my earliest travels through Colombia, a country known for growing the best coffee in the world. 

For a long time, I have felt the drive to share my passion for coffee with the world, giving other people a glimpse into the magic that I see in every cup. 

I had the opportunity to spend time in Colombia and to drink coffee fresh from the ground, an experience that is difficult to replicate. However, we have made our best efforts to bring a piece of Colombia in a cup.

Within the mountains of Colombia, where the most recognized coffee in the world is grown, the people from these regions have a great impact on farming practices making sure the coffee we consume on a daily basis is at its perfect point. 

Behind every coffee bean that is exported to many countries around the globe, there is a farmer and his family dedicated to growing, hand picking, drying and roasting it. Their economy is based on the price of coffee, which is the main economic activity for more than 563,000 families just in Colombia. 

One of our initiatives to develop this product is to be able to help and give back to Coffee Farming families around the world, starting from the Coffee Fields that produce Santo Coffee Cubes. 

We would like to give back to the countries that grow coffee by aiding their children, especially impoverished children who live in the countryside and struggle to make better lives for themselves. 

Our intention is to make a positive impact on the world in two ways, offering superb coffee and helping the children whose lives revolve around the coffee fields. A portion of proceeds will be donated to help coffee growers and their children have a better quality of life. 

After two years of working with our team of experienced farmers, family and entrepreneurs on this project, we can say we have almost everything ready to start producing Santo Coffee Cubes the right way. However, as a startup, some of our trusted manufacturing partners in Colombia and the US need a minimum financial commitment from us to get started on a larger manufacturing run, so we can lower costs and production times. 

This is why we have emerged into Indiegogo Indemand, which will give us kickstart to our dream. By hitting our funding goal and get more people to support us, we are able to produce our final product in larger quantities, put our first big order with the quality that we want, so that we are able to serve every customer's demand. 

With this said, everyone who helps us in the making of Santo Coffee Cubes, will get the product at less than future retail prices – and will be the first to be offered exclusive and premium perks, and limited edition flavors coming down the road. 

I love being an entrepreneur, but I love coffee even more—especially coffee cubes! I'm obsessed with marketing, customer experiences, and bringing a smile to consumers as well as the people who work behind of each of my projects.

I have been in the digital marketing industry for more than 5 years, and my career has been focused on bringing new ideas or inventions involving craft and artisan-made techniques and how to market them to the entire world.

With Santo Coffee Cubes, I am working with my team, my family, and experienced farmers to bring people around the world a simple and delicious coffee experience and to help families and children within the coffee fields to have a fair and better quality of life.

We have created multiple flavors with the perfect blend of sweetener. All you need to do is just add water or milk...sit back and enjoy. No machines. No mess. Santo Coffee Cubes uses only 100% top-quality Colombian coffee without adding any chemicals or preservatives. The Cubes are all natural handpicked coffee, partnered up with USDA organic flavors and sweetened with unrefined raw evaporated sugar cane.

story:
Introduction

 

Like every good story, there has to be a beginning.  And as in all cases, there is one here.  However, if you’re reading this, you’ve joined us in the later chapters of it. Somewhere in chapter five actually.  There’s a lot to fill in, but we’re going to condense it to a single though per chapter (plus an introduction).

Intro: Picked up my dad’s old store-bought extract homebrew kit after four years in the Marine Corps and hated the result, causing me to decide to learn the real way to brew beer

Chapter 1: Began homebrewing in Reno, Nevada and found a real passion for it until I moved to Texas and downgraded from a house to an apartment, ceasing my brewing operations for the time being

Chapter 2: Met an amazing woman who listened to my crazy ideas of one day owning a brewery and she purchased me a new brewing kit for our first Christmas together which re-ignited the fire I felt for the craft

Chapter 3: Took that kit and built upon it, making my house fill up with bottles and brews and turned bottling into a full-on family affair that everyone partook in

Chapter 4: Introduced Todd, my partner, to the process of brewing and we hatched the actual plan to build a brewery including the purchase of 8 barrels of fermentation space, a single barrel brewing system, and a plethora of other equipment as we move towards opening

Chapter 5: In progress…

 

Who We Are

 

C.J. Gent – A Marine Corps veteran who served from 2005-2009.  Born and raised in Nevada, I moved to Texas after my military time to pursue career opportunities.  Hired on with Carrollton Police in 2014, it was there I met Todd and shortly after Todd’s retirement, I was promoted to Sergeant and oversee a patrol shift and the bike team.

Todd Burnside – A veteran of the U.S. Army also worked for Carrollton Police for over 20 years.  Todd recently retired from the department as a Sergeant and has begun working in the security field since. 

 

What We Are

 

Four Walls Brewing Company is built upon a concept that resonates with most people – that there is comfort in wherever you call home.  When we end a shift, when we get back from a business trip, when a service member returns home from a deployment or the completion of a contract, there is comfort there.  And within the Four Walls of home, you find peace.

Our beers are designed for the newcomer to the world of craft beers and the experienced craft beer drinker alike.  Many of our beers have mild flavors, designed not to overpower the palate but to entice it into more complex flavors.  Additionally, many of our beers have deep, complex, rich profiles that experienced drinkers enjoy and actively seek out to experience.

We are actively trying to move in to a property in Celina, TX, and we want to bring people together. Our plan is to be a small brewpub in Celina that will initially be open Friday-Sunday, with plans to expand our hours in the coming years. One of our main goals is to not only be part of a community, but to truly integrate into the community. When you come to Four Walls, we want the whole family to come.  Bring the kiddos, bring the pup. We don’t want you to take time away from your family to visit us.  Find comfort here in a good glass of beer while being surrounded by those you love.

Part of our goal, our campaign, our mission, is to be integral into our community.  We will, without question, give back to our community and to organizations that provide services to individuals in need.  As a 100% veteran owned company, our military members fall near and dear to our hearts. We feel strongly that there is a great demand placed on the young men and women of our great nation who sign up to serve, and it is our calling to be here for them when they get back. Equally, as two law enforcement officers, our brothers and sisters in blue (and yes, even red), mean a great deal to us as well.  We have selected organizations that help veterans and first responders that will receive donations from us.  It won’t stop there.  There are a number of other organizations that greatly impact our lives daily that we will support.

 

Support

 

Since early 2018, we've been communicating with the Economic Development group in Celina, Texas regarding opening our brewpub up in their city.  From the beginning, the excitement and support was unrivaled.  We have been constantly communicating with the EDC regarding our progress, and they have been helpful every step of the way as we try to bring our beers to their city. From our first meeting with the employees of the city, Celina has felt like the perfect place for our brewery to call home.

At a local event in June of 2018, we were able to have the citizens sample our beers and provide real time feedback.  The response was wonderful and the conversations we had with the people were great. We even ended up snagging a great graphic designer who has proved to be irreplaceable (thanks, Ryan!) With our desire to be in Celina, and the overwhelmingly positive response to the beers everyone sampled, we had to find a place to set up.

 

Location

 

So we began our search right then and there.  Immediately, we found a little gas station a couple hundred feet from Celina Town Square that seemed to be perfect.  Built in the 1930's, it has the history of the town, an extremely unique feel, the space and setup we need.

 

What We Have/Need

 

Here’s where we stand today.  We have chairs ready to go for the serving room, and we’re actively working on obtaining patio furniture for outside. With our single barrel system and eight barrels of fermentation space, that will provide us the opportunity to grow organically with the community and at a manageable pace.  We have a glycol chiller that can handle half of our vessels as it stands.  We recently ordered, and received, our initial glassware order of 16oz glasses, 5oz sample glasses, and 100 growlers for beer to go.

We are going to need another glycol chiller that can handle the full load of our fermenters, with the ability to add on additional fermenters.  This cost is approximately $5,000.  We will be building a walk-in cooler utilizing a CoolBot system, allowing us to customize the space from the beginning.  Estimated costs for this are roughly $1,500 - $2,000 for an 8’ x 8’x 12’ cooler.   These hard goods are required for us to get open and operational.

Additionally, we will have our TABC and TTB licensing to take care of. Without the appropriate paperwork completed, we can’t bring our beers to you. The process to begin obtaining our licenses can only begin once we establish a location and begin finishing out the interior.

 

Why Another Brewery??

 

With all the different breweries in the world right now, why another one? Why should I help open yet another manufacturer of beer? The question is fair. 

We want to be a welcoming, comfortable place that provides a wide variety of beers for everyone's palate.  We will always keep up with the latest trends while maintaining the small town feel.  We want to produce something for everyone, and we believe that many breweries these days do not do that.  Four Walls doesn't want to alienate those who haven't found that craft beer they enjoy, but rather provide them with the craft beer they will learn to love.

 

    Challenges

     

    Ultimately, the main challenge we will face is going to come from construction and rehabilitation costs of our building.  Originally built in the 1930's, our location is an old gas station that has seen some years and additions along the way.  The uniqueness is something we want to preserve, but in order to do that we anticipate some unforeseen costs as work progresses along.

     

    Other Ways You Can Help

     

    At the end of the day, we know not everyone can help out.  And that is 100% understandable.  If you can't help out with a donation, we ask that you spread the word about what we're trying to bring to Celina. Ultimately, it is the generosity of those of you taking the time to read these words and watch our video that will help bring our dream to life.  And whether you live nearby or not, you will help build a place for friends, families, strangers, and loved ones to make memories that will be cherished for years to come.

       

      We will always strive to provide you the best beer possible, made with the finest ingredients and the most efficient practices.  We won’t cut corners because it’s something we simply don’t do. We will become part of a community, bringing people together and spreading the love and comfort that we craft. And when you come in, if the mood strikes you, we will have journals behind the bar yearning for your short stories to be penned.  Because at the end of the day, there’s a story in here somewhere.

story:
We make it fresh, unfiltered, alive, with a thriving probiotic culture.

The future's alive with tastier, healthier alcohol!  That's what we're making.  Help us continue developing and get the funding we need for production!

We are two active, California brewers, creating something beautiful for the world.  Not just a tasty, health-conscious beverage, but an empowering organization and a lasting contribution.  In all that we do, we promise to be awesome, loving, connected and true.

Co-founder Joshua has experience in food, beverage, branding, communications, and transformative education.  Having grown up equally in Maine and California, he embodies a commitment to community, excellence and fun.  With his love for the active, health-conscious foodie/drinker and his commitment to what's really possible in life, Joshua serves as the visionary managing director for Dr Hops Kombucha Beer. 

Co-founder Tommy has experience in both kombucha fermentation and beer brewing.  Having grown up in California with a love for microbiology and transformative life processes, he is undeniably on a quest for ever more tantalizing alcoholic fermentations.  Tommy is the inspired and passionate brewer at the heart of Dr Hops' astounding kombucha beer.

Our product is true, living kombucha, a cultured, probiotic tea.  And it’s way tastier and pleasing than any kombucha you've ever had!  It's fruity, fresh, herbal, aromatic, sparkling, balanced, and fun!  People are amazed when they learn what it is.  You've just got to try it!

This is your new "go-to", a delightful alcoholic beverage that will leave you feeling great.

Our business has been developing steadily since we started in May of 2015 and we've now got:

  • several products ready for commercial production, some at 8-10% alcohol and some at 5-6%
  • many more tantalizing ideas in development
  • most of the initial licensing we need
  • plans for two distinct and complimentary production pathways
  • several great distributors interested in carrying our line
  • a great new friend & legal partner, Janelle, from Buffett-Kennedy Smith
  • consumers, retailers, cafes, bars and other businesses ready to buy
  • a thriving community of fans and supporters

It’s time to get into production!  Your financial contributions can help get us there.  Select a perk or get in as a formal investor by contacting us now.

Our $9000 goal here (goal updating shortly) will cover all our current operating costs.  This will allow us to keep developing awesome, new kombucha beers as we put together the more substantial funding needed to begin commercial production.  Your support here contributes directly to the quality and awesomeness of what we will soon make available.

This is as much an art form for us as a business.  We're making true, inspired creations designed for you to drink!  Imagine how great it will be to have this available to share with your friends.

Once we get rolling and have our kombucha beers out there for you to enjoy, we will go after a much greater level of funding.  We will then build the iconic, health-conscious brewery we envision, a community center for thoughtful, transformative conversation, and the celebration of life.  We dearly look forward to sharing this space with you and to partnering with other entrepreneurs in building additional health-conscious kombucharies throughout the world.

Please support us in leading the revolution for truly delightful, health-enhancing alcohol.

The Perks (images at bottom of this page):

Your contribution will be rewarded.  We’ve got a thrilling collection of great perks for you.  And we take suggestions.

All of the perks offered here are unique, limited editions.  Someday you’ll walk into one of our kombucharies in your Dr Hops hat and you will be showered with adoration and kombucha beer.  We will remember your contribution!  An item from this campaign will forever mark you as a Dr Hops hero.

And while we are prohibited from offering you our kombucha beer directly, we’ve devised other great ways for you to experience the magic.  Book us for your private party.  Come down for a kombucha class and tasting.  As long as you’re 21+, we will have product for you at all of our events.

So jump in!

Risks & Challenges:

Suffice to say, there are tons of risks and challenges.  I’m sure you can think of some.  That’s a good thing!  As far as we can tell, great reward only comes through great risk.  Plus, given our core value Awesomeness, risk is expected.  Here are a few:

  • Funding:  We could fail to get adequate funding. 
  • Production:  We could fail at producing the product effectively and reliably.
  • Sales:  We could fail to sell enough product and at a price sufficient to make our business viable.  Demand could dry up.  Competition could crush us. 
  • Distribution:  We could fail to get our product to our customers effectively.
  • Legal:  We could run into problems with the law, licensing issues, or lawsuits.
  • Social/Environmental:  We could find ourselves in a dangerous social and/or environmental climate.

So what can you count on?

A message from Joshua:

Tommy and I are two similarly committed humans with highly complementary talents.  We are both committed to people, and all of earth's creatures, being loved, honored, connected, and free.  This is the context for all that we do, and it sources our mission and values as a business.  It is an honor for each of us to be on this journey, and we don’t take it lightly.  For both of us, Dr Hops Kombucha Beer is a tactile and bona fide chance to fulfill our commitments in the world.  We will make this happen.

Tommy grew up in the greater bay area and still has close family and friends here.  He’s got an awesome partner and two loving dogs, Rupert and Stella.  His love for great fermentations is contagious and he just keeps making them ever more delightful.

I’ve been in the bay area since 2006, and have a massive community here.  I now live two miles from the Dr Hops brew space with my miraculously supportive wife and our rabbit, Dr. Hopps.  My basic practice in life is to throw my hat over whatever wall looks worth scaling.  Dr Hops Kombucha Beer, a values-based, mission-driven business with a tantalizing product, is the great wall before me now.

It is an honor to scale this wall with you.  Thank you for all you contribute.  One way or another, I'll see you on the other side.  :-)

Participate, share, contribute.  Email your friends.  Post us to your pages.

Thank you.  Now, let's enjoy some Dr Hops.

PIN, Lavender:

Bottle Opener:

T-Shirt, Silver, USA, Men's:

T-Shirt, Black, Import, Women's:

2L Growler:

Rastal Glassware:

Dr Hops Party Service:
story_txt:
We make it fresh, unfiltered, alive, with a thriving probiotic culture.The future's alive with tastier, healthier alcohol!  That's what we're making.  Help us continue developing and get the funding we need for production!We are two active, California brewers, creating something beautiful for the world.  Not just a tasty, health-conscious beverage, but an empowering organization and a lasting contribution.  In all that we do, we promise to be awesome, loving, connected and true.Co-founder Joshua has experience in food, beverage, branding, communications, and transformative education.  Having grown up equally in Maine and California, he embodies a commitment to community, excellence and fun.  With his love for the active, health-conscious foodie/drinker and his commitment to what's really possible in life, Joshua serves as the visionary managing director for Dr Hops Kombucha Beer. Co-founder Tommy has experience in both kombucha fermentation and beer brewing.  Having grown up in California with a love for microbiology and transformative life processes, he is undeniably on a quest for ever more tantalizing alcoholic fermentations.  Tommy is the inspired and passionate brewer at the heart of Dr Hops' astounding kombucha beer.Our product is true, living kombucha, a cultured, probiotic tea.  And it’s way tastier and pleasing than any kombucha you've ever had!  It's fruity, fresh, herbal, aromatic, sparkling, balanced, and fun!  People are amazed when they learn what it is.  You've just got to try it!This is your new "go-to", a delightful alcoholic beverage that will leave you feeling great.Our business has been developing steadily since we started in May of 2015 and we've now got:
several products ready for commercial production, some at 8-10% alcohol and some at 5-6%
many more tantalizing ideas in development
most of the initial licensing we need
plans for two distinct and complimentary production pathways
several great distributors interested in carrying our line
a great new friend & legal partner, Janelle, from Buffett-Kennedy Smith
consumers, retailers, cafes, bars and other businesses ready to buy
a thriving community of fans and supporters
It’s time to get into production!  Your financial contributions can help get us there.  Select a perk or get in as a formal investor by contacting us now.Our $9000 goal here (goal updating shortly) will cover all our current operating costs.  This will allow us to keep developing awesome, new kombucha beers as we put together the more substantial funding needed to begin commercial production.  Your support here contributes directly to the quality and awesomeness of what we will soon make available.This is as much an art form for us as a business.  We're making true, inspired creations designed for you to drink!  Imagine how great it will be to have this available to share with your friends.Once we get rolling and have our kombucha beers out there for you to enjoy, we will go after a much greater level of funding.  We will then build the iconic, health-conscious brewery we envision, a community center for thoughtful, transformative conversation, and the celebration of life.  We dearly look forward to sharing this space with you and to partnering with other entrepreneurs in building additional health-conscious kombucharies throughout the world.Please support us in leading the revolution for truly delightful, health-enhancing alcohol.The Perks (images at bottom of this page):Your contribution will be rewarded.  We’ve got a thrilling collection of great perks for you.  And we take suggestions.All of the perks offered here are unique, limited editions.  Someday you’ll walk into one of our kombucharies in your Dr Hops hat and you will be showered with adoration and kombucha beer.  We will remember your contribution!  An item from this campaign will forever mark you as a Dr Hops hero.And while we are prohibited from offering you our kombucha beer directly, we’ve devised other great ways for you to experience the magic.  Book us for your private party.  Come down for a kombucha class and tasting.  As long as you’re 21+, we will have product for you at all of our events.So jump in!Risks & Challenges:Suffice to say, there are tons of risks and challenges.  I’m sure you can think of some.  That’s a good thing!  As far as we can tell, great reward only comes through great risk.  Plus, given our core value Awesomeness, risk is expected.  Here are a few:

Funding:  We could fail to get adequate funding. 

Production:  We could fail at producing the product effectively and reliably.

Sales:  We could fail to sell enough product and at a price sufficient to make our business viable.  Demand could dry up.  Competition could crush us. 

Distribution:  We could fail to get our product to our customers effectively.

Legal:  We could run into problems with the law, licensing issues, or lawsuits.

Social/Environmental:  We could find ourselves in a dangerous social and/or environmental climate.
So what can you count on?A message from Joshua:Tommy and I are two similarly committed humans with highly complementary talents.  We are both committed to people, and all of earth's creatures, being loved, honored, connected, and free.  This is the context for all that we do, and it sources our mission and values as a business.  It is an honor for each of us to be on this journey, and we don’t take it lightly.  For both of us, Dr Hops Kombucha Beer is a tactile and bona fide chance to fulfill our commitments in the world.  We will make this happen.Tommy grew up in the greater bay area and still has close family and friends here.  He’s got an awesome partner and two loving dogs, Rupert and Stella.  His love for great fermentations is contagious and he just keeps making them ever more delightful.I’ve been in the bay area since 2006, and have a massive community here.  I now live two miles from the Dr Hops brew space with my miraculously supportive wife and our rabbit, Dr. Hopps.  My basic practice in life is to throw my hat over whatever wall looks worth scaling.  Dr Hops Kombucha Beer, a values-based, mission-driven business with a tantalizing product, is the great wall before me now.It is an honor to scale this wall with you.  Thank you for all you contribute.  One way or another, I'll see you on the other side.  :-)Participate, share, contribute.  Email your friends.  Post us to your pages.Thank you.  Now, let's enjoy some Dr Hops.PIN, Lavender:Bottle Opener:T-Shirt, Silver, USA, Men's:T-Shirt, Black, Import, Women's:2L Growler:Rastal Glassware:Dr Hops Party Service:

story:
KPOP Sauce is sweet and tangy, with a kick. The unique Korean flavors will have you coming back for more! Use it like a condiment, marinade, sauce, hot sauce, and even dressing! It pairs well with eggs, pizza, salads, burritos, steaks, shrimp, and even almonds and pretzels. Pop off and let’s celebrate!

 

 

_______________________________________

 

“KPOP’s flavor is deeper and more complex than any other sauce I have at home (and I have a lot!) and it makes every dish taste special.” – Katrina K.

“After trying the sauce with my french fries, I couldn’t wait to tear my burger up.” – Aditya V.

“There’s so much more flavor than Sriracha. It’s smooth and doesn’t completely mask the flavor of the food you’re eating like other hot sauces.” – Alex V.

“I’ve added KPOP Sauce to several dishes already, including turkey meatballs and a fried rice stir-fry, and it is amazing! I can’t wait to get more, as it will easily become my go-to hot sauce from now on.” – Chris W.

“As a first generation Korean American, KPOP Sauce is a great gateway for food lovers to experience the flavors and spices of Korean cuisine. It was sweet, tangy, and left a subtle burn on the back of my tongue. Excellent!” – Henry O.

 

_______________________________________

 

Founders, Theo and Mike, met at UCLA and instantly connected through their mutual love of Korean food. Their passion spread to their friends, who had little or no prior experience with the cuisine. They told Theo and Mike it wasn't just the amazing flavors, but that eating Korean food was like a celebration; it was a time to come together, enjoy each other's company, and have fun. 

This resonated deeply with the founders because they had found an extraordinary medium to bring a diverse group of people together to celebrate life. Theo and Mike recruited classmates, Erica, Ryan, and Alex, and after a year of planning, KPOP Foods launched in early 2017.

 

_______________________________________

 

KPOP Foods is more than a Korean food company - it’s about bringing people together, having fun, and enjoying life. If you’ve ever had Korean food, you know it’s a party! Great food, drinks, and atmosphere. 

Here at KPOP Foods, whether you’re eating with friends or by yourself, we want you to enjoy that experience anytime and anywhere with our products. Just like Korean food brings people together and raises their spirits, we believe that we need to do the same for one another.

Our mission is to bring people together and uplift spirits by sharing Korean flavors with America.

 

_______________________________________

 

Korean chili pepper paste (called gochujang in Korean) is unique to Korea and has been a staple of the Korean diet for 2,000 years! Korean red chili pepper paste is created from a loving and arduous process. Raw soy beans are cooked and aged for 20-90 days. Then, rice powder, salt, and red peppers are added. The combined mix is aged again for 90-120 days. This aging process adds the umami and sweetness unique to KPOP Sauce.

 

_______________________________________

 

A successful Indiegogo campaign will allow us to follow our dreams full-time after graduation. We already have the contracts in place with a reputable and amazing manufacturer in Southern California. The sauce formula and packaging design are complete. Now, we just need YOUR help to raise the funds to begin production and ship all the KPOP Sauce and merchandise YOU ordered. Your support will also allow us to develop more awesome products and get them into your hands faster. As a backer, you’re a KPOP Foods family member for life! You will be the first to know about our new products and will be encouraged to send your comments, questions, and feedback directly to the team.

 

_______________________________________

story:
Salut, 

(texte en Français plus bas)

We are Midnight Poutine! For those who never heard of us, we're a Burning Man food camp from the french speaking province of Canada called Quebec.  Since 2009, we've been driving 10 000 km (6 200 miles) to Black Rock City, NV, to serve poutines to very hungry and eager burners at -surprise- midnight.

But what's poutine?  It's a traditional Quebecois comfort food usually (but not always) eaten after a night of drinking. It’s made from french fries and cheese curds (what is called in Quebecois "cheese droppings " ). The whole thing covered with thick brown sauce from ancient family recipes.  After a full day of drinking and partying on the playa this simple dish will blow you away!

Last year, 2000 hungry burners got a taste of Midnight Poutine. It's a party every night with Québecois music, a burn barrel, sexy people, line-ups around the block, an open-mic stage to entertain the line-up and, of course, poutine! We don't want to leave anybody hungry at BRC :)  

We need your contributions for :

Cheese curds : Hell yeah, we use REAL cheese curds!  Without cheese we would just have fries and sauce, and we all know how boring that would be.  And it turns out that cheese curds are our biggest expense!!!

The other Ingredients : This include potatoes, gravy,  and oil  and there's a lot propane to feed our trusty 6 fryers.

The other Logistics : It takes a lot to set up a food camp, make eating areas, an open-mic stage and decorations, not to mention getting all this stuff to Burning Man from Montreal and renting a storage locker year-round in Reno, NV, for all our other stuff.  'nuff said.  

It cost about 5000$ to serve about 2000 poutines and this excludes our camp's expenses. Some of the financing is done through fundraising events and by us. So that means ALL the money you contribute goes toward running the poutine kitchen! The more money we get, the more poutines we have the pleasure to serve, it's that simple.

Please help us feed our fellow burners in 2017 by funding the best late-night party food camp on the playa.  Thank you all!

 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

Bonjour à tous,

Nous sommes Midnight Poutine,  un camp de Montréal qui depuis 2009 parcourt 10 000 km aller-retour pour se rendre au festival Burning Man au Nevada. Tous les soirs à minuit sur la "playa", nous offrons de la poutine à nos compatriotes festivaliers (ou "burners").

Qu’est-ce que la poutine? Il s’agit d’un plat typiquement québécois composé de patates frites et de fromage en grain, communément appelé "crottes de fromage", le tout nappé d’une sauce dont la recette est un secret familial bien gardé.  Après une journée complète de fête et de boisson, le goût de nos poutines va faire littéralement "capoter" tous les burners.

L’an passé, nous avons offert 2000 poutines à des burners affamés qui étaient prêt à attendre des heures pour goûter à notre petit plat typique de fin-de-brosse.  Ça devient une fête improvisée a tous les soirs avec de la grosse musique Québécoise, du beau monde sexy, un baril de feu, une immense file d'attente, une scène ouverte ou les gens peuvent monter et divertir ceux qui attendent en ligne et, bien sûr, d'la poutiiiiiiiine!

Nous avons besoin de vos contributions pour : 

Les crottes de fromage : Eh oui, le fromage est sans contredit notre dépense la plus coûteuse mais sans fromage ça ne serait qu’une frite-sauce et on sait bien que c’est plate une frite-sauce.

Les autres ingrédients : Cela inclut les patates, la sauce, l’huile et aussi le gaz propane pour alimenter nos 6 friteuses adorées.

Les autres logistiques : À chaque année, nous devons construire notre camp, nos deux cuisines (publique et privée),  la scéne "open-mic" sans compter le transport de notre matériel en camion à partir de Montréal jusqu’à la playa et la location à l'année d'un espace d'entreposage pour le reste de notre stock à Reno, NV. Soyez certains que tout l'argent ramassé servira uniquement aux besoins culinaires de Midnight Poutine.

Il nous en coûte environ 5000$ pour servir 2000 poutines et ceci exclut les dépenses de notre campement. Une bonne partie de notre financement est faite grâce à des événements locaux en plus de nos propres contributions. Ainsi, TOUTES les sommes que nous collecterons dans cette campagne serviront uniquement à financer la cuisine.  Plus nous amasserons d'argent, plus de poutines nous aurons le plaisir de servir sur la playa. C'est aussi simple que ça.
 

Nous vous remercions de bien vouloir nous aider à répéter l’expérience encore une fois cette année. C'est grâce à vous que Midnight Poutine devient un lieu incontournable pour commencer sa soirée à Burning Man 2017. Un gros merci à tous!!
