campaign_city: Black Rock City, NV, United States

story:
Aveine has received great coverage from around the world.

The app identifies the wine through its AI enriched database, then pairs with the Aerator to calibrate it to that wine's ideal level of aeration. The Aerator instills the proper amount of air for your wine as you pour, instantly. 

The Smart Wine Aerator has been designed to be easy to use, ergonomic and intuitive.

 

Personalize

The Aerator can also be used without the app, allowing you to personalize the aeration time directly on the touch screen of the Aerator. 

As the oxygen is added to the wine as you pour, the wine in the bottle is not touched, allowing you and your guests to have fun trying out different levels of aeration and exploring new tastes!

From the very beginning of its adventure, Aveine, under the guidance of Julien Dussert (voted the best young sommelier in France!) has involved sommeliers, restaurateurs and wine lovers to taste, test, and validate the use of the Smart Wine Aerator.

Users download a free smartphone app that is used to control the Aveine Smart Wine Aerator. After scanning the label on the bottle, the wine is identified by pulling from a database and using Artificial Intelligence, then pairs with the Aerator to calibrate it to that wine’s ideal level of aeration.

The feature-rich app is free, easy to use, interactive and educational, and offers winetasting tips from sommeliers, oenologists, winegrowers and other members of the Aveine community.

The Aerator can also be used without the app, allowing users to have fun trying out different levels of aeration.

The packaging has been designed to endure, facilitate and secure the transport of the Smart Wine Aerator.

More than 5,000 hours of research and development were needed to develop the Aveine Aerator.

 

 

         

 

Can I choose the aeration time of my wine? 

Yes, you absolutely can! While the app speaks to the aerator telling it the ideal aeration time for a specific bottle of wine you have scanned, you can manually program the device for however much time you’d like, from 1 minute to 24 hours. The app is there to help in case you don't know how much time is necessary, but experimentation is encouraged! 

What if I want to try a different aeration time of the same bottle of wine? 

As the wine is aerated while coming out of the bottle, you can try out different aeration times for each glass and personalize the aeration according to your guest’s tastes. 

What is the difference between Aveine and a traditional wine aerator? 

With traditional wine aerators, you can just aerate or not! This is an ON/OFF system. Traditional wine aerators simply pass air through the wine, unable to take into consideration the various times needed for specific types of wine. It makes no sense because some wines need 20 minutes of aeration while others need 2 hours. Thanks to knowledge from a rich database calculating ideal aeration times for different wines and Aveine’s patented technology – the aerator can put up to 24 hours of oxygen into the wine in an instant.  

Will the aerator fit on any bottle? 

It is adaptable to the majority of 75 cl classic bottles. 

How do I clean it? 

After using, rinse with water in the sink. No dishwasher, no detergent.

Will the aerator affect the taste and quality of the wine? 

The aerator does not alter the wine. It puts oxygen into the wine as it flows through the device, releasing its flavors and aromas. The right amount of oxygen brings the wine to life, while too much can kill it. We invite you to explore different levels of aeration and explore different sensations.

How do I get the app, and is it free? 

The app is available for free on Google Play for Android 5.0 or greater, and in the App Store for iOS 10 or greater. 

How does it work if the wine is not recognized by the app?

If the wine label scanned is not currently in our database, a series of questions will be asked, and depending on the answer, our algorithms will propose the best aeration time.

What language is the app available in? 

The app is available in currently available in English and French. Additional languages may be added at a future date.

When is the expected delivery date? 
September 2018, November 2018 or January 2019 depending on the level of perk selected.

The Aerator instills the proper amount of air for your wine as you pour, instantly. The Smart Wine Aerator has been designed to be easy to use, ergonomic and intuitive. Personalize The Aerator can also be used without the app, allowing you to personalize the aeration time directly on the touch screen of the Aerator. As the oxygen is added to the wine as you pour, the wine in the bottle is not touched, allowing you and your guests to have fun trying out different levels of aeration and exploring new tastes!From the very beginning of its adventure, Aveine, under the guidance of Julien Dussert (voted the best young sommelier in France!) has involved sommeliers, restaurateurs and wine lovers to taste, test, and validate the use of the Smart Wine Aerator.Users download a free smartphone app that is used to control the Aveine Smart Wine Aerator. After scanning the label on the bottle, the wine is identified by pulling from a database and using Artificial Intelligence, then pairs with the Aerator to calibrate it to that wine’s ideal level of aeration.The feature-rich app is free, easy to use, interactive and educational, and offers winetasting tips from sommeliers, oenologists, winegrowers and other members of the Aveine community.The Aerator can also be used without the app, allowing users to have fun trying out different levels of aeration.The packaging has been designed to endure, facilitate and secure the transport of the Smart Wine Aerator.More than 5,000 hours of research and development were needed to develop the Aveine Aerator.



 
           Can I choose the aeration time of my wine? Yes, you absolutely can! While the app speaks to the aerator telling it the ideal aeration time for a specific bottle of wine you have scanned, you can manually program the device for however much time you’d like, from 1 minute to 24 hours. The app is there to help in case you don't know how much time is necessary, but experimentation is encouraged! What if I want to try a different aeration time of the same bottle of wine? As the wine is aerated while coming out of the bottle, you can try out different aeration times for each glass and personalize the aeration according to your guest’s tastes. What is the difference between Aveine and a traditional wine aerator? With traditional wine aerators, you can just aerate or not! This is an ON/OFF system. Traditional wine aerators simply pass air through the wine, unable to take into consideration the various times needed for specific types of wine. It makes no sense because some wines need 20 minutes of aeration while others need 2 hours. Thanks to knowledge from a rich database calculating ideal aeration times for different wines and Aveine’s patented technology – the aerator can put up to 24 hours of oxygen into the wine in an instant.  Will the aerator fit on any bottle? It is adaptable to the majority of 75 cl classic bottles. How do I clean it? After using, rinse with water in the sink. No dishwasher, no detergent.Will the aerator affect the taste and quality of the wine? The aerator does not alter the wine. It puts oxygen into the wine as it flows through the device, releasing its flavors and aromas. The right amount of oxygen brings the wine to life, while too much can kill it. We invite you to explore different levels of aeration and explore different sensations.How do I get the app, and is it free? The app is available for free on Google Play for Android 5.0 or greater, and in the App Store for iOS 10 or greater. How does it work if the wine is not recognized by the app?If the wine label scanned is not currently in our database, a series of questions will be asked, and depending on the answer, our algorithms will propose the best aeration time.What language is the app available in? The app is available in currently available in English and French. Additional languages may be added at a future date.When is the expected delivery date? September 2018, November 2018 or January 2019 depending on the level of perk selected.

story:
Wait, What? Are You Serious?

Scramblers' ORIGINAL OMELET BAR™ is exactly what it sounds like! One of the most original, innovative snacks in years, Scramblers® bars are fully cooked, omelet-inspired breakfast bars.  We use top-quality, transparently-sourced ingredients, like Organic, Free-Range Eggs and Grass-Fed Ghee. We know how crazy mornings can be and how limited are the great tasting and healthy on-the-go options.

Armed with the best ingredients, we gently mix and individually heat-seal each bar in an air-tight tray and cook them to perfection, locking in the flavor and freshness. The result is a soft, fluffy, surprisingly moist, and naturally delicious morning snack.  Our omelet bars boast 10g+ of clean protein and a radically low 1-3g carbs per bar, making them extremely keto-friendly.

Versatile as they are delicious, Scramblers™ bars are intended to be eaten at room temperature or easily popped into a microwave (right in their trays!) for a boost of breakfast warmth. Almost as if by magic, Scramblers™ bars keep for up to 12 months without refrigeration or chemical preservatives. 

This is the healthy and delicious breakfast snack alternative you've been waiting for. One of our fans put it best: "where has this been all my life?!"

Shelf-Stable, Nutritious and Delicious

Over 2 years ago, we first conceived the idea for a tasty, nutritious, clean-label, fully shelf-stable, egg-based breakfast bar.  Soon after, we started concocting recipes in our home kitchens and with our jerky co-packer.  The idea that would eventually become Scramblers™ was thus hatched! 

While we were able to make tasty egg bars and bites fresh out of our ovens, we didn't have the food science chops to achieve a jerky-like shelf life.  So we did some research, and it turned out that the U.S. government didn't have the chops either!  In 2006, a 136-page paper was published which explained why shelf-stable, tasty egg products were a scientific long shot, if not impossibility.  We knew we'd have a tall task ahead.  

Enter Chew, a self-proclaimed "team of chefs, scientists, and inventors that don’t believe in impossible and don’t care about how things “should” be done."  With an underlying mission to "democratize good food," Chew tackles the wildest, most extraordinarily unthinkable, tallest tasks in Food & Beverage, with an unwavering commitment to do so all naturally and without anything artificial ever.  After an impassioned pitch to Chew's Founder/CEO Adam Melonas, we brought Chew aboard to help develop the world's first fully cooked, fully shelf-stable, omelet bar.    

Superior Nutrition

Made with the best eggs money can buy, Scramblers™ bars offer feel-great nutrition.  Each of our bars contains at least 10 grams of protein, with only 1-3 grams of carbs (and 0-1 grams of sugar!).

 

A tidy snack, Scramblers™ bars weigh in at a svelte 130-150 calories per bar.  We add nothing artificial – no preservatives, no artificial or natural flavors, and definitely no added sugar (or sugar substitutes).  Along with our pasture-raised, organic eggs, we carefully source pasture-raised butter.  Bacon, chicken sausage, cheese, veggies, and spices help Scramblers™ bars pack seriously savory breakfast flavor…anytime, anywhere! 

Familiar Breakfast Recipes

We've Got Nothing to Hide

Be some of the first people in history to try THE ORIGINAL OMELET BAR™, and help us bring healthy, deliciously different innovation to breakfast!  

From Around the Web

story:
With your help we will complete something really special. Beyond sharp, beyond strong and beautifully made by hand - we want to complete the ultimate knife collection. A complete range for every chefs task.

 




We took our Damascus Series Knives to CATRA in Sheffield, England the historic home of steel production. The Orient Damascus Series Knives recorded 'off the scale' results in both the edge retention and sharpness tests.

 

 

We knew could improve the design of traditional elite Japanese Knives and with the help of our award winning Designer Roy Gilsing we focused on the ergonomics and the handle design.

 

 

Most knives have the grip point at the end of the handle where it unreliably reacts with only the little finger. 

Only Orient knives re-focus the handle on a central grip point which interacts with the strongest middle fingers allowing you to push the knife firmly into the palm of the hand for more confident handling.

 

Our knives feature a 67 layer Damascus Steel Blade. This is 66 layers of SUS410 Japanese Stainless Steel, 33 on each side, protecting an AUS-10 super strength cutting core. 

This combination of materials produces a knife blade with a breathtaking performance characteristics, delivering supreme sharpness and class leading edge retention. 

All Orient Knives are beautifully packaged in a decorative gift box and supplied with a protective locking blade guard (sheath).

 

For too long, chef’s knives have been sold through expensive stores at hugely inflated prices.

We set out to create Orient, a knife brand that is beautiful in design and available to everyone at a fair and affordable price. 

You wont find our knives in retail stores.

Because we only sell online we have no shops or retail staff, no sales agents, no distributors to pay and no pricey exhibitions to attend. We pass these savings direct on to you, meaning you can buy great quality heirloom knives at a fraction of the high street price.

story:
Who We Are:
Asgard Brewing Company is a Craft Micro Brewery located in the heart of historic downtown Columbia, TN. It is our goal that, from this facility, we will produce and sell craft beers to patrons, distribute craft beers to other local vendors/restaurants and for off-property events, host special events & gatherings, conduct tours of the production facilities, and otherwise serve as a destination attraction in Columbia. Most of the above we managed to accomplish in the first year, thanks to our great community; however, we have few more plans in mind to make our dreams in Columbia come true.

Our vision for the the two breweries, located on both sides of East 5th Street in downtown Columbia, will be a spot on the Duck River (Recent biological surveys of the Duck River indicate that it is one of the most biodiverse rivers in North America, according to the Tennessee Chapter of The Nature Conservancy.  Free flowing for most of its 269 miles and brimming with species, the Duck River is one of the last rivers of its kind anywhere in the nation" (Biological Surveys, The Nature Conservancy).  that will offer a number of amenities. This includes a 1200 ft² taproom reminiscent of an ancient Viking long hall, a deck overseeing the Duck River, a 480 ft² bottle shop & growler fill station for events and guest taps, and roughly 9000 sq. ft. of production & grain storage/cooler space.

Our first brew house 104 building will be an experimental, seasonal, and small-scale batch 3.5 US barrel/three vessel system. This system will principally be used to serve Columbia and the Maury County market.  We will also be producing open fermentation and barrel aging sours.  

Our production area in the 105 building will house a partially automated 10 US barrel brewhouse and various fermentation and bright vessels; this will be separate from our small batch production facility across the street. This space will also serve to house our barrel-aging processes, which is courtesy of many of the fine whiskey distilleries in TN.  We are hoping to complete both of these in the following year. As indicated in our Mission Statement, it is the intent of Asgard Brewing Company to create “an environment that seeks to positively impact our patrons and community.” Whether through our economic contribution; special events; planned event space for weddings, meetings, etc.; or community involvement; we are convinced that our impact on Columbia will be beneficial, tangible, and sustainable. Furthermore, with our current and future productions we continue to aim towards using local raw materials as much as possible for not only hops & grain but additional ingredients like wild type yeast. We will naturally expand our product lines to mead and ciders.  We will continue to expand  production of ancillary products such as our soap line & expand the incorporation of our beer in local bakeries & pizza retail outlets. If you cannot donate at this time but still want to help, make sure to share our page and spread awareness, or just come on down for a pint or two and a have a good time.

Our Story:

In the summer of 2015, the dream of Asgard entered the conversation as founding members John and Stephen Porter had a glass of beer in the historic Michigan Brewery Frankenmuth, a destination the pair  had made a frequent haunt over the years. After contacting a friend in the brewing business, John with his knowledge of beer and branding coupled with Steve and his knowledge of business and planning set out to to make Asgard a reality. At the beginning it was a rocky road but fueled by John’s once middle school dream to own a bar themed around his heritage the two set off and met with Ryan Whitaker, after several brewing sessions, the three became friends and partners realizing that they created a dynamic team, each with a different but vital set of skills: with Steve as a long time business owner, Ryan as a brewer, and John as a graphic designer, of course one major thing also tied them all together and that was the love of beer. Public interest began to grow almost immediately and within months Asgard was accepting invitations to attend tasting and charity events and festivals. The future looks extremely bright for Asgard Brewing and the guys look forward to pursuing their passion of brewing great beer and seeking opportunities to positively impact their neighbors and visitors alike.

One aspect we're excited about & extremely proud of is our farm-to-barrel initiative. To this day, there is not a one defining aspect of Viking beer other than they used what was locally available. We have begun work with a local hop farmer, Chris Theiler of Southern Bines in Summertown, TN. We also source all our honey from Middle TN. In addition to honey, there will be experimental beers made with various local fruits of both modern & heirloom varieties. We want to maintain the Viking mentality of using what's available and naturally found in the area. 

 

Our Name:

Asgard comes from Norse Mythology, it is the home of the Aesir, or gods including Thor, Odin, Loki and many others. Asgard Brewing Company takes its name in an effort to pay homage to the history and culture of its founder’s Nordic ancestor but also understands that Vikings are just plain cool and would love to help celebrate the fun myths and legends associated with Viking culture as well as bring some of the traditions of exploration, local sourcing, beer, and arts to Tennessee.

Why Craft Beer?
According to the Brewer’s Association, past growth in craft brewing has been stunning, with the number of micro breweries increasing from 273 in 1995, to 345 in 2005, 2,397 in 2015 and  5020 in 2017. Further, craft beer and brewing remains a growth industry, with a 20.1% share of the overall beer market volume in 2017 . Surprisingly, however, Tennessee is extremely under represented in the market 62 to 76 breweries between 2015 -2017.   The south is called “the last frontier for beer” and as explorers we felt destined to push these boundaries and help Nashville and middle Tennessee make a name for itself  in the craft beer community. 

Why Columbia?

It’s no secret that Columbia is a market with tremendous growth potential, with much of this growth potential being realized in a myriad of recent projects situated along the primary corridors of the area. In addition to catering to its local residents, the City of Columbia businesses enjoy exposure to the  population of the surrounding counties and the extreme growth they are showing. Columbia is also right off interstate 65 and therefore enjoys a robust exposure to craft beer tourism and traveler related business as well as getting a lot of Nashville food truck traffic coming down for a visit. Finally, Columbia is a municipality that has recently embraced downtown redevelopment with hopes for a vibrant central business and arts district. The recent addition of new business and infrastructure will serve to revitalize the neighborhood to which Asgard Brewing belongs. Asgard's success depends on the  the vibrant culturally rich group of locals that frequent the establishment every day and have a strong of a dedication to their town, we couldn’t ask to be in a better more supportive place and cannot wait to continue our stay for many years to come.

 

Use of Proceeds

Funds from this campaign will be used towards the completion of one of our two brew houses. 104 east 5th street need infrastructure improvements fire sprinkler system,  upgrade in floor and  drains, added sewer capacity, electric and  gas to run efficiently and a down payment for the 5  bbl. three vessel, brew house,  fermentors and brite tanks.

story:
Hello, I'm Katie, the founder of Daily Edge Drinks. 

As an active family with young kids, it's always been my belief that Gut Health and Hydration are the two keys to help you perform and keep you going strong throughout your day. 

Unfortunately, most of the gut health drinks out there don't actually taste good. 

And, most of the hydrating sports drinks that do taste good have more than 40g of sugar per bottle! 

I've been working to solve this problem for over two years...

 

 

It's Simple...

Daily Edge is the best-tasting and only Hydration + Gut Support drink out there!  It's packed with an incredible amount of flavor and an unparalleled amount of functional health benefits! 

 

You should back Daily Edge now because...

  1. It tastes great - and is an enjoyable light and refreshing drink for you and your whole family
  2. Daily Edge naturally supports your gut health
  3. Daily Edge is the ultimate hydration drink

and....

  • Free Shipping - We are already shipping product!
  • Daily Edge is not selling a gadget or gizmo to turn a quick profit.  We are building a brand and we want you to join!
  • Daily Edge is a female owned and operated business

 

 

Tell me more about what's in Daily Edge...

 

 

#gutsupport #hydration: 

The Key to a Natural Performance Boost!

There aren't any drinks on the market that pack as much punch as DAILY EDGE:

  • Prebiotics
    • Gold standard of supporting digestive health
    • Fends off the bad bacteria in your gut / increases your good bacteria
    • Plant-based, natural digestive support to help balance your digestive system
    • 3g per bottle from Inulin Chicory Root
    • Boosts immune system
  • Hydration
    • Key electrolytes to hydrate your body and gut
    • Naturally supports energy levels, muscle function, performance
    • Potassium - Supports nervous system and muscles
    • Magnesium - Calms your gut and reduces inflammation
    • Sea Salt - aids digestion

 

 

 

 

Check out our Nutrition Panels and Ingredients...

 

 

 

Thank You for your Support...

Thank you for visiting our Indiegogo campaign and for learning more about our brand, Daily Edge. We hope that you will be a backer of our startup business! We truly look forward to getting your feedback.  Please post your comments and/or questions directly on this Indiegogo page. We'd appreciate it if you'd also forward and share our campaign with those you know!

We're excited for you to try Daily Edge. We know it will enhance your active life. Cheers to all of the families out there!

Thank you and stay safe.

Katie, Founder of Daily Edge

 

 

Check Out Our Partners...

We hope that you will be a backer of our startup business! We truly look forward to getting your feedback.  Please post your comments and/or questions directly on this Indiegogo page. We'd appreciate it if you'd also forward and share our campaign with those you know!We're excited for you to try Daily Edge. We know it will enhance your active life. Cheers to all of the families out there!Thank you and stay safe.Katie, Founder of Daily Edge  Check Out Our Partners...

story:
A Sequential Plan

A coffee company based on comic books? Yes, sort of.

“SEQUENTIAL” is a reference to the design style that is most frequently encountered in comics and graphic novels: sequential art. Frame to frame, each illustration conveys a sequence of the artist’s vision. In between each frame is a space referred to as the "ditch". The ditch is an empty space where the reader is free to fill in the details intuitively. It happens without thinking. It happens subconsciously. And it brings the reader along in the creative process.

What happens in the ditch is equally important to what happens in the frame, because it’s in those empty spaces that the reader PARTICIPATES in the experience and makes it their own.  

Stories are what bring us together. And so yes, in that way we are a coffee company based on comic books. Just like the ‘ditch’ in comics, coffee brings people of all backgrounds, ethnicities and cultures together in that third place that we all subconsciously seek between frames.

SEQUENTIAL COFFEE presents the world's finest coffees, responsibly sourced and thoughtfully roasted to let the coffee speak for itself. Our mission is to celebrate the coffee at each step in its journey from the farm to the cup, to elevate and highlight its individual qualities to provide you with a memorable specialty coffee experience.

We are Stephen Ezell and Jonathan Shepard. Together we created Sequential Coffee, based in Jacksonville Florida. 

A little over a year ago, armed with a solid business plan and small investment, we began formulating our coffee offerings to bring to market. We surrounded ourselves with industry leaders and advisors to help shape and test the viability of our brand. We took our first step by partnering with another roaster to form a small co-roast facility. In February of 2020, Sequential Coffee officially began offering our product online. 

We focused our efforts on two objectives; to expand our offerings, and to focus on opening our own brick and mortar cafe. Just as we were all set to open our first retail kiosk cafe on April 2, 2020, which we had planned 9 months earlier, the global Covid-19 pandemic changed those plans. We had to adjust.  So we did...

  • We scaled up and enhanced our online store, hired a digital marketing director and focused on getting great coffee to people at home.  
  • We launched Sequential Points to reward customer for buying our coffee online and for sharing that experience with others.
  • We launched a subscription program to allow frequent buyers to create their own experience and have coffee automatically delivered on their own schedule.

Thanks to wide reception by coffee lovers like you, our sales increased. We adjusted to the curves in our path and survived to arrive here today.

What We Need & Where it will go?

We are now days away from opening that Kiosk Cafe at St. Johns Town Center here in Jacksonville. With a safe opening and relative success, our long term goal is to replicate this small footprint model in key cities across the Southeast US.

  • We want to open the first zero-carbon emission roasting facility in Southeast.
    Today we’re already near full capacity with our co-roast facility and are working to expand our shared coffee laboratory by procuring a larger roasting machine to scale our responsible production capabilities.
  • Cold coffee based concoctions are at the center of our model. We have developed the recipes and aim to go into production both in served-to-order at the kiosk and canned grab-and-go offerings by end of year 2020.
  • We are bringing on a National Account manager to direct our wholesale program with large retail chains - so you can buy it in your home town market.
  • We are looking for key regional sales associates and ambassadors with a passion for specialty coffee, to expand our cafe and hospitality clients, so you can enjoy it at your favorite cafe or getaway, nationwide.

We are seeking $40,000 to scale our roasting operation to meet our expected growth in sales, to bring on a national account wholesale manager and underwrite expenses related to these scaling efforts.  Reaching this goal does not "cover" those costs, but allows us to seed revenue generating initiatives and the infrastructure to support those initiatives. These in turn, become profitable and, as costs of production are reduced, allows these initiatives to pay for themselves, ongoing.

What You Get

As always, the best way for us to grow is to sell our delicious coffee.  And we would not ask more of our contributors than we would ask of ourselves. This ask mirrors our personal investment to date.

So for each donation we are sending you the world's finest coffee, handcrafted, responsibly sourced and thoughtfully roasted for a memorable specialty coffee experience.  And once you taste it, you will want to share it with others.  Which is what the coffee experience is really all about.

The Impact

When you contribute you'll be helping a local small business:

  • Employ, train, and sustain people whose passion is making great coffee experiences come to life.
  • Grow to a point where we can bring our approach to the coffee experience even closer to your home
  • Support a company whose values are all about inclusiveness and sharing in the profitability in our industry with everyone in the process from the farm to the cup.
  • Educate a generation of others who can take this knowledge and build a career or even another small business for themselves.

Risks & Challenges

Risks and challenges still exist.  They always will in business. But as we've shared above, we have ALL been challenged in unexpected ways. And here at Sequential we've made those adjustments to the best of our ability to have come this far.  This resilience will serve us well as we navigate the path ahead.  Sequentially, of course

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Visit our online store and shop at your leisure. 
  • Join Sequential points and get rewarded immediately for joining and even more when you help spread the word.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to get our message to your own network!  That will help us reach our goal.

story:
Chime combines the traditional, hand-crafted process of making chai with our passion for product design and technology.

We've made chai preparation easy and quick and with the Chime smart app, you can customize,  store and share your very own chai recipes

 

Chime’s unique brewing chamber carefully extracts tea and spices and simmers them in milk to create the harmony of aromas only found in authentic, homemade chai. It's a delightful brew with ingredients and spices revered for its health benefits. 
 

 

 

Pour and Enjoy

Count on Chime for a fully customizable cup of chai, tailored to your liking in the comfort of your home or office.   A cup of chai is a cup of peace.  Find your bliss with Chime.  

 

 

 

Origins are everything, which is why we selectively source our tea from the best tea gardens of upper Assam and Darjeeling. Because only the best ingredients can make the best cup of chai.​

10 Chime Caps come in each box,  with two caps each of  Assam, Cardamom, Ginger, Masala and Cardamom-Ginger. 

 

We use single layer food-grade PET in our Chime Caps for recyclability and to ensure freshness.  The Chime process extracts ingredients, leaving no waste or residue in the container. No added steps need to be taken to recycle the cap.

 

 

 


Everything you need to make the perfect cup of Chai, anytime in 3 minutes!
 

 

 

 


Click on the image to earn 10% of pledges from your very own referral link!

 

 

 

 

 

 




 

 

 

 

 

 

 



 

 


Rainfactory is a multiple-award-winning crowdfunding marketing agency that operates as a marketing department for growing brands. Rainfactory's experienced team & data-driven, battle-tested approach ensure long-term market dominance for eCommerce start-ups.

story:
I have been a driven and passionate manager of resources for over the last decade to every size of business, now looking to create an opportunity for both myself and my community by starting a food truck focused on cultural exposure, sustainability, and an integrated local supply chain.

Both Food and Entrepreneurship have been important to me for as long as I can remember, I've experimented with sales of food since my college days. Always seeking to implement a customer focused delivery model, while understanding my market enough to develop a niche amongst competitors.

This truck will become a foundation for other business ventures, such as a food truck franchise and small farm/co-op of which the harvest produce will be used within the franchise.

These particular ventures will help drive a point entry of small minority business owners and address a persisting issue of food deserts in urban metropolitan areas left out of organic, green, and clean eating.

Your contribution will support the remaining renovations to the food truck as well as provide a working capital base during the first year of operations.

Donors will receive Catie Rosie’s swag in exchange for their funding at the following levels:

$5000                                                                                        Catering Event for up to 25 patrons

$1000                                                                                        Gift Certificate for $50 off Purchase

$500                                                                                           Catie Rosie’s T-Shirt & Hat

$100                                                                                           Catie Rosie’s T-Shirt

$50                                                                                             Catie Rosie’s Structured Snapback Hat

$25                                                                                             Catie Rosie’s Logo Button Pin and Sticker

$10                                                                                             Catie Rosie’s Button Pin

$5                                                                                                Catie Rosie’s Sticker

 

If you can’t donate, that’s cool too. Your support is always appreciated, monetary or not. Feel free to follow me on Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter @catierosies, as well as keep up to date on my journey via posts at http://www.catierosies.com/blog.

Much love,

Anita

story:
Hi, I'm Dwayne from Old Abe Brewing. 

Old Abe Brewing grew out of home brewing with a neighbor and for fun made a Gluten Free beer for my wife, who is Gluten intolerant.

Won a Blue Ribbon in the Wisconsin Home Brewers Competition.

I own a real estate marketing company.

Am a former Major League Baseball announcer.

story:
The 2050 Smoothie is the world's first instant smoothie made from upcycled produce. Imagine taking eveything you love about your daily fruit smoothie and making it more convenient, nutritious, and sustainable. That's The 2050 Smoothie!

 

Always running out of frozen fruit? The 2050 Smoothie has every ingredient you need in one convenient and reusable package!

 

Brown bananas and wilted spinach? The 2050 Smoothie stays fresh in your pantry for up to a year! No freezer necessary!

 

Running late for work? The 2050 Smoothie transforms into a delicious frozen beverage in under 60 seconds!

 

Trying to reduce your carbon footprint? The 2050 Smoothie is made from imperfect and surplus produce, and is shipped to your door 100% carbon neutrally!

 

Three signature flavors inspired by the Northwest!

 

The 2050 Smoothie is a 100% natural, instant smoothie powder available in 3 delicious, Northwest-inspired flavors: Rainier Berry, Seattle Summer, and Evergreen.

The only ingredients are real fruits and vegetables. Zero added sweeteners. Zero preservatives.

 

 

Our innovative drying technology locks in all flavor and nutrients while extending shelf-life from days to a year. Simply blend The 2050 Smoothie with ice and your favorite liquid base to transform it into a refreshing, earth-friendly treat!

 

Scientists predict that by 2050:

  •  90% of coral reefs will be gone
  •  50% more acreage will burn in wildfires
  •  20% of tropical rainforests will disappear
  • And 100% of Arctic ice will have melted

These predictions will only come true if we do nothing today.  The 2050 Company was formed around a single, focused mission - to ensure a brighter future by 2050. A future-focused company must remain both realistic and optimistic. That means facing facts, no matter how daunting, and exploring solutions, no matter how ambitious. It also means, focusing on the best solutions first...

 

 

Project Drawdown is a coalition of scientists, activists, and business people that keeps a live ranking of the best solutions to preventing global warming of 2 ºC by 2050. 

 

In terms of impact and feasibility, reducing food waste outranks plant-based diets (#3), solar power (#8), and electric cars (#24). Need we say more?

 

Scientists predict that global food production will have to increase between 25% and 75% by 2050 to meet the demands of a growing population. This sounds daunting, but there is hope. There is already enough food grown on farms to feed almost 10 billion people. Maybe the solution to this problem isn't simply producing more food, but making sure the food we produce today doesn't go to waste.

 

The 2050 Company was founded around a radical idea: selecting the Future as the key stakeholder in every decision we make. We make food for the future.

 

The future of food is more whole foods and less additives. It's longer shelf life with zero preservatives. And it's convenient and quick, to keep up with the busy lives of modern day change-makers. The 2050 Smoothie is food for the future of you.

 

The future of food is sustainable. It's unwanted produce upcycled into delicious smoothies. It's free of single-use packaging. And it's light enough to ship across the country with minimal carbon impact. The 2050 Smoothie is food for the future of Earth.

We believe that real food doesn't have ingredients, real food is ingredients. The future of food isn's packed with preservatives, sweeteners, or fillers. Our ingredient list tells you everything you need to know.

 

The only ingredients in The 2050 Smoothie are real fruits and vegetables. Nothing else. 

 

We achieve a 1-year shelf life with technology, not chemicals and preservatives. Our unique drying process removes all water from fruits and vegetables, and leaves all nutrients and flavor intact. It's just like fresh or frozen fruit, but it doesn't go bad and it takes up a tiny bit of space in your pantry instead of an entire shelf in your freezer!

Our founder, Austin, has made a smoothie every day for the past 5 years...and kind of hated it. The packed freezer. The plastic bags of fruit. The melted berries covering hands and staining clothes. There had to be a better way!

 

The 2050 Smoothie is not only healthy, but convenient. It's simultaneously all-inclusive and endlessly customizable:

 

Want a quick, refreshing smoothie? everything you need is in the bag! Just throw some ice, water, and 2050 Smoothie powder in the blender and you're off to the races?

 

Want a smoothie on the go? Just shake up The 2050 Smoothie with water in a BlenderBottle?

 

Want a meal replacement? Just add some protein powder or greek yogurt to the mix! 

 

If you're a fancy smoothie type of person, just remember this formula: The 2050 Smoothie + Ice = Frozen Fruit. Now you can sub The 2050 Smoothie into all your favorite recipes and save some time! 

 

Still wondering how The 2050 Smoothie tastes? Don't just take our word for it! On May 2nd, we launched a 20 hour and 50 minute virtual pop-up sale. In less than a day, we completely sold out - delivering almost 1,000 smoothies to customers and another 100 to healthcare workers!

 

Here's what some of our customers had to say after trying their first 2050 Smoothie:

 

Today, 40% percent of all food produced in the United States is never eaten. And when food is tossed out, so are all of the resources that went into making it. 

 

If food waste was a country, it would be the third highest emitter of greenhouse gases after the US and China (UN)

 

Fruits and vegetables are the most wasted food group, with nearly 50% of fresh produce going uneaten. 

 

We did not start by making a great smoothie, then add sustainability as an afterthought. We began with the problem, scrutinizing the three primary reasons food is wasted in America. Then we invented a product that addresses all three sources of waste through its mere existence. By the time you purchase The 2050 Smoothie, all the work has already been done to make a sustainable impact!

Surplus Produce: Reducing food waste is the #1 best way to prevent global warming of 2 ºC by 2050. And reducing the volume of surplus food at it's source is the #1 best way to reduce food waste (EPA). This make sense. Any lasting solution to food waste must start at the source. 

We have collaborated with fruit farmers, processors, and distributors to reimagine the produce supply chain. We purchase unwanted produce gown in excess during summer and store it for when it's scarce in the winter. Some say The 2050 Smoothie flattens the supply-demand curve. Other's say it's the smoothie equivalent of a squirrel.

 

Expired Produce:  The healthiest Americans are the most wasteful, precisely because of their high intake of perishable fruits and vegetables (USDA). It is just as important to tackle waste at the end of the supply chain as the beginning. That's why we created a product that is just as tasty and nutritious as a fresh fruit smoothie, but stays good for almost 100x longer. The 2050 Smoothie stays good in your panty for more than a year, which means you free up your freezer for more important things, like waffles and Otter Pops!

 

Imperfect Produce:  Americans throw away about 1/5 of our fruits and veggies just because they look funny, even if they are just as nutritious and tasty as their beautiful neighbors.

In the past few years, a handful of companies have worked to create a market for imperfect produce. However, given the choice, most of us will still choose a pretty piece of fruit over an ugly one.

The solution it to make two pieces of fruit that are identical on the inside look identical on the outside. By grinding all of our produce into a fine powder, we eliminate all cosmetic flaws. As powders, a beautiful strawberry and an ugly strawberry become truly identical!

No conversation about food waste is complete without mentioning the food industry's reliance on plastic. Our vision of 2050 is free of single-use plastics. All of our packaging is 100% reusable. Once you're done with your smoothies, you can keep reusing the dishwasher-safe bag over and over in place of single-use zip lock bags. As our company grows, we will continuously evolve our products and packaging to align with our ambitious vision of a waste-free 2050.

 

Bonus to the Bonus: In addition to using only reusable packaging, we are partnering with EcoCart to make all shipments 100% carbon neutral!

 

 

We're ready to go! Unlike many projects, The 2050 Smoothie is already set for production. This May, we mixed up and sold our first batch of smoothies to 100 beta customers through a  1-Day Virtual Flash Sale. Using their feedback, we have now begun production of our first 500 orders of Rainier Berry smoothies. Mass-manufactuirng typically takes a few months to set up, but our head start will allow our timeline to be rapidly accelerated in comparison to most campaigns.

We've come a long way since local banana rescue missions and home kitchen powder mixing sessions with Austin's Mom!

 

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

This is our first time launching a food manufacturing business and, as with all small businesses, there will always be associated risks and challenges. This is especially true as we to cope with a worldwide pandemic and the beginning of an economic recession. However, we believe that by obsessively planning for every possibility, we will be able to address almost every obstacle that comes our way. We have been working on The 2050 Smoothie for more than a year. This has given us time to perfect the flavor, nutrition, and processing. We are already approved by the WSDA for nationwide sale and have started small-scale manufacturing. In fact, we plan to manufacture our first batch of Rainier berry smoothies while the Kickstarter is running and ship them out almost immediately. The COVID-19 pandemic has continuously presented the world with new and unprecedented obstacles. As much as we plan ahead for foreseeable obstacles, there is always the possibility of something new coming up that will delay production, fulfillment, or shipping. However, fear of the unknown will not prevent us from getting The 2050 Smoothie into the world. We truly believe that now is the perfect time for nonperishable, nutritious, and resource-sensitive fruits and veggies delivered to your doorstep, and we are committed to doing everything in our power to make this happen! Now is the beginning of the future of food!

This sounds daunting, but there is hope. There is already enough food grown on farms to feed almost 10 billion people. Maybe the solution to this problem isn't simply producing more food, but making sure the food we produce today doesn't go to waste. The 2050 Company was founded around a radical idea: selecting the Future as the key stakeholder in every decision we make. We make food for the future. The future of food is more whole foods and less additives. It's longer shelf life with zero preservatives. And it's convenient and quick, to keep up with the busy lives of modern day change-makers. The 2050 Smoothie is food for the future of you. The future of food is sustainable. It's unwanted produce upcycled into delicious smoothies. It's free of single-use packaging. And it's light enough to ship across the country with minimal carbon impact. The 2050 Smoothie is food for the future of Earth.We believe that real food doesn't have ingredients, real food is ingredients. The future of food isn's packed with preservatives, sweeteners, or fillers. Our ingredient list tells you everything you need to know. The only ingredients in The 2050 Smoothie are real fruits and vegetables. Nothing else.  We achieve a 1-year shelf life with technology, not chemicals and preservatives. Our unique drying process removes all water from fruits and vegetables, and leaves all nutrients and flavor intact. It's just like fresh or frozen fruit, but it doesn't go bad and it takes up a tiny bit of space in your pantry instead of an entire shelf in your freezer!Our founder, Austin, has made a smoothie every day for the past 5 years...and kind of hated it. The packed freezer. The plastic bags of fruit. The melted berries covering hands and staining clothes. There had to be a better way! The 2050 Smoothie is not only healthy, but convenient. It's simultaneously all-inclusive and endlessly customizable: Want a quick, refreshing smoothie? everything you need is in the bag! Just throw some ice, water, and 2050 Smoothie powder in the blender and you're off to the races? Want a smoothie on the go? Just shake up The 2050 Smoothie with water in a BlenderBottle? Want a meal replacement? Just add some protein powder or greek yogurt to the mix!  If you're a fancy smoothie type of person, just remember this formula: The 2050 Smoothie + Ice = Frozen Fruit. Now you can sub The 2050 Smoothie into all your favorite recipes and save some time!  Still wondering how The 2050 Smoothie tastes? Don't just take our word for it! On May 2nd, we launched a 20 hour and 50 minute virtual pop-up sale. In less than a day, we completely sold out - delivering almost 1,000 smoothies to customers and another 100 to healthcare workers! Here's what some of our customers had to say after trying their first 2050 Smoothie: Today, 40% percent of all food produced in the United States is never eaten. And when food is tossed out, so are all of the resources that went into making it.  If food waste was a country, it would be the third highest emitter of greenhouse gases after the US and China (UN) Fruits and vegetables are the most wasted food group, with nearly 50% of fresh produce going uneaten.  We did not start by making a great smoothie, then add sustainability as an afterthought. We began with the problem, scrutinizing the three primary reasons food is wasted in America. Then we invented a product that addresses all three sources of waste through its mere existence. By the time you purchase The 2050 Smoothie, all the work has already been done to make a sustainable impact!Surplus Produce: Reducing food waste is the #1 best way to prevent global warming of 2 ºC by 2050. And reducing the volume of surplus food at it's source is the #1 best way to reduce food waste (EPA). This make sense. Any lasting solution to food waste must start at the source. We have collaborated with fruit farmers, processors, and distributors to reimagine the produce supply chain. We purchase unwanted produce gown in excess during summer and store it for when it's scarce in the winter. Some say The 2050 Smoothie flattens the supply-demand curve. Other's say it's the smoothie equivalent of a squirrel. Expired Produce:  The healthiest Americans are the most wasteful, precisely because of their high intake of perishable fruits and vegetables (USDA). It is just as important to tackle waste at the end of the supply chain as the beginning. That's why we created a product that is just as tasty and nutritious as a fresh fruit smoothie, but stays good for almost 100x longer. The 2050 Smoothie stays good in your panty for more than a year, which means you free up your freezer for more important things, like waffles and Otter Pops! Imperfect Produce:  Americans throw away about 1/5 of our fruits and veggies just because they look funny, even if they are just as nutritious and tasty as their beautiful neighbors.In the past few years, a handful of companies have worked to create a market for imperfect produce. However, given the choice, most of us will still choose a pretty piece of fruit over an ugly one.The solution it to make two pieces of fruit that are identical on the inside look identical on the outside. By grinding all of our produce into a fine powder, we eliminate all cosmetic flaws. As powders, a beautiful strawberry and an ugly strawberry become truly identical!No conversation about food waste is complete without mentioning the food industry's reliance on plastic. Our vision of 2050 is free of single-use plastics. All of our packaging is 100% reusable. Once you're done with your smoothies, you can keep reusing the dishwasher-safe bag over and over in place of single-use zip lock bags. As our company grows, we will continuously evolve our products and packaging to align with our ambitious vision of a waste-free 2050. Bonus to the Bonus: In addition to using only reusable packaging, we are partnering with EcoCart to make all shipments 100% carbon neutral!  We're ready to go! Unlike many projects, The 2050 Smoothie is already set for production. This May, we mixed up and sold our first batch of smoothies to 100 beta customers through a  1-Day Virtual Flash Sale. Using their feedback, we have now begun production of our first 500 orders of Rainier Berry smoothies. Mass-manufactuirng typically takes a few months to set up, but our head start will allow our timeline to be rapidly accelerated in comparison to most campaigns.We've come a long way since local banana rescue missions and home kitchen powder mixing sessions with Austin's Mom!    Risks and challengesThis is our first time launching a food manufacturing business and, as with all small businesses, there will always be associated risks and challenges. This is especially true as we to cope with a worldwide pandemic and the beginning of an economic recession. However, we believe that by obsessively planning for every possibility, we will be able to address almost every obstacle that comes our way. We have been working on The 2050 Smoothie for more than a year. This has given us time to perfect the flavor, nutrition, and processing. We are already approved by the WSDA for nationwide sale and have started small-scale manufacturing. In fact, we plan to manufacture our first batch of Rainier berry smoothies while the Kickstarter is running and ship them out almost immediately. The COVID-19 pandemic has continuously presented the world with new and unprecedented obstacles. As much as we plan ahead for foreseeable obstacles, there is always the possibility of something new coming up that will delay production, fulfillment, or shipping. However, fear of the unknown will not prevent us from getting The 2050 Smoothie into the world. We truly believe that now is the perfect time for nonperishable, nutritious, and resource-sensitive fruits and veggies delivered to your doorstep, and we are committed to doing everything in our power to make this happen! Now is the beginning of the future of food!

story:
People Like Us makes great beer for beer lovers around the world. At the same time, we make a difference for a vulnerable group of people. We do so thanks to our unique team of specialists in brewing and specialists in the field of education for people with autism.

For the past 18 years, we have offered education and mentoring for people with autism. Through our work the need has become apparent to create jobs designed specifically to unfold the unique potential that each person holds.

Mikkel Bjergsø, founder and owner of the top-rated brewery Mikkeller, immediately supported our idea to establish a brewery by offering his expertise and network, and by selling our beer in Mikkeller’s many bars around the world.

People Like Us will show the world that tolerant and inclusive workplaces mean business!

What we need

We are already brewing our first batches of beer thanks to Mikkeller and Thisted Brewery at their locations involving 8 people with autism in the process.

The next step is to build our own production site where we can brew even more of our great beer and employ 25-30 people with autism. We need another 150.000 $ (1M DKK) to rebuild and prepare our building for beer production. 

Please contribute to our brewery and join us in making something very special happen!

What you get

As a reward for your support, we offer a mix of beers, merchandise, and experiences. If you just want to donate with nothing in return, this is of course also possible.

All backers are part of our founding story and will get their name up on our "Founders' Wall".

The below perk presentations are there to help you choose how you would like to help. Once you have decided on the perk please pick them in the column on the right.

What will the funds be used for?

The money we aim to raise from this campaign is needed to prepare our building for beer production and to pay for the installation of the leased brewing equipment. The total construction costs are 185.000 $ of which we still need 150.000 $.

We plan to lease the brewing equipment, as it would cost around 330.000 $ to buy. In the dream scenario where we exceed our target with this campaign, we will certainly prefer to buy our own equipment.

What is the problem we want to solve?

Too many autists are unemployed because ordinary workplaces are poorly equipped to make use of autistic potential.

Despite their unique potential, people experience defeat after defeat and often loose self-confidence not to mention motivation.

It’s a waste of talent, of energy, of resources!

How we will make a difference

Our approach to working with autists is to focus on the particular interests and talents of each person and we work specifically to develop these resources and apply them to meaningful job functions.

People with autism can leave the pacifying care system and instead contribute their skills to a workplace where they are needed and appreciated.

Inspired by our successful method, we are now making our own tailored workplace.

Why a brewery?

A production site such as a brewery entails a large variety of functions. A brewery is not only about brewing. It is also about product development, keeping stock, packing beers, cleaning, label design, marketing, administration and much more. 

This makes it an ideal environment for us to create jobs tailored to each of our employees so that they can contribute with their unique set of qualities and be a part of creating something great and valuable.

Our workplace allows for the particular skills of the employee to play out as we remove insecurities and make room for individual social and practical needs. 

Our production site will be located in a former barn on the farm "Æblehøjgård" in Skippinge, a beautiful village in Northern Sealand, Denmark.

We will start out with a 1000 liter brewing tank and expect to expand production to 2000 liters already in 2020. 

Our beer

People Like Us is premium craft beer, based on traditional as well as more experimental recipes.

Our recipes are developed jointly by our own diploma craft brewer Rune Lindgreen and Mikkel Bjergsø. In addition, Mikkel will develop recipes especially for People Like Us and secure our premium taste and quality.

Let us introduce our four first beers, which are in production and will be on tap and bottles by June:

Stereotypical Lager:  4,6% ABV. This American lager is crisp and malty with American hops adding a certain floral dimension, and it's perfect to drink out of the bottle on a hot summer day.

Pale Alienation: 4,6% ABV. A very refreshing pale ale with flowery, citrusy notes. Easily drinkable with a gentle bite.

Savant Stout: 4,9% ABV. Light and creamy oat meal stout with notes of chocolate and coffee. Light and enjoyable yet with character.

Hell's Saison: 5% ABV. This saison is brewed with rye and jaggery. It is golden brown with floral and spicy notes and has a light sweetness to it.

Beer lovers are praising our first beers and we already have orders from all corners of Denmark. People Like Us beer will soon be sold in selected bars and restaurants, and on music festivals and other events over the coming summer.

Great news is that our beer will also be available outside Denmark. Mikkeller will make sure that there is People Like Us on tap in his bars around the world and our beers will also be sold through Mikkeller's webshop, which ships world-wide.

International collaborations

Within the brewing industry, we experience tremendous interest and support. As a result we have several collaborations lined up already this spring with All in Brewing (Sweden), Goose Island (the US) and of course an official collab with Mikkeller (Denmark).

Strong team behind People Like Us

 

Timeline

Risks and challenges

As with all business start-ups we face certain risks and challenges  As a company we are new to the brewing industry, but to compensate we have teamed up with great expertise. The day-to-day support and advise we receive from Mikkeller, Gitte Gross and other established breweries is invaluable. 

We are aware that working with a particularly vulnerable group of people represents a number of challenges. But we are confident that our many years' experience in working with this group of people gives us a good foundation for dealing with the risks and challenges that our mission entails.

    Question and answers 

    Q: Why are you asking for your funds in the US dollar currency?

    The Indiegogo platform allows contributors to use credit cards only if the campaigner chooses the dollar as currency. Since many people in Denmark, our homeland, don't use PayPal we wanted to make sure our backers can use their preferred means of payment.   

    Q: Will I still get my reward beer even if you do not raise enough money to start your own production?

    We don't consider this a relevant scenario, but yes, of course you will receive your reward beer regardless. We are already cooperating with established breweries to produce our beer so we are able to guarantee the supply.

    Q: Aren't the rewards a bit expensive?

    We ask you to consider your contribution as exactly that; a contribution, and not actually as buying products from us. We're very honored and grateful that people support our project and are willing to contribute a little extra to help us get started with our brewery.

    Q: Where can I pick up my reward beer

    When you order the beer to pick up, you can chose between following locations:

    Other ways to help

    Some people just can't contribute with money, but that doesn't mean they can't help out. You would help us a lot by spreading the word about People Like Us;

    1. Please share this on social media! Use the Indiegogo share tools at the top of the campaign page, on the right
    1. Please tell your friends and family about People Like Us and our campaign

    Thank you!

    We at People Like Us want to say thank you. We greatly appreciate your support. We’re extremely excited to start preparing for our own production, so a million thanks to all of you.

story:
Could you imagine that preparing a simple slice of bread, or just cutting a cheese can provide an exceptional experience?

We have turned imagination into reality.

R&D has delivered the solution:

The Spread-IT Heated  Knife!


Inspiration came one morning when the food prepared wasn’t really appetizing.

I felt I had to make a change, and shared my idea with my engineer friend. He designed the technical solution to transform my dream into practical reality. 

Finally, Spread-IT was born.


Technical description

The blade is equipped with a unique heater, capable of supplying the necessary heat evenly throughout the surface of the blade.

Constant temperature is guaranteed by the thermal sensor built into the blade, for maximum protection against overheating.

Added safety is provided by the touch sensor, making a switch unnecessary, as it is turned on by the human touch.



Specifications

  1. Stainless alloy blade with heated element
  2. Temperature indicator light
  3. Circuit board, with capacitive touch sensor
  4. 1020mah 3.7v lithium ion battery
  5. Brushed stainless steel casing
  6. Micro USB B connector, with charge indicator light


Charging is done through a micro-USB port with a waterproof plug – Spread-IT is fully waterproof and safe.



What's in the package?

  • Spread-IT - the heated knife
  • Instruction manual

  • 110-220V 0,8-1A Micro USB B charger


About our team

Three of us started this project, which allowed our product to be the result of solely in-house planning, development, and design work.

Following 20 months of research and development the technology has been perfected and by now the flawlessly functioning prototype is ready.

At last, we can present you this advanced, unique, and stylish kitchen utensil.

Thank you for helping us in our project! Share, and Spread the love.

story:
Our Story

 

 

I discovered stevia almost 6 years ago.  It's very sweet and I enjoy having it in my coffee and knowing that it's good for me.  It is a very strong antioxidant, a mild steroid, has no digestive side effects.  And, it is almost calorie free.  In my effort to reduce sugar and calories in my diet I started using stevia as a replacement for sugar in many recipes.  Friends have asked me to share these recipes and there has been a very encouraging response, and many requests for recipes.  I feel that my health has been positively affected by stevia.  The collection of recipes that I have developed using stevia is extensive.  I've heard friends who are aware of stevia comment that they would like to know how to use it in something "other than coffee".  I also have friends looking for healthy alternatives to sugar and artificial sweeteners like Splenda, Equal, saccharine, aspartame, etc.; which are all known carcinogens. 

 

I am raising money to publish my recipes and develop an informational website on how to use stevia, it's benefits, and how healthy lifestyle choices can help all of us promote a healthier society and  fight diabetes.  We all have a cravings for sweet taste and can avoid satisfying this craving for sugar or fat-filled foods. Even "natural" sugar substitutes, such as honey, maple syrup or molasses, can be unhealthy if over-consumed since they can markedly elevate blood sugar levels. Hence, stevia can be advantageous to practically everyone whose diet contains sweets.  Stevia can be helpful to anyone, and there are certain groups who are more likely to benefit from its remarkable sweetening potential. These include diabetics, those interested in decreasing caloric intake, and children. 

 

I am raising money to publish my recipes and develop an informational website on how to use stevia.  We will explain its benefits, how it is produced, the best form to buy, etc.  As well as, how healthy lifestyle choices can help all of us promote a healthier society, fight diabetes, and fight obesity.  We all have a craving for sweet taste and can avoid satisfying this craving with sugar or fat-filled foods. Even "natural" sugar substitutes, such as honey, maple syrup or molasses, can be unhealthy if over-consumed since they can markedly elevate blood sugar levels.  Stevia can be advantageous to practically everyone.  However, there are certain groups who are more likely to benefit from its remarkable sweetening potential. These include diabetics, those interested in decreasing caloric intake, people with high blood pressure, and children. 

I hope that you will help me generate and distribute a cookbook of easy recipes to promote the benefit of knowing how to use this wonderful sweet sugar substitute.


 

 

The Impact

Change the thought process of sugar addicts to use stevia as a healthy alternative.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We want to raise 10,000 to build or campaign, our e-book, our website, and our brand.

$5  Honorable mention in the book as a contributor.

$10  Copy of Easy Stevia Recipes E-book and honorable mention of your contribution.

$ 25  3 month membership to EasySteviaRecipes.com  which includes videos, new recipes, interactive content and a copy of Easy Stevia Recipes E-book with an honorable mention of your contribution.  A $69.80 value.

$250  Live interactive webinar consultation with the author bi-weekly for 6 months.  3 month membership to EasySteviaRecipes.com  which includes videos, new recipes, interactive content and a copy of Easy Stevia Recipes E-book with an honorable mention of your contribution.  A $99.80 value.

$1000  Premium lifetime membership to EasySteviaRecipes.com including live interactive webinar consultation with the author bi-weekly.   an honorable mention of your contribution.

Other Ways You Can Help

Like us and share our facebook link with your friends.  www.facebook.com/steviarecipes

$250  Live interactive webinar consultation with the author bi-weekly for 6 months.  3 month membership to EasySteviaRecipes.com  which includes videos, new recipes, interactive content and a copy of Easy Stevia Recipes E-book with an honorable mention of your contribution.  A $99.80 value.
$1000  Premium lifetime membership to EasySteviaRecipes.com including live interactive webinar consultation with the author bi-weekly.   an honorable mention of your contribution.

Other Ways You Can Help
Like us and share our facebook link with your friends.  www.facebook.com/steviarecipes

story:
The Secret Drinks Club is here to bring you a completely new, exciting and interactive drinks experience! For our first edition of The Secret Drinks Club we've worked with an exciting and unique spiced rum brand to bring you on a journey of discovery. 

We (Matt and Max) founded The Secret Drinks Club out of the frustration that there are hundreds (if not thousands) of exciting and interesting drinks brands out there which consumers like us have no knowledge of. 

These brands have spirits and drinks which taste incredible and we never know about them because they don’t sell through supermarkets and we are unlikely to find them in the mass of online sellers. The big secret? There is way more to the drinks industry than meets the eye....

That’s where we come in.

The Secret Drinks Club is not a boujie, hipster, old boys club from the 1950s! And if we're honest we don’t really know what ‘craft’ and ‘artisan’ drinks are.. other than more expensive! We're a small company that is passionate about introducing people to exciting new, small or niche spirits. More importantly, we want to connect you directly to the brands so you experience it the way they intended!

So what do I get in The Rum Edition?

 

This unique gift box will include....

- Full 70cl bottle of spirit from a unique and exciting spiced rum brand which we think you'll love!

- An exclusive and interactive guided experience with Pete (our Rum expert!) who'll introduce you to the brand, the drink, its heritage and most importantly, how to enjoy it!

- Tasting masterclass and three new ways to enjoy the spirit

- Professional standard Boston cocktail shaker set 

- A range of mixers to create some wonderful drinks

- A few surprises (well, we are The Secret Drinks Club after all)

- All presented in a gift box suitable for everyone from your mum to your boss!

There's so much out there for you and we want to connect you to it. Across all the categories in the spirits business there will be a box for you. If you're not sure about spiced rum head over to secretdrinksclub.com and let us know what you would like to see in the next edition! 

And let's be honest, this makes the perfect gift for the person who has everything!

We can’t wait to share more with you!

Matt and Max! xxx

story:
Summary

Even though I started this bakery at the ripe old age of 17 in 2011, we did not become an allergen friendly bakery until 2015. What made us change? In 2014 while walking out of a freezer, I fell, fracturing my neck, blacking out and having a seizure. For almost a month during recovery I broke out in hives every day. I was told at the time that it was a gluten and dairy allergy. The entire time that I gave up those allergens, I didn’t feel normal. I couldn’t go out, I was stressed and terrified to eat out anywhere. After a month I found out that my allergies are to opiates, however I knew that I needed to help others who can’t ever just go out to eat and feel like a normal person.

To date we have served over 19,000 people. Among those people about 75% have food allergies, usually more than one, and would find it extremely difficult to eat out. If they did find a place to go either they had one or two options or had to worry about cross contamination in the kitchen or the establishment not knowing how to handle allergies/ or what vegan means. With us, you don’t have to worry and you will spend most of your time trying to figure out what to get because everything is safe.

 

What We Need & Why We are Crowd Funding

We need to raise an additional $10,000 on top of what we have already saved up in order to build out our storefront.

Unfortunately taking out a loan for the business is not an option due to paying for college with credit cards. Which was the only way for me to be able to go to college. Thankfully all debt has been paid off but only time will help my score.

We have been approached by a handful of investors. Trying to find someone that is aligned with the business’ values and our mission is difficult, and after working so hard for the last eight years, I really don’t want to sell part of my business.

The Impact

By expanding to Worcester, we will be able to reach even more customers that are unable to commute to Boston, but also our regulars now that make that trek from CT, NY, and western MA that can only visit once a week or month because of how far Boston is.

We this larger location, we will also be able to offer more vegan and allergen friendly cooking classes, and gatherings at our shop as well as being able to keep up with demand with the larger kitchen.

Even if you can’t donate, just my sharing our campaign with your network will help us so much!!! With your support we can make so many kids feel normal again!!!!
