story:
Why a Cookbook?

I’ve been cooking food for friends and family since I was about ten years old. The act of cooking for others is my language of love, and has been a source of connection with people all around the world. My favourite way to eat involves big feasts with lots of people around the table. During the past few years, my cooking has has centred on cooking for my share house. We share much of our food communally, to reduce waste and energy consumption, to save money, and for the love of sharing meals together.

Shared Table is a celebration of sharing food, but also of shared living and dear friendships. The book is photographed in friends' share houses across Meanjin (Brisbane). I want this book to be an ode to shared living and eating, for the images to evoke feelings of warmth and connection. I want them to capture the joy that is sitting around a table with your family or your mates, over a lovely home-cooked meal, drinking and chatting.

The recipes are all vegetarian, with lots of vegan options, and an emphasis on low waste and sustainability. I choose not to cook meat, because of its impact on our environment, and because it is the single most effective way that an individual can reduce their carbon footprint. Even if you're a meat eater, I think that you will love these recipes, and that they'll provide a source of encouragement to eat more meat free meals.

My food is designed to be budget-friendly, leftovers-friendly, flexible and above all, delicious. Ultimately, Shared Table is a food-sharing bible- the thing to consult when you’re cooking for a crowd, or are asked to bring a dish to share. The recipes can, of course, be used individually, but there are no big plates and tiny portions of perfectly arranged food here. It is serve-yourself fare; a celebration of sharing good food with those you love.

I am also conscious of what it means to be able to experience cooking in this way; there is immense privilege inherent in having the time and resources to cook for fun and pleasure. I want to be clear that I'm embarking on this project not to make profit, but to materialise some of my thoughts on sharing food, and really just to put some more yum and nice things into the world, of which I think we can never have too many.

 

Who's Involved?

Making this book a reality will involve the help of so many dear people, too many to list here. Already I have had a number of friends and family reach out, offering their skills, time, support and most importantly, taste-testing services. These are a few of my great mates playing a major part in the creative process. Here’s a little bit about each of them, their professional bios, and what sharing food means to them.


Savannah van der Niet - Photographer and Lead Designer

“Some of my favourite moments are tied to food. There was a house I used to live in where we would eat together most nights. I have the best memories of us all helping make dinners together, of a text in the afternoons asking if I’d be home for dinner, of half-full bottles of wine the next morning. Food is secondary to its company for me, but my favourite foods are probably a fresh loaf of homemade bread, or anything we can eat with our hands, like curry or tacos.”

Sav is a photographer and graphic designer in Brisbane. In her personal work she shoots predominantly on 35mm film, with a tendency toward soft tones and simplicity. Her client list is a versatile mix of genres, including photographing food for Delicious Magazine, Next Hotels, Broadsheet and the Venzin Group.

See More: www.savvycreative.com.au

Issy FitzSimons Reilly - Stylist (and lifelong taste tester)

"From as far back as I can remember my parents have hosted their friends over every Sunday for a pot luck dinner. These people were like family and their children (including Clare) - my siblings. It was a really beautiful ritual growing up and foundational to my love of food and sharing big meals with friends and family.

Clare and I did joke that a chapter should be dedicated to me due to the sheer amount of meals she has cooked me over the years through childhood and beyond in the numerous share house we've lived in. It would be hard to pick a favourite food, I pretty much love them all indiscriminately, although have a major soft spot for a good pasta or focaccia. It's really exciting to be part of styling this project, because I feel very passionately about Clare's ethos surrounding food and I, like many are very keen to have a hard copy of all her delicious recipes for life."

Issy is an interior designer, maker of objects and furniture from wood at the Foundry studio, Red Hill. Her practice focuses on sustainability and reuse.

See More on Instagram: @IssyFitzsimons

 

Monika Correa - Styling and Design

“I strongly believe that being a part of a community shapes your identity and wellbeing. I have fortunately been a part of many share houses since I was 18 and have experienced living with so many different people here in Australia and other countries carrying various cultures.
Sitting together, talking passionately, debating politics, sharing stories, loving one another, all while eating incredible food and sipping on wine are the absolute best times of my life."

Mon is currently studying her Bachelor in Interior Architecture; her second degree following after a Fine Arts degree, majoring in Visual Arts. She is an experienced artist, taking part in group and solo exhibitions over many years. In her current studies she has a strong interest in radical socialist architecture and design.

 

Some More Details:

Work to make this book a reality is already well underway! I am keeping very busy creating, testing, writing and editing recipes, consulting with printers, and we have already had our first photoshoots. It is difficult to give you an exact time frame for the book's release, but I will do everything in my power to have it to you before December 2018. 

I have pitched this crowd funder at a $10,000 goal, however, in reality, this project will cost much more than that. So please, if you plan to buy this book anyway, consider doing so here. I have no intention of personally profiting from this project, but would love for everyone's time to be paid for properly, and to be able to do as beautiful a job on it as I can. 

If you can't afford to purchase the book but want to support its creation, consider telling your friends and family, and share this page. 

Why Crowdfunding?

This is a cookbook born of the share house lifestyle, which often involves making a few dollars stretch a lot further than they should, and everyone pitching in to get by. By pre-purchasing my book, you are helping me to do it as I want to, without the pressure of having to find a publisher, and compromise my ideas. I can do it with just the help of my friends and community, and can afford to pay everyone for their time. 

Delivery:

If you live in Meanjin (Brisbane), I will personally deliver your copy (or copies) to you. Please don't select the delivery option, you don't need to pay for delivery. 

If you live elsewhere within Australia, please choose your perk with the shipping option. Once the book is finished, I will ship it to you, or arrange for it to be delivered to you.

If you live outside of Meanjin, but you'd like to choose a non-shipping option, because you think you can get the book off me another way, shoot me a message, we can work out a way to make it happen. 

If you live overseas, please note that shipping a book internationally in horrendously expensive. I have included an option to buy the E-Book. If you are desperate for a hard copy, and would like to arrange shipping or personal delivery overseas, and you know me personally, please shoot me a message and we can discuss how we can make it happen. 

Finally....

Finally, a simple thank you for stopping by. If you are here to purchase my book, please know how much it means to me to be able to share my immense love for this simple hobby with the world. It is a project well over 10 years in the making (and baking!) and I am so excited to make it a reality. 

 

I live, work and cook on stolen land. This land belongs to the Jagera and Turrbal peoples, whose sovereignty has never been ceded. I would like to pay my deepest respects to, and recognise the roles of Elders past, present and emerging.

story:
You can always opt for a simple teabag in a mug of hot water and get on with your day. The problem is, tea bags mostly consist of dust and fanning, most of its aroma and essential oils are lost during the production. Their finer composition also means they'd release more tannins, resulting in a bitter and astringent taste.

 

Sometimes, slowing down a bit to appreciate the little steps of brewing is actually quite a rewarding process. And that's exactly what we're trying to focus on with the Levitate Tea Infuser. 

Here's what we did to perfect this tea-drinking ritual.

 

 

Easy Quick Access

The twist open design makes it much easier to fill in the leaves compared to conventional ball steeper. It has enough space to allow full interaction of the water and leaves.

 

Perpendicular Levitation

The top portion of the infuser is an enclosed air chamber. It allows the infuser to float perpendicular above the water, so you don’t have to worry about the infuser falling out of the pot when pouring.

 

Resting Glass Stand

To prevent over-steeping, we made a complementary resting glass stand. When you finish steeping, simply place the infuser on top of the stand to allow it cool.

 

Wide Compatibility

The compact hand-blown glass infuser is just 5.4cm in diameter, allowing it to fit perfectly into multiple sizes of mugs and pots.

 

Antimicrobial Tin Plate

The stainless steel mesh is tightly woven into a patterned tin plate. What the tin plate does is exterminating the bacterias that are in contact with the metal. This is called the oligodynamic effect.

 

Our lab test results have shown that tin has a biocidal effect against E.coli, Staphylococcus aureus, Pseudomonas aeruginosa, and fecal streptococci. It has also shown the ability to remove chlorine content from the water.

As shown in the chart below, tin was able to remove 80% of the chlorine and eliminating 99% of E.coli germs in a span of 3 hours.

 

 

Taking advantage of the antimicrobial properties of tin, we've also developed the crown and clover water cleaner. Requires absolutely no maintenance, simply drop them in the water and it'll do its trick.

 

Decanter Ball & Stick 

Our spiral decanter ball and stick allows the wine to swirl down the spiral and spread evenly when they enter the decanter. Leave your bulky decanter vase back in the drawer. With our decanter ball & stick, every drop of your wine & liquor is properly exposed to oxygen, allowing you to easily enjoy a glass of fine wine without any hassle.

 

Made By Human

Our tin-crafting skills were learned from one of the best in the industry, dubbed the "National Treasure" Master Chen Wan Neng of Lukang. We incorporated innovative casting and coloring methods with traditional design patterns. Together, we created something that is poetic, highly functional, and culturally significant. 

The molten tin is first being poured in the mold to form its beautiful pattern. We then hand polish every corner of the plate to make sure it's smooth and seamless. The glass body of the infuser is hand-blown in order to achieve its sophisticated shape.

 

 

Referral Program

We decide to add a little bit of fun to our campaign, and we figure, a referral contest could really spice things up. If you’d like to enter the program, here are a few simple rules to follow.

1. Make sure you’re logged in your Indiegogo account.

2. Share your unique campaign referral link. (Click the sharing button to generate the link)

3. If any of your friends placed an order through the link, you’ll receive a discount or reimbursement (if you’ve already backed our project.)

Discount Percentage:

  • I Referral: 10% off of your order
  • 2-4 Referrals: 15% off of your order
  • 5+ Referrals: 20% off of your order

 

If you happened to own a Kickbooster account, we’ve also got a custom link here with 10% kickback. You’ll be able to earn commission through orders made through your link.

https://tea-infuser-wine-decanter.kickbooster.me/boost

That's all you need to know about the referral program, now let the game begin!

 

 

About WOO Collective

“Passing the torch” is how we’d describe the core value of our brand. In the past years, we’re consistently delivering outstanding designs incorporating modern aesthetics and traditional tin craft, extending the life of the dying form of art by recreating them into modern-day items.  Since 2015, we have been studying the natural property of tin and have developed new forging and coloring methods, plumping young blood into this traditional craft. Our work has received numerous internationally renowned awards from the likes of the Red Dot Design and Golden Pin. 

PRESSKIT

YOUTUBE

With our decanter ball & stick, every drop of your wine & liquor is properly exposed to oxygen, allowing you to easily enjoy a glass of fine wine without any hassle. Made By HumanOur tin-crafting skills were learned from one of the best in the industry, dubbed the "National Treasure" Master Chen Wan Neng of Lukang. We incorporated innovative casting and coloring methods with traditional design patterns. Together, we created something that is poetic, highly functional, and culturally significant. The molten tin is first being poured in the mold to form its beautiful pattern. We then hand polish every corner of the plate to make sure it's smooth and seamless. The glass body of the infuser is hand-blown in order to achieve its sophisticated shape.  Referral ProgramWe decide to add a little bit of fun to our campaign, and we figure, a referral contest could really spice things up. If you’d like to enter the program, here are a few simple rules to follow.1. Make sure you’re logged in your Indiegogo account.2. Share your unique campaign referral link. (Click the sharing button to generate the link)3. If any of your friends placed an order through the link, you’ll receive a discount or reimbursement (if you’ve already backed our project.)Discount Percentage:
I Referral: 10% off of your order
2-4 Referrals: 15% off of your order
5+ Referrals: 20% off of your order
 If you happened to own a Kickbooster account, we’ve also got a custom link here with 10% kickback. You’ll be able to earn commission through orders made through your link.https://tea-infuser-wine-decanter.kickbooster.me/boostThat's all you need to know about the referral program, now let the game begin!  About WOO Collective“Passing the torch” is how we’d describe the core value of our brand. In the past years, we’re consistently delivering outstanding designs incorporating modern aesthetics and traditional tin craft, extending the life of the dying form of art by recreating them into modern-day items.  Since 2015, we have been studying the natural property of tin and have developed new forging and coloring methods, plumping young blood into this traditional craft. Our work has received numerous internationally renowned awards from the likes of the Red Dot Design and Golden Pin. PRESSKITYOUTUBE

story:
Short Summary

We are one of the first chocolatiers in the country to obtain a wine license; constantly becoming educated in wine trends; and developing one-of-a-kind food, chocolate and wine pairings and gifts. Sher Bliss focuses on the "wine & chocolate experience" by developing innovative products and personalized quality customer service for their guests. 

Bliss in a Bottle is a chocolate-covered bottle of wine. The bottle is in a food grade sleeve, the chocolate is hand painted on, the message tag has instructions for neatly separating the chocolate from the wine, and you can enjoy both separately or simultaneously!  Bliss in a Bottle mall kiosks are opening to give the consumer an exciting chocolate-wrapped gift. If it is wine, we create the perfect marriage of these two delicacies. The chocolate cover can be deliciously paired to what is in the bottle and can be sampled at the kiosks’ tasting bar. We create the perfect taste profile through an avid devotion and expertise in sourcing wines that pair with chocolates and wines developed exclusively by winemakers from around the world for the Bliss in a Bottle brand. The chocolate we use is Premium Belgian milk and dark and white with a high cocoa butter content. Inclusions and infusions of other confectionary items are also of the highest quality.

Setting us apart from our competitors is the following:

• Tasting permit for the kiosk in malls and airports in the state of Ohio

• Idea: dipping everything for widest appeal possible (disguise a gift in
chocolate!). Not relying solely on the wine customer – every gift can be a BIB
experience. Empty bottles of varying sizes can house any gift. Customers can
bring us their purchases from within the mall; white chocolate can be quickly
colored and applied to a custom glass in varying sizes and decorated for
gift-giving. Since very little gift wrap is available in stores, this makes for an
exciting and consumable gift wrap and a big surprise for the recipient.

• Patents: apply for patents for two processes I have developed. One involves innovations in speed and the other involves innovative ways to comply with liquor laws. This makes Bliss in a Bottle saleable/accessable to other wine or chocolate shops.

• Kosher Wines: there were upwards of $28,000,000.00 in Kosher wine sales in 2010, and it’s growing at approx 15% per year. There are 12,100,000 Kosher consumers in the U.S. Sher Bliss is under the supervision of Buckey Kosher, enablish us to deliver Pareve Bliss in a Bottle for Kosher consumers across the country. 

What We Need & What You Get

Of the total $100,000 that needs to be raised, $32,500 is shared between rental and buildout of the kiosk, equiptment is $6000, administrative expenses $7,500, advertising $5,000, working capital is $3,800, and one-time fees including patents and trademarks totals to $41,000. 

A pledge of $10+: "Thank you from the bottom of our heart!" You will receive a white chocolate heart, beautifully hand-stenciled.

A pledge of $25+: "Bliss in a Bottle, Vitamin Water!"  For the athletic chocolate lover, a hand-dipped vitamin water for your own Bliss in a Bottle experience. 

A Pledge of $40+: "Bliss in a Bottle, the Entire Real Deal!" A full-sized bottle of delightful sparkling non-alcoholic fruit juices made by a Michigan winery, dipped in flavors that enhance what is in the bottle.

 

A pledge of $75+: "Welcome Autumn with Sher Bliss" A trio of signature chocolate and caramel-covered apples. We start with giant Fuji apples, coat them in caramel and cover them with milk, dark and white chocolate and the most interesting toppings!

A pledge of $150+: "A Dipped Case" Buy a case of wine, we will dip them in our premium white chocolate, paired with a crush that compliments what is in the bottle (crushes can be savory, spicy, citrusy, or contain nuts).  This order is compliant with state liquor laws, you will receive $180 value for your $150 contribution.

Pledges of all values, however, are greatly appreciated!

The Impact

Everyone will be experiencing Bliss in a Bottle; a unique treat for all of the senses!

Other Ways You Can Help

Become friends with us on Facebook. Order us by calling 614-428-WINE (9463).

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ's)

1. When will I receive my Perk?

Great Question! When the weather here, in Columbus, Ohio and where we are shipping it is 70 degrees or lower. We will ship UPS Ground on us. If you can't wait, we can quote on air shipping and apply the difference to your credit card!

2. Can I customize my perk?

Part of our expansion includes an improved website, but feel free to call us for very personalized customer service!

3. Can I get a job at Sher Bliss?

Another great question! As you know, our business peaks surrounding fourth quarter holidays and Valentine's Day. If you have skills or interest in chocolate-making, gift packing, are a wine enthusiast, or IT savvy, send us your credentials! 

4. Can I get a Perk outside of the US?

Sorry, no we ship only on the Continental US, via UPS Ground, but if you have a friend in the US, Sher Bliss products make the perfect gift!

story:
Who is RPG?

Real People Giving is a veteran owned and operated business.  Chris and Kelli Capozzoli are based out of Massachusetts, and Nathan and Jennifer France are based out of Minnesota.  These 2 couples have combined forces to create RPG.  Chris Capozzoli, one of RPG's co-owners and CEO's, served in the United States Air Force for 6 years as a Nuclear Weapons Specialists.  Nathan France, RPG's other co-owner and CEO, as well as Jennifer, are military parents. Their son, Matthew, is currently active duty in the US Army.  

We are proud partners of the Chris Kyle Frog Foundation (CKFF,) a nonprofit organization created by the late Chris Kyle's wife, Taya Kyle, in honor of her husband.  Our current goal is to raise enough money to support military/first responder families to utilize their fantastic services.

An excerpt off of the CKFF website: "The Chris Kyle Frog Foundation’s (CKFF) vision for programming is one that is strategic, collaborative, and evidence-based. Since our organization was founded, we’ve developed an extensive network and well-rounded resources. CKFF’s unique and innovative programs have proven effective in keeping service marriages together, strengthening the family, as well as having a ripple effect on communities and future generations. Our long-term vision includes programs that help build stronger relationships between military and first responder marriages, as well as the communities in which they live and serve."

RPG's mission is to impact as many first responder and military families as we can.  50% of our net profits are donated amongst this community, which in many ways is under funded and under supported.  Our partnership with CKFF is another way to accomplish this goal.  Our previous donation efforts have proudly helped fund a Veteran's family home for new heating and cooling systems, as well as a new gym facility at Eagle's Healing Nest, a Veteran residential home who houses Veterans during times of healing from Invisible Illnesses.  

This is where our RPG Warriors come in!  With your contribution on this page, RPG and CFKK can put another family through their incredible program.  If you choose to purchase our "featured" perk on the right side of this page, you can receive our instant Super Coffee.  You'll experience the health benefits of this coffee along with the satisfaction of helping this population of people who have given so much to our communities.  Explore other perks or simply donate whatever you are comfortable with. 

What Is Super Coffee?

Super Coffee is sold in boxes of 32 individual single-serve sticks of our instant coffee.  Boxes are available at $46 each.  Our coffee is made up of premium Arabica beans sustainably grown in Colombia on a family farm that has operated for three generations.  Acemannan is added to our coffee blend to optimize your health with each consumption, which is where Super Coffee got its name!  Acemannan is powdered Aloe Vera extract, from the middle of the leaf.  Benefits include improved gut health, immune support, anti-inflammatory and wound healing effects, and much more.  Research is in abundance on this fantastic ingredient!

 

Why RPG?

RPG's goal is to start a ripple effect that benefits the Colombian community in which our coffee is grown, the customers who consume our Super Coffee, and the service members who receive our donations.  Since a year ago we have been able to help families with heating systems and contribute to a full CrossFit gym built for veterans.  We are grateful for the lives we have impacted, but this is only the beginning!  With your help, we can continue with this growth to help CKFF families.

Chris and Nathan recently returned from a trip to Colombia where they were fortunate enough to watch our coffee being created in stages, from the farm to factory to packaging.  Some of these experiences can be see documented in our videos!​  Not only do Chris and Nathan want to build a successful business, but the sustainable way our product is grown and created is especially important. 

 

Risks & Challenges

Like any new business, there are always new challenges that arise.  RPG prides ourselves in our communication skills that allow challenges to be resolved before achieving our next level of success.  We pride ourselves in networking with other entrepreneurs, with first responders, military and veteran communities.  Success comes in numbers.  With that success, we realize there are hurdles to jump.  We are challenged with continuing to grow our brand and showing consumers what sets us apart from any other coffee company out there.  Continued support by our RPG Warriors is what is making this possible!

How to Become an RPG Warrior:

Try our coffee!  We have 1 million sticks of coffee ready for your consumption, purchase yours via "perk" donation on this page.  Not interested in actually purchasing coffee? You are welcome to donate any monetary amount you are comfortable with, or take advantage of a "perk" on the right side of this page if you want as well!  Let's help these CKFF families receive the services they need and deserve!

We also realize that financial contributions aren't possible for all our friends and customers.  Smaller perks are available for donation and purchase. You can also become an RPG Warrior simply by telling a friend about our brand, sharing this IndieGogo link on your social media, following us on social media, or simply spreading positivity in your community.  It is scientifically proven that giving to others produces a positive psychological response. Join our mission today, become an RPG Warrior! View our social media information on the FAQ page!

story:
ON DEMAND FUEL, FOR PEAK PERFORMANCE WITHOUT THE CRASH

  • Designed For Performance - This product was designed from the ground up to make you perform at your best. *Full of healthy fats which help promote healthy hormone production and make you perform at your peak. 
  • Superior Taste - Your body will reward your taste buds because this is the food it has been craving- nutritionally, dense healthy fats. Junk food tries to mimic the buttery taste of nature, but nature does it better.
  • Just 4 Ingredients - Macadamia Nuts, Coconut, Cashews and Himalayan Sea Salt...that’s all!

Box of Performance Nut Butter

FINALLY, A PALEO, VEGAN AND KETOGENIC FRIENDLY SNACK

  • Paleo, Vegan and Keto Friendly - There is a reason that just about every diet out there includes nuts. It is because nuts are packed with nutrition and good for your body!
  • On-the-Go Design - Performance Nut Butter comes in individual squeeze packs so it is not only portable but also prevents you from eating the whole jar in one sitting. It is so good it would be hard not to eat the whole thing at once.
  • Long Lasting Energy - Healthy fats help your body produce and maintain energy levels better than carbohydrates or protein. They keep your blood glucose levels stable which means you have energy that lasts for hours, with no spikes or crashes.

Single Serve Pouch Perfect For On-The-Go

THE SCIENCE! THERE'S A REASON HEALTHY FATS ARE ALL THE RAGE 

  • Monounsaturated Fat - The Macadamia Nuts and Cashews give this product the perfect amount of monounsaturated fats which help increase blood flow to the muscles and the brain and have a general anti-inflammatory effect on the body. 
  • Oleic Acid - Found in Cashews and Macadamia Nuts it reduces blood pressure, increases fat burning to help with weight loss, protects cells from free radical damage, may prevent Type 2 Diabetes, and generates brain myelin (which is crucial to brain health). This is the fatty acid that makes olive oil so powerful. 
  • Healthy Saturated Fats - Your body needs saturated fats. If you eliminate them from your diet, you will suffer serious health consequences. Coconuts and Macadamia Nuts contain healthy saturated fats which are necessary for a healthy body and healthy hormone production.

NATURALLY HIGH IN VITAMINS, MINERALS AND ELECTROLYTES

  • Natural Electrolytes - Every time one of your muscles contract or one of your neurons fire, your body is using it’s store of Sodium and Potassium (also known as salt). We added just a touch of the best sea salt we can find, which contains the perfect blend of Sodium and Potassium (salt) to keep your body firing on all cylinders. 
  • Vital Minerals - This product is specifically high in Selenium, Manganese, and Copper which help your body naturally produce energy, antioxidant enzymes, digestive enzymes and much more.
  • Essential Vitamins - Performance Nut Butter is naturally high in B Vitamins like B1, B3 and B6. These vitamins help support brain function, healthy blood vessels and energy production.

Performance Nut Butter Box Nutrition Label

HOW TO USE PERFORMANCE NUT BUTTER

  • On-The-Go - Because Performance Nut Butter comes in 1 oz. squeeze packs, you can eat it wherever and whenever you want.  Throw it in your bag or pocket, take it to work, on a plane or hit the trails and you have a delicious on-the-go snack.  
  • Great By Itself or With Something Else - You can enjoy Performance Nut Butter with an apple, celery, in coffee or by itself.  You could also, of course, eat it with Ketogenic, Paleo friendly vegan toast or shockingly enough, regular bread. (I won't tell anyone I promise).
  • Whenever - Performance Nut Butter can be eaten in the morning to jump start your day, as a mid day snack to keep your energy levels stable or before a workout to fuel your body. PNB is not a stimulant, so you can safely have it before bed or at any time you want a high quality snack or meal supplement.  

Different Ways to Eat Performance Nut Butter

 BETTER FOR YOU THAN THE OTHER NUT BUTTERS

  • Better Than Peanut Butter - Most peanut butters contain added sugars, oil, "stabilizers" and artificial ingredients your body doesn't need.  Peanut butter also contains high levels of inflammation causing omega-6's and usually contains Aflatoxins a type of fungal toxin that can cause cancer.
  • Better Than Almond Butter - Most almond butter also contains added artificial ingredients like, palm oil, sweeteners and stabilizers.  Almond butter is also very high in inflammation causing Omega 6's.  
  • Better Than Most Nut Butters - Most companies add artificial ingredients to their nut butters to impress the masses.  Performance Nut Butter isn't for everyone.  It is for the person that wants to perform to their highest potential, to eat real food and feel real good. 

STRETCH GOAL:

If we can raise $51,000 I can immediately start work on the next product! If and when this project reaches that amount, I will let everyone that backed this project vote on which of the following products they want me to create.

It would be one of the following:

Keto Butter

Protein Nut Butter

Everyday Nutrition Nut Butter

Better Than Almond Butter - Most almond butter also contains added artificial ingredients like, palm oil, sweeteners and stabilizers.  Almond butter is also very high in inflammation causing Omega 6's.  

Better Than Most Nut Butters - Most companies add artificial ingredients to their nut butters to impress the masses.  Performance Nut Butter isn't for everyone.  It is for the person that wants to perform to their highest potential, to eat real food and feel real good. 
STRETCH GOAL:If we can raise $51,000 I can immediately start work on the next product! If and when this project reaches that amount, I will let everyone that backed this project vote on which of the following products they want me to create.It would be one of the following:Keto ButterProtein Nut ButterEveryday Nutrition Nut Butter

story:
You Can Now Buy Directly From

www.Levium.com

 

NATURAL STRESS
& ANXIETY RELIEF

Created by Neuroscientists

Experience a fast, effective anxiety and stress relief formula backed by science, made with natural active ingredients. A 2 oz liquid shot, Levium protects your brain's own "resilience" neurotransmitter, NPY—the counter to harmful stress-chemical Cortisol. Levium Founders, Doctors, and Neuroscientists dedicated years to developing an anxiety solution without the dangerous side effects of pharmaceuticals.  

“Stress for the day was reduced greatly after drinking it. I felt much less irritable, I fell asleep much faster than normal, stayed asleep, and felt much better the next morning. I am also almost positive it is responsible for the vivid dreams I had as well. Wonderful product.” - Jeremy J., Latest Levium Testimonial

WHAT'S IN LEVIUM

Levium is a plant-based solution for
reducing anxiety and stress while improving cognitive function

HOW IT WORKS

Levium Supports and activates your brain's natural anxiety regulators

Your incredible brain

Your brain actually has all the tools it needs to manage excess cortisol and hyperactive neurons. One tool is NPY, what our Doctors & Neuroscientists call the "resilience" neurotransmitter. NPY counters cortisol, buffering you from stress and anxiety.

The problem is that today's world of constant stimulation causes overactivity in our brains, leading to a decline in attention, performance, and mood. Levium enhances your natural NPY supply by inhibiting enzymes (DPP4) that usually break it down.

More than anxiety relief

Levium is a plant-based formula that contains antioxidant and anti-inflammatory properties with a dose of vitamins and minerals. It provides replenishing nutrients for your body and brain.

READ ABOUT THE SCIENCE OF NPY

EMBO Press Article  |  Science Direct Article

WHY NOW?

WHAT YOU GET

Levium 6-Count Sample Pack

See If Levium Can Be A Solution For You.

Levium 30-Count Monthly Pack 

More Value For Your Money. Levium's Benefits Build Over Time.

 

WHAT DOCTORS ARE SAYING
ABOUT LEVIUM

Levium Clinical Director Dr. David Kipper M.D.

WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING
ABOUT LEVIUM

“Was very lucky to have tried a sample of Levium. Happy to say it works for me!!! LISA LOVES LEVIUM!!!” - Lisa R, Levium Giveaway Winner

"I can feel a huge difference in my thought process and how I can handle many tasks and situations. I’m shocked at its effects.” - Lee R, Tester

Levium beta-tester testimonials


 

 

See more testimonials on our site!

READ ABOUT US IN THE PRESS

TIMELINE

The First Levium Production Batch Has Been Produced. We Are Now Shipping!

FAQ - COMMON LEVIUM QUESTIONS

"Is Levium safe to take with other anxiety prescription medications like SSRIs or Benzodiazepines ?"

  • Yes. Levium is specifically formulated to work with SSRIs and Benzodiazepines. In all cases, we suggest consulting a physician if currently on prescription medications.

"What’s in it? What are Levium’s Active Ingredients and what do they do?"

  • Levium’s base ingredients Apigenin, Luteolin, and Resveratrol inhibit the breakdown of NPY. That creates more ‘resilience’ to stress and anxiety, the effects increasing over time as NPY stores increase and cortisol levels balance out.
  • Levium also includes Ashwagandha (KSM-66), B vitamins, Amino acids, and GABA—all proven to offer a significant reduction in anxiety on the spot, amongst other benefits like reduced inflammation, increased blood flow to the brain, and increased energy levels.

“How long do the effects of 1 Levium serving last?”

  • Levium is a once or twice (if needed) daily dose meant to last all day. The long-term benefits last much longer they build in the nervous system, reducing cortisol levels, and increasing NPY reserves.

“My children have anxiety. Is it safe for children?”

  • Levium is currently formulated for adults 18 and over.

“I see this is a Pre-Order Sale. When will I receive Levium if I order is on Indiegogo?”

  • Levium will ship in December, after manufacturing. By contributing to Levium’s Indiegogo Launch you are funding the first Public Production Round. Thank you for your support and patience.

“Then how is it possible that some people have already tried Levium?”

  • We already produced a small and limited supply of Levium for private beta-testers and the winners of our pre-launch giveaway. The response has been positive.

“What are Levium's benefits?”

  • Anxiety & stress relief on the spot. Protection from adrenal overload and burnout. Longterm "resilience" as NPY levels increase over time. Improved focus and cognitive function. Better moods. Higher energy levels. Better sleep. And even weight loss if you are experiencing weight gain due to chronically high cortisol levels. 

“Does it work?”

  • The feedback we’ve received has been overwhelmingly positive:
    • "I can feel a huge difference in my thought process and how I can handle many tasks and situations. I’m shocked at its effects." -  Lee, Product Tester

    • “Was very lucky to have tried a sample of Levium. Happy to say it works for me!!! LISA LOVES LEVIUM!!!” - Lisa R, Giveaway Winner

"Can I use Levium if I am Pregnant?"

  • Although the ingredients in Levium have shown to be very safe, please consult a physician before taking if pregnant.

See More Video Testimonials of Beta-Testers Above.

ABOUT US

Glauser Life Sciences brings together a team of researchers, doctors, and chemists developing new treatments for anxiety, PTSD, and other central nervous system disorders. By leading the way with natural supplements, Glauser aims to shift the paradigm of treatment, combining both scientific rigor and respect for natural active ingredients.

Glauser Life Sciences developed Levium when Founder, Chris Adams, an investor and former tech executive, noticed anxiety affecting himself and his business colleagues. Chris met Co-Founder, Neil Mahoney, a former Navy SEAL and successful health entrepreneur who was on a similar mission to solve anxiety.

Both fathers of all-girl households, Chris and Neil had so much in common and recognized the need for natural anxiety solutions for entrepreneurs, parents, and everyday people. They teamed up with top anxiety doctors and university researchers who had discovered what they called the “resilience” neurotransmitter, and a way to enhance the brain's own natural resistance to stress and anxiety. That's how Levium was born.

The Levium Team includes Doctor Nicholas Gilpin PhD ,  Psychobiology Professor at LSU. Clinical Advisor, Dr. Todd Thiele  PhD  is Director of UNC's Behavioral Neuroscience Program. Levium Clinical Director, Doctor David Kipper MD is the founder of the Medical Group of Beverly Hills and the Host of a weekly Radio Program on K-ABC. 

Want to learn more? Check out our website: www.levium.com

Thanks For Backing Levium. We Are Now Live! Get Low-Cost Subscriptions On Levium.com
